1a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs mdor byas pa dpal mgon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa bzhugs//
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ piN+Da d+hi kI ta sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
2a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam gyur dngos po'i ngo bo nyid//
2a2(rgyud 'grel): dag cing ni la rnam dben mchog ni rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa nyid yul// rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la bdag gnam
2a3(rgyud 'grel): rab phan khyab cing mtshan ma med// rgyal ba'i bde ba mnyam med mnyam sku mi rtog tshul gcig la phyag 'tshal// dpal
2b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi ni// don bsdus rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// sems can kun la phan skyed pa'i// mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya// rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa yi//
2b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba gsum po rnam rmongs la// blo dang ldan pas legs bltas te// rnal 'byor rgyud kyis spyad par bya// 'dod pa lnga ni yongs spangs nas// dka' thub kyis ni gdung med
2b3(rgyud 'grel): par// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs la// bde bas byang chub bsgrub par bya// des ni 'di na sdom gnas yin// rtag tu mi phyed brtul zhugs gang // sku gsung
2b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje yi// sgrub pa dag kyang brtsam par bya// mgon po chen po'i sa phyogs ni// me tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan//
3a1(rgyud 'grel): ri bo dben pa dag tu ni// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa bsgrub// 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sems dpa'i dkyil krung legs gnas te// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas// gnas bsrung ba ni bsam
3a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro 'jigs par byed// nyi ma la gnas hUM las byung // g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas// khro bo bcu ni spro bar bya// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni// rim pa bzhin du bsam par bya// bgegs
3a3(rgyud 'grel): kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// gnod mdzes bka' stsal phur bus gdab// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya haM/ b+ha ga bAn bid+hA ra dzA hUM phaT/ khro bo'i gzugs can 'di yis ni//
3a4(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi dbang po nyid bkug nas// blo dang ldan pas sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i mdog/ 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// rdo rje phur bu rnam par
3a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// lte ba'i phyogs nas sprad kyi cha// rtse mo lte bur rnam par bsam// stod ni khro bo'i dbyibs can te// zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur bsgom// de yi gsang sngags legs brjod la// bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og gzigs pas//
3a6(rgyud 'grel): rdorje phur bu nges btab ni// bgegs kyi lus ni mi g.yo 'gyur// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya// sarba duSh+TAM phaT phaT/ kI la ya kA la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT hUM hUM hUM/ badz+re ki lA ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro adz+nyA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+nA nan/ kA ya
3b1(rgyud 'grel): bAka tsit+ta/ kI la ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams pa'i// gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsam// rdo rje me yis kun tu ni// rnam par 'phro bas nges par bsgom// gdug pa tshig pa phun tshun du// 'bros par gyur pa rnams
3b2(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// phyogs bcu phur bus btab nas ni// steng 'ag yang dag byin gyis brlab// dam pa'i don du dngos po rnams// srid gsum dngos po med par bsgom// dngos po med la bsgom pa'i dngos// bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min// /
3b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// bsgom pa dmigasu med pa'o// tshigs bcad 'di yis rgyu mi rgyu'i// bdag nyid can rnams stong par bsgom// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes sa gzhir byin gyis brlab// nam mkha' dbyings kyi
3b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas par// hUM gnyis sa ben yuM las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// hUM gnyis sa bon r-i las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// mA yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni// de yi
3b5(rgyud 'grel): steng du rnam par bsam// hUM gnyis sa bon baM las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang ni// de yi steng du rnam par bsam// hU~M gnyis sa bon laM las byung // rdo rje gnyis dang yang dag ldan// sku yi dkyil
3b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nyid kyang ni// de yi steng du rnam par bsam// dkyil 'khor bzhi po yang dag bsdu// rdo rje sa yi dkyil 'khor la// der ni b+h+rUM las byung ba yi// gzhal yas khang ni rnam par bsgom// zur bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhi yis mdzes
4a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis yang dag mdzes// dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang // rdo rje nor bu zla phyid brgyan// grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin
4a2(rgyud 'grel): chen rnams kyis spras// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// bum pa ka pa rdo rje che// be la bya ni rim bzhin gnas// ba dan dril bu mdzes byas la// rnga yab sogs kyis rnam par brgyan// bdag nyid phyag rgyar ldan pa ni// zhal gsum
4a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug rnam pa can// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa// dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen dang // 'od dpag med dang las kyi rgyal// zhal gsum phyag drug lta bur ni// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bsam//
4a4(rgyud 'grel): gti mug dga' sogs lha mo rnams// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// me'i phyogs nas brtsams nas su// rim pa ji bzhin nges par dgod// de bzhin gzugs rdo rje la sogs// phyi yi mtshams ni rnam pa bzhir// reg bya rdo rje nyid kyang
4a5(rgyud 'grel): ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang ldan gnas// byams pa sa yi snying po dag/ shar gyi snam bur dgod par bya// phyag ni rdo rje mkha' snying po// brtul zhugs can gyi lho ru dgod// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs// nub tu yang ni dgod par bya//
4a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang // kun tu bzang po byang phyogs su// gshin rje gshed ni shar gyi sgor// gzhan gyis mi thub lho phyogs su// nub phyogs su ni rta mgrin te// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa byang du'o// mi g.yo 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang // dbyug sngon dang
4b1(rgyud 'grel): ni stobs po che// shar lho mtshams sogs nas brtsams te// rim pa ji bzhin bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes rgyal po khro bo che// de yi 'og tu rnam par bsam// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur rgyal yang // de bzhin steng du rnam par bsgom// cho
4b2(rgyud 'grel): ga ji bzhin dkyil 'khor pa// de ltar lhag par mos bsam nas// slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis// rang gi lus la de rnams gzhug/ lus kyi 'khor lo rdzogs sangs rgyas// rim pa ji bzhin yang dag bsam// don dam pa yi rdo rje yis// de
4b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid la gzhug bya bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na// dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur// 'di don rdo rje phreng ba las// gsal bar ji bzhin rnams phye ste// gzugs phung gtogs dang me long dang // sa khams mig
4b4(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang po dang // gzugs dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// tshor ba'i phung po mnyam nyid dang // mu khams na ba'i dbang po dang // sgra dang rnam lngar gyur po ste// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// 'du shes so sor rtog pa
4b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // byin za sna yi dbang po dang // dri dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// 'du byed bya ba grub pa dang // rlub khams lce yi dbang po dang // ro dang rnams lngar gyur pa ste// khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan// steng 'og khro bo shin tu
4b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas// rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid// rnam shes phung por zhugs pa ste// rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal ba'o// mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang // chos kyi skur yang bshad pa yin// brtan par bya ba'i don du ni// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod
5a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma86/ 'di ni don dam dkyil 'khor te// snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med// don dam bden pa zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// 'od gsal bar ni rab
5a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas// ldang ba yang ni bstan par bya// sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis// lha yi gzugs la dmigs par 'gyur// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sngags pas de yi steng du yang // zla ba'i
5a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam// der ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// kha dog dmar po bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i steng du sngags chen po// yi ge gsum ni de nas bsam// sngags dang pad+ma nyi ma dag/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
5a4(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs gyur// byang chub sems su rnam par brtag/ rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad kyang // de nyid du ni rnam bsam zhing // brtan par bya ba'i don du ni// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ de ltar sbyor ba dmigs nas
5a5(rgyud 'grel): su// rjes su sbyor ba brtsam par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi yig gsum yang // zla ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam// de nas yig gsum las byung ba// kun da zla ba dkar dang mtshungs// dang po mgon po bsams nas kyang // shin tu sbyor ba yang dag brtsam//
5a6(rgyud 'grel): mi spyod pas ni rje so zhugs pas// zhal gsum phyag drug 'bar ba dang // in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni// g.yas pa'i phyag tu rnam par bsam// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// g.yon pa'i phyag tu
5b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya// de nas phung po la sogs pa'i// dbye ba shes pas snang mdzad sogs// gnod mdzes bar du sa bon gyis// dgod pas yang dag nyid du dgod// rnam snang mdzad 'di sa bon ni// kha dog dkar po yi ge oM// gzugs phung ngo bo nyid kyis//
5b2(rgyud 'grel): ni// sngags shes pas ni spyi bor dgong // a ni mgon po 'od dpag med// 'du shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid// mdog dmar kha la bsams nas ni// ngag gi dbang phyug nyid thob 'gyur// mi spyod pa yi yi ge hUM// rab tu bzang po'i mthing shing mdog
5b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam shes phung po'i ngo bo nyid sngags pas snying gar rnam par bsgom// rin chen mgon po'i yi ge swA// tshor ba'i phung po'i ngo bo nyid// tshor ba dag gi rgyu can ni// kha dog ser po lte bar dgod// rgung pa gnyis la yi ge hA// 'du byed phung po'i ngo bo nyid//
5b4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi mgon po de nyid ni// sngags pas kha dog ljang gur dgod// gti mug dga' sogs sngags kyis ni// sa la sogs la rab tu gzhug/ sra dang gsher dang dro ba dang // rlung sogs der ni rim pa bzhin// blo mig tu bkod nas ni// sa yi snying po
5b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgom// oM nini ba dag la dgod// phyag na rdo rje bsgom par bya// oM ni sna la rab bkod de// na mkha'i snying po rab tu bsgom// oM ni lde la bkod nas ni// 'jig rten dbang po brtag par bya// yid la hUM ni bsams nas su// 'jam dpal
5b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs ni rab tu bsgom// yi ge oM ni lus kun la// bsgoms nas sgrib sel dran par bya// yi ge me ni rtsar bzhag ste// byams pa nyid du yongasu brtag/ tshig kun la ni saM bkod de// kun tu bzang po bsam par bya// lag pa g.yas par gshin rje
6a1(rgyud 'grel): gshed// g.yon par gzhan gyis mi thub pa// rta mgrin kha la bsam par bya// rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par mi g.yo mgon// g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o// pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni/
6a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa sngon po cher 'bar ba// pus mo g.yon par stobs po che// spyi bor gtsug tor 'khor lo sbyar// gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni// rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya// dgod byas de nas sngags pa yas// phung po la sogs cho ga bzhin//
6a3(rgyud 'grel): sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs gyur nas// sbyor ba chen po yang dag brtsam// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag rdzogs// spyi bo'i dbus su rnam par bsam// de ni yi ge aM dkar po// 'od zer lnga ni rab 'phro ba'o// de las lha mo dbyung ba ni// bdag po dang ni rab
6a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba// spyan ni du ma bsam nas ni// nam mkha' thams cad rab tu dgang // de nas sku yi rdo rje ni// na mkha' gang bar legs gnas pa// de dbus bdag po bsgom pa ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan//
6a5(rgyud 'grel): bodag kyang de yi mdun gnas la// de nas sngags pas tshogs bcad 'di// gnyis brjod nas ni gsol ba gdab// dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas// dang bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje sku ni mdzad du
6a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje skur ni mdzad du gsol// spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa yi// rnam par snang mdzad bsams nas su// de
6b1(rgyud 'grel): bcug nas ni byin brlabs te// sku yi byin gyis brlab pa brtsam// sangs rgyas kun gyis sku gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab gang ba// sangs rgyas sku yi ngo bo yis// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA bA At+ma
6b2(rgyud 'grel): ko&haM/ A ni kha dog dmar ldan pa// lce yi pad+mar rnam bsams te// gos dkar zhes bya na mkha' ru// spros nas na mkha'i khams rnams dgang // gsung gi rdo rje sngags pa ni// nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la// de nas sngags pas tshigs bcad
6b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di// gnyis brjod nas ni gsol ba gdab// chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed
6b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje gsung du mdzad du gsol// gos dkar mo dang lhan cig nyid// rang gi gtso bor yang dag ldan// lce la zhugs par rab bsams to// gsung gis byin gyis brlabs pa brtsam// rdo rje chos kyi
6b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung gang yin// nges pa'i tshig ni phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshig cang de 'dra zhing // chos 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA bAk+Sha badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ sngags pas snying gar nyi ma yi// gzugs bstan 'bar ba bsam pa ste// der ni
6b6(rgyud 'grel): mthing shing lta bu yi// 'od zer lngar ldan hU~M dgod do// de las lha mo mA ma kI/ tshogs dang bcas pa dbyung bar bya// de bzhin thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom// de la sngon bzhin gsol ba gdab// dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas/ dang bdag byin
7a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs nas su// don thugs su mdzad du gsol// phyogs bdur bzhugs pa'i ngas rgyas rnams// rdorje mi byed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rnathugs su ma da du gas // mA ra thA/
7a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ma lus pa// rdo rje thugs dang yang dag ldan// snying gar yang ni bcug nas su// thugs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa brtsam// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// bdag kyang dri dang 'dra gyur cig/ rdo rje 'dzin dang
7a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+re swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ da ltar rigs gsum dbye ba yis// so sor byin gyis brlabs nas ni// blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags 'dis// slar yang thams cad bdag nyid bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka
7a4(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// mtshan ma drug dang yang dag ldan// dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom par bya// snying ga'i dbus su phra mo yi// ye shes sems dpa' rnam par
7a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// ting 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i// yi ge hUM ni de ru dgod// sems dpa' gsum gyis bdag nyid can// de ltar sbyor ba cher bskyed nas// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni// /
7a6(rgyud 'grel): sme sha can ni bdag nyid che// bu mo ut+pal mthing ga'i mdog/ mig yangs dam pa rnyed nas ni// mnyam par bzhag cing legs par bslab// sgrub pa po la shin tu mos// oM ni spyi bor bsam par bya// AHni ngag gi lam la dgod// hUM ni snying gar
7b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya zhing // lte bar sna dang rkang gnyis hA// spyan dang mA ma kI dang ni// de bzhin du ni gos dkar mo// sgrol ma dang ni sngags pa yis// sa la sogs la rnam par dgod// lha mo rdo rje gzugs la sogs// de nyid la ni rnam bsams la// sa sta
7b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs de rnams dang // snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya// lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma// g.yon la gzhan gyis mi thub ma// de yi khar ni khro gnyer ma// gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o// gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas par ni// de bzhin gshegs
7b3(rgyud 'grel): yum rdo rje ma// g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi// phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya// pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang // sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs// g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las// spyi bor na mkha'i rdo rje ma// rkang pa gnyis la sa yi ni//
7b4(rgyud 'grel): sa 'dzin lha mo bzhag par bya// de ltar 'dus byas rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag brtsam// hUM gi sngags skyes rdo rje ni// rtse mo lnga pa bsam par bya// de tshe de yi rtse dbus su// oM ni rnam par bsam par bya// de bzhin a las byung ba yi//
7b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ni/ 'od zer lnga yis khyab bsam la// de 'od sgrub pa brtsam par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal legs 'chang ste// hUM gi glu yis kyang ni bskyod bya zhing // rang gi
7b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems nyid phyung ba'i tshe// des ni phaT kyis gsang sngags brjod par bya// phyung nas slar yang sngags pas ni// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// byang chub sems kyis mchod nas ni// gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya//
8a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha~M/ rang sngags yi ge las dbyung ba// rdo rje gsum gyis byan brlabs bdag/ pad+ma'i dbus sa bskyed nas ni// slar yang zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur// badz+ra hU~Mga~M sngags kyis dbyung ba/
8a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod rdo rjer bsam pa yang // mgon po ral pa thor tshugs can// mi bskyod pas ni dbu brgyan byas// mthing zhing bzang po'i mdog ltar snang // sngo nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom//
8a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma ni// g.yas pa'i phyag du bsam byi zhing // dril bu rin chen ral gri ca ni// de yi g.yon la bsam par bya// 'di ni thogs ka las byung nas// phyogs bcu rnams su gzigs nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // sangs rgyas mdzad
8a4(rgyud 'grel): pa kun mdzad de// sems can ma lus kun sbyangs nas// zhe sdang rdo rje gnas la 'jog/ slar byon rdo rje mgon po ni// spyan snga ru ni 'dug par gyur// sngags pas de yi snying ga ru// rjes zhugs bdag nyid rnam sgom pas// snga mi'i gzugs ni yongs
8a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas// sdang rdo rje gnas su zhugs// in+d+ra nI la'i 'di 'bar ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rabs na bzhugs// dpa' bo rang gi phyag rgyas 'khyud// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dral po zhi dang 'dod chags che// zhal gsum gyis
8a6(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par mdzes// zhi sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spro bar mdzad// dzi na dzaka sngags kyis dbyung ba// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dbyung // mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// ston ka'i zla zer ltar snang zhing // thor tshugs
8b1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan dag gis brgyan// dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug zhi ba'i gzugs can te// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dag/ g.yas pa la ni rnam par bsam// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// 'di yi g.yon du rnam par sgom// de bzhin
8b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka las byung ste// gti mug spyong nas sems can rnams// yang dag sbyangs te slar byon nas// shar phyogs kyi ni zla bar bzhugs// rat+na d+h+r-ika sngags kyis dbyung ba// rin chen tog ni sngags pas dbyung // zhi ba'i thor tshugs cod pan 'chang //
8b3(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can// ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang // 'khor lo de yi g.yas su bsgom// dril bu pad+ma ser po dang // ral gri g.yon
8b4(rgyud 'grel): du bsgom par bya// de bzhin thugs ka nas phyung ste// nga rgyal gnas la gnas pa rnams// yang dag sbyangs nas lho yi char// rin chen dbus su bzhugs par gsungs// a ro lika sngags kyis dbyung ba// mtha' yas rdo rje can dbyung ste// zhi ba pad+ma
8b5(rgyud 'grel): rA ga'i'o// mi bskyod pas ni dbu brgyan byas// mgon po ral pa'i thor tshugs can// dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// sgeg pa'i nyams dang yang dag ldan// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// g.yon pa'i phyag gi dril bu dang // pad+ma sdong bu 'dzin
8b6(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// pad+ma thugs ka'i phyogs gnas pa// g.yas pa yis ni 'byed par mdzad// rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas nyid la// rin chen ral gri g.yon gnyis le// sngon bzhin 'dod chags can sbyangs nas// rgyab kyi pad+ma la bzhugs 'gyur// pradz+nyA
9a1(rgyud 'grel): d+h+r-ig sngags kyis dbyung // bsngags pas don yod rdo rje can// mgon po sgra mdog ljang khur dbyung // mI bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// thor tshugs cod pan dag gis brgyan// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// phyag drug 'od zer
9a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'phro// ral gri sna tshogs rdo rje dang // 'khor lo g.yas su bsgoms par bya// phyag g.yon na ni dril bu dang // de bzhin pong ljang nor bu'o// log pa'i ngang can sems can rnams// rnam par sbyangs nas slar byon te// de bzhin byang gi phyogasu ni//
9a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje dag la bzhugs// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag nyid// 'dod dang thar par rab bsgrub pa'o// mo ha ra ti sngags kyi dbyung // lha mo can ni dbyung bar bya// dkar zhing zhi ba'i nyams
9a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// rnam snang mdzad kyis spyi bor mtshan// dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du// ut+pa laM dkar po g.yas su bsam// dril bu de bzhin rin chen dang // ral gri g.yon du bsgom par
9a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste// phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni// gdon dang nad gdungs 'jigs pa rnams// thugs rje chen pos zhi mdzod de// slar byon nas ni zla dkyil du// shar gyi mtshams su bzhugs par bya// dwe Sha ra ta'i sngags kyis
9a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyung // lha mo mA ma kI dbyung ste// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo// bzhin bzang shin tu yid du 'ong // gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba ste// mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// 'khor lo rdo rje de bzhin du// ut+pal sngo dmar g.yas pa la// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni//
9b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// bgegs chen 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams// thugs rje chen pos bsrung bar mdzad// byung nas slar ni byon nas su// lo nub tu ni bzhugs par gyur// rA ga ra ta'i sngags kyi dbyung // gos dkar mo ni dbyang bya ste//
9b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang ldan// 'od dpag med bcas ral pa'i tshogs// phyag drug pa ni rnam bsgoms te// g.yon pa dril bur bcas pa yis// ut+pal stong bu 'dzin mdzad la// thugs kar gnas pa'i ut+pal// dmar po g.yas
9b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'byed par mdzad// rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas dag la// nor bu rin chen ral gri g.yon// bsnams par mdzad pa phyung nas ni// gdon gyis nyen pa zhi mdzad de// slar byon pad+ma'i dbus nyid du// nub byang mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur// badz+ra ra ti'i
9b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis dbyung // yid 'ong sgrol ma dbyung bya ste// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// dur ba'i lo ma'i mdangs dang ldan// don yod pas ni gtsug tor byas// phyag drug par ni rnam par bsgom// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang / ut+pal dkar po
9b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa na// dril bu rin chen ral gri ni// brtul zhugs can gyis g.yon du bsam// sems can thams cad dbang mdzad de// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la yang // byung nas slar ni byon nas su// byang shar mtshams su bzhugs par 'gyur/
9b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas ni rim gnyis par// gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa byung // me yi mtshams su dgod bya ba// rdo rje gzugs ni yid 'ong ba// zhal gsum phyag drug dkar ba ste// dbu brgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal// gnyis kyis me long 'dzin mdzad de//
10a1(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma gti mug dga' dang mtshungs// bden bral phyogs dgod lha mo ni// rdo rje dgra sta phyag drug pa// zhal gsum sku mdog ser mo ste// dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni pi baM bsnams// lhag ma mA ma
10a2(rgyud 'grel): kI dang tshungs// rlung gi phyogs dgod lha mo ni// rdo rje dri ste phyag drug pa// zhal gsum sku mdog dmar mo ste// snang mtha' yas kyi thog tshugs can// phyag gnyis kyis ni dung bsnams te// lhag ma gos dkar can dang mtshungs// dbang ldan phyogs dgod
10a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo ni// rdo rje ro ste phyag drug pa// zhal gsum sku mdog ljang gu ste// dbu rgyan la na ji sgra bzhugs// phyag gnyis la ni ro yi snod// lhag ma sgrol ma lta bu yin// rdo rje sems dpa' legs 'khyud de// 'khor lo dbus na rab bzhugs par// rdo rje reg bya bsam
10a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal sogs bdag po lta bu'o// rim pa gsum pa sher gyi ni// snam bur brtul zhugs can gyis dbyung // maM thil sa bon las byung ba/ byams pa sa yi snying po gnyis// oM gyi sa bon las byung ba// phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po// lha yi phyogs
10a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi snam bu la// go rim bzhin du dgod par bya// oM dang hUM las yang dag byung // 'jig rten dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'di dag nub tu dbyung bar bya// byang gi phyogs su dbyung ba ni// oM dang saM gi sa bon skyes// sgrib sel kun tu bzang por bcas//
10a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag dbu rgyan rang gi mgon// sku mdog sogs pa de dang mtshungs// phyag dang mtshon cha dag kyang ni// rang rang gi ni bdag por mtshungs// byams pa 'ba' zhig g.yas pa na// klu shing me tog bsnams par mdzad// 'di dag skye mched rnam sbyong zhing //
10b1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi mig sogs stsol ba po// sems can skye mched sbyangs nas su// slar byon nas ni stan la bzhugs// ya mAn+ta krita sngags kyis ni// sngags pas gshin rje gshed dbyung ba// rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan can// zhal ni gnag dang dkar dang dmar/
10b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// dbyug pa rdo rje 'khor lo rnams// phyag g.yas na ni rnam par mdzad// thugs kar sdig mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa na// dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang // mi bzang bgegs kyang skrag
10b3(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// shar gyi phyog su bzhugs par gyur// pradz+nyAn+ta krita sngags kyi ni// rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can// sku mdog dkar zhing nor bus brgyan// gzhan gyis mi thub sngags kyis dbyung // gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa/
10b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal// mche ba gtsigs shIng rnam par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs// rdo rje dbyug pa ral gr-i nI// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// snying gar sdig mdzub zhags pa dang // dril bu dgra sto g.yon pa na/
10b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yi// mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// lho yi phyog su bzhugs par gyur// pad+mAn+d+ha kri ta sngags kyis ni brtul zhugs can gyi rtswa mgrin dbyung // spyan gsum pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ zhal ni dmar dang gnag
10b6(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar// zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang // 'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can// dpa' ngo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas// 'bar ba'i tshigs ni rnam par 'khrubs// pad+ma ral gri gtun shing ni// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad// bsnyems pa bcas pas dri
11a1(rgyud 'grel): bu dang // dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// phyogs cu dag tu gzigs nas ni// klu rnams skrag par mdzad nas su// nub kyi phyogasu bzhugs par 'gyur// big+h+nAn+ta kAta sngags kyis ni//
11a2(rgyud 'grel): rnga sgra'i cod pan yang dag ldan// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ltar sngo// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dbyung bar bya// zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar// zhal gdangs pa ni rnam par 'gyur// gsus khyim tsho zhing spyan gsum pa// 'bar ba'i 'o da kyi rnam par brgyan//
11a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang // gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na// sdigs mdzub zhags par bcas pa dang // dril bu dgra sta g.yon na bsnams// g.yon rkyang ba yis gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni// byang gi phyogasu bzhugs par gyur//
11a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// mi g.yo ba yang dbyung bar bya// spyan gsum in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar// mi zad ha ha zhes gzhad sgra/
11a5(rgyud 'grel): gsus khyim che zhing stobs po che// ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo rnams// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad// sdigs mdzub dang ni dgra sta dang // zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams par mdzad// rims sogs 'jigs pa'i gdon 'joms te// g.yon
11a6(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba yis gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas nas// shar lho mtshamasu bzhugs par gyur// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// brtul zhugs can gyis 'dod rgyal dbyung // drag po in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can// zhal ni
11b1(rgyud 'grel): gnag dang dmar drang dkar// spyan gsum mche ba 'jig su rung // phyag gnyis rdo rje rgyu mdzad kyis// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching bar mdzad// rdo rje ram gri g.yas dag na// g.yon na zhags pa lcags kyu'o// bden bral bgegs ni 'joms pa'o// g.yon
11b2(rgyud 'grel): brkyang gnas pas nyi mar bzhugs// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// brtul zhugs can gyis dbyug sngon bskyed// spyan gsum sprin sngon lta bu ste// 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can// zhal ni sngo dang dkar dang dmar// gsus khyim che zhing 'dzin
11b3(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni// g.yas kyi phyog na bsnams par mdzad// snying gar sdig mdzub zhags po dang // dgra sta rnams ni g.yon na bsnams// yams kyi 'jigs pa gsal nas ni// gtum po g.yon rkyang gnas pa yis//
11b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// nub byang mtshamasu bzhugs par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yis// rnga s+tha yi ni dbu rgyan can// stobs po che ni sngags pas dbyung // ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar/
11b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i dgra dang ldan// yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan// gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs par byed// dbyug pa ral gri 'khor lo ni// g.yas kyi phyag ni bsnams par mdzad// snying kar sdigs mdzub ral gri dang // zhags pa dgra ste
11b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na bsnams// g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa 'joms// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// byang shar mtsham su bzhugs par gyur// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed pa yi// gtsug tor 'khor lo bsgyur ba dbyung //
12a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' ltar sngo bsangs 'jigs pa po// mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar// gtso bo spyan gsum gsus pa 'chang // g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag gnyis kyis// spyi bor gtsug tor
12a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par mdzad// rdo rje pad+ma g.yas dag ni// sdig mdzub ral gri gson na bsnams// 'tsho ba thams cad rnam 'jig cing // gtum po g.yon brkyang gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// tshangs pa'i gnas su de bzhugs po'o// rang gi sngags
12a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskyed pa yi// brtul zhugs can gyis gnod mdzes dbyung // spyan gsum nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog/ zhal ni gnag dang dmar dang dkar// gsus khyim che zhing 'jigs pa'i zhal// mi bskyod pas ni dbu rgyan byas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen
12a4(rgyud 'grel): ni// g.yas pa'i phyag na 'dzin par mdzad// snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // pad+ma ral gri g.yon na bsnams// rgyu ba dang ni gnas pa'i dug/ ka la ku ta sogs kun dang // bgegs kyi bdag po kun bcom ste// thams cad zhi bar mdzad nas ni//
12a5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus ka ni rdzogs byas lnga// g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis// pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te// sa yi 'og tu de bzhugs so// lha ni sum cu gnyis rang bzhin// dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed nas ni// 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas gyur na// de nas phra mo'i
12a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor brtsam// sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro lungs kar la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis brtags pa mo// ye shes mchog gi gnas bsgom mo// rin chen kha dog sna lnga la// sungs kar gyi ni 'bru chod tsam// sna
12b1(rgyud 'grel): rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur de mi spro// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od mnyam pa// rab mchog sprin ni spro bar bya// slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te// ma spangs pa la
12b2(rgyud 'grel): chags mi bya// 'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams 'das// brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// don dam pa yi bzlas par bshad// phra mo'i
12b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bzlas pa yang // ci 'dod par ni rnam gnyis bya// slar yang sngags pas bdag nyid ni// de bzhin nyid la gzhug par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas pa 'di// lha mos bdag po ma mthong bas// tshigs su bcad pa 'di bzhi
12b4(rgyud 'grel): yis// bde ba chen po bskul bar byed// sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab du gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na//
12b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la bgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub mchog bsgrub rab tu phan par gzigs// mgon po gal te de ri
12b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste kun ya phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu
13a1(rgyud 'grel): brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhod na// spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs te dam tshig mchog gi phan don tshe// yang dag
13a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de ltar yang dag yon tan ni// brjod/
13a3(rgyud 'grel): pas mgon po de bskul nas// mi bskyod la sogs ngo bo yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bstod par mdzad// mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba'i dbyangs la
13a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu dag/ rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// dngos nyid
13a5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa gros med pa// gsang ba'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mi mchi 'dod chags che// mi rtogs nam mkha'i rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dga' ba
13a6(rgyud 'grel): gdon mi za// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyis bstod gsol// mchog tu gsang ba ji bzhin don spyad nas//
13b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi 'khor lo la ni 'khor lo gzhug/ mgon po bad+ma ba chen po gtsog po bzhugs// da ltar rnal 'byor bzhi byeng rnal 'byor pa// dz+dza gI snying pos 'jig rten rab tu bsgos// de byung 'gro kun rdo rje sems dpar bsam// langs nas
13b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la bltas te ji bzhin spyad par bya// sngags pas ting 'dzin dmyigs pa'i tshe// gang tshe lus ni bsgoms gyur na// lus ngag yid ni tshim byed pa'i// sbyor ba 'di ni bsgom par bya// mtho gang tsam gyis spags pa ru// spyi bor
13b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// bdud rtsi lnga ni nges 'bebs pa'i// oM ni dai ru bsam par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig gis ni gzi tsan 'gyur// lus ngag yid na bde ba dog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de lta ro slob
13b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags pa yis// sbyongs dang de bzhin rtogs sngar bya// lkog ma snying ga legs sbyangaso shing // dri bzhin gshegs rnams tshim par bya// hUM gis legs par sbyangs byas la// yi ge a yis rtogs byas te// oM gyis mnan nas spar bar
13b5(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'di ni kha zas sbyang bya ba'o// dang po mgrin pa'i mtshams bsam pa// der ni hrIHlas byung ba yi// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom// lte ba'i nang du yi ge hUM// hU~M las skyes pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsam// rtse mo dbu ma'i steng du ni//
13b6(rgyud 'grel): oM bsam lkog ma sbyang po'o// sprin gyi sgra ni snying gar bsam// rtse gsum me ni de la spro// der ni bza' ba sreg pa dag/ 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg yin// rlung gis me ni sbar byed pa// der ni chu gang 'tshed par byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gan su ni/
14a1(rgyud 'grel): gang du me ni rgyub dag/ bza' ba dang ni btung ba rnams// gang ci yang rung ba chu dkyil 'khor// bza' ba khA yi pad+ma las// snying ga'i pad+mar yang dag gzhug/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor phyin 'og tu// kha sbyar ba
14a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yi// gsang ba'i pad+ma las byung ba/ thal ba'i mthar ni rnam par brtags// rims nad med cing nad kyang med// dug la sogs pas mi mchil// de ni dus min 'chi mi 'gyur// 'tshe ba thams cad rnam 'joms pa'o//
14a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phreng ba dpal mchog srub shong gis// gsang 'dus sbas chu'i rgya mtsho bsrub pa las// sgrub pa'i yan lag bdud rtsi gang thob des// 'di rten ma lus 'tsho med myur thob shog/ sgrub pa'i thabs mdor byas pa slob
14a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
14a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po A \u0f7f r+ya shwad+d+ha ka ra wam dang / bus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// bkra shis
15a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpas gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa'i thabs mdo dang 'gres pa slob yon klu sgrubs kyis mdzad pa'o//
15b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza ma hA yo ga tan+ta ut+ma te kra ma sA d+ha naM s+ya sU tre me pa la ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres
15b2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i sgrub pa la zab tu 'jug pa rnams kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par bya ba'i phyir mdo dang
15b3(rgyud 'grel): bsres pa zhes bya ba le'u bcu bdun pa las btus te bsdu bar bya'o// de la sgrub pa pos ji skad du le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs ni// me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogasu// dngos dru
15b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsdus pa 'grub ces bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig go tshul gyis rjes su mthun pa'i gan su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bdug ste/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de le'u gsum pa las/ na mkha'i dbyings
15b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po// sangs rgyas 'bor ba'i 'od dang ldan// 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab// kun nas yongasu zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i sngon lnga yis brgyan// mchod
15b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// gzugs ni dbusu sgom par bya zhes mdor bsdus te gsungs pa de la dang po kho nar byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i gzugs can zhes bya ba skyed par bya ba ste// le'u bco lnga pa las/ rnam par snang
16a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum 'dzin 'gyur zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mdog dkar por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin mos par bya'o// de nas le'u dang po
16a2(rgyud 'grel): las/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyod pa bskyed pas rjes su zhugs pas zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur nas le'u bcu gsum pa las// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/
16a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pas yi ge hUM ring po las khro bo rgyal po bcu phyung la/ le'u bcu bzhi pa las/ oM suM b+ha zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis khro bo'i rgyal
16a4(rgyud 'grel): po gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo bas phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs bkug nas le'u bcu gsum pa las/ yi dam bcas pa rdzogs nas kyang / sngags kyi gnas ni bsrung bar bya// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di la ni// gnas nas sangs
16a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po// rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom// me sdug 'bar ba 'dra ba yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya// zhes gsungs pa 'dis khro bo bdud rtsi thalo sbyor gyi phur du rnams kyis oM g+ha
16a6(rgyud 'grel): g+ho zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gnod mdzes la bka' bsgo ste phur bu gdab bo// de nas 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis rdo rje ra ba bsom pa dang / hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje'i dra ba yi ge hUM gis sa'i cha rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam zhing ma
16b1(rgyud 'grel): ge gsum gyis go cha la sogs pa bya'o// de ltar phyogs dang mtshams bcing ba dang ra ba la sogs pa'i cho ga bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms la le'u gnyis pa las/ dngos po med pa sgom pa'i dngos/ bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min//
16b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dngos po dngos med pa// bsgom pa dmigasu med pa'o zhes tshigasu bcad pa'i don gyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du sgom mo// de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes// nam mkha' rdo rje dobusu sgom zhes bya ba
16b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa// gsungs pas/ rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed nas/ bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya zhes bya ba la sogs pas sa'i cha bskyed la/ le'u bcu gcig pa las yi ge b+h+rUM gyi gnas bsgom ste zhes bya bas gzhal yas khang bsam
16b4(rgyud 'grel): der le'u dang po las/ gsol ba la sogs dkyil khri khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gonas shos gsungs pa 'dis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan gyis brgyan la le'u brgyad pa las dpag tshad bye ba'i khyo na
16b5(rgyud 'grel): tsam la// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yis// mchod rten rin cheni sna bzhi pa// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bzhugs nas ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom mo//
16b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni bskyed pa sngon 'gro bas// rdo rje gsum bskyed bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pas lhag par mos pa can gyis sems kyis bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang nyid du gyur nas/ dbus kyi gdan la sems pa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas par bsams nas
17a1(rgyud 'grel): le'u dang po las/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu khyab// sangs rgyas tshogs kyis kun tu rgyas// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug ces gsungs pa 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
17a2(rgyud 'grel): lo bkod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis dbang du byas te lhag par mos pa la dmigs pa bstan pa yin no// da ni rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pa tsam par bya ste de la le'u bdun pa las// dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin/ 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya//
17a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsod nas// dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa 'dis lhag par mos pa'i ting 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phung po la sogs par
17a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te// gzugs phung rtogs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ le'u gsum pa las/ oM shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o// le'u brgyad pa las/
17a5(rgyud 'grel): namakha' dbyings kyis dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis// ye shes rgya mtsho'i gzugs yongasu gyur nas/ de nas ldang bar gyur pa ni ye shes rgya mtsho las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil
17a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yang de'i steng du 'ad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa pad+ma'i steng du yi ge gsum bkod do// de thams cad bsdus te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar yongasu gyur par ltas la/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi phro ba sems can gyi khams rnams ye shes
17b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du rjesu bcug la le'u gsum pa las/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyi brtan par bya ba 'di ni rnal 'byor te// de bas na ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor yin
17b2(rgyud 'grel): par shes par bya zhes gsungs pa yin no// de la le'u bcu gcig pa las// rdo rje mchog gsum yi ge sngags// phyag rgya chen por rnam bsgom po// byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gaM bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa
17b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge gsum bkod la// rdo rje nga rgyal de las byung ba/ rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin bsgom pa ni rje su rnal 'byor ro// de nas le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i rig pa'i skyes bu
17b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi don bya bar mi nus pas na le'u brgyad pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgyas par du// cho ga shes pas rkang mthil bar du dgod// lte ba sked pa gsang ba rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga
17b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni dgod par b+ha tA bya zhes bya bya la sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pas phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes kyi rang bzhin lus la rjes su zhugs par bya'o// de bas na leT
17b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu bdun pa las/ phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrosgrags// rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog ces gsungs pa yin no// da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la rje su zhugs
18a1(rgyud 'grel): pas zhal gsum lta bus gdul bya rnams kyis don du rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o// don 'di nyid bstan pa ni le'u dang po las/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
18a2(rgyud 'grel): po sngags kyis byin gyis brlab so// byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to zhes gsungs pa ni shin tu rnal
18a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor// de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rjesu zhugs pas sku la sogs pa'i rim pa 'dis byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// de la rim pa ni 'di yin te le'u bcu pa las// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM zhes
18a4(rgyud 'grel): bya rab tu bsgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge a zhes rnam par bsam// zhes gsungs pa 'dis mgo bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga'i phyogasu
18a5(rgyud 'grel): ge gsum rnam papar bkod la de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis sku rdo rje la sogs pa bkug la le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigasu bcad pa rnams kyis gsol ba
18a6(rgyud 'grel): btab la rjesu zhugs nas le'u bdun pa las/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig su bcad pa rnams kyis rigs gsum gyi bdag nyid can du nga rgyal bskyed la le'u drug pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya zhes bya ba la
18b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa gsungs pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab po// le'u dang po las/ rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ni dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas le'u bcu gnyis pa las/ rnam
18b2(rgyud 'grel): nga mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// snying gar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog
18b3(rgyud 'grel): gi rab tu bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis// dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyis/ dgug pa dang / dbu brgyan la rang gi bdag po bsgom mo// de nas le'u bcu gcig pa las// snying gar yi ge hUM
18b4(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ ces gsungs pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar yang snying po yi ge hUM ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom mo// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi go 'phangs
18b5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'dod chags las skye bar 'gyur bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ le'u dang po las/ 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bskyed bzhin pa la gnas pas
18b6(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i sbyor ba bya ste/ 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod pas thar pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyiraro/ le'u bcu bdun pa las/ 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa'i zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par
19a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas zhes gsungs pa'i rim pa 'dis le'u bco lnga pa lngas gsungs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i gdol pa'i bu mo legs par bslabs pa 'am/ yang na rang gi snying gnas phyung ste mdun du bzhag la le'u brgyad
19a2(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ nu ma'i bar nas klad pa'i rgyas kyi bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i rigs lnga dang bsre ba byas la rdo rje dang pad+ma mngon par 'dus byas pas dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa bya ste/ le'u bdun pa las ji skad du/
19a3(rgyud 'grel): bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba/ lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs pa
19a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM zhes pa dang AHzhes pas// hUM dang phaT du rnam par brtag/ 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi// pad+ma rdo rje bsgom par bya zhes
19a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa 'dis/ thu mal pa'i nga rgyal spangs la// chags shing chags pa'i lta bas lta// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba 'dis thabs kyi rdo rje mnyes par bya zhing / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u
19a6(rgyud 'grel): drug pa las gsungs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i sngags brjod la 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba dang / gzhib pa la sogs pa byas la yi ge hUM gi glu len cing las la gnas par bsgom mo// 'byin pa'i skabs su phaT cis brjod la// byang chub kyi
19b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rdul phra rab de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'byung gnas su bsgom la sngar bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang na gnas par bya'o// de nas don yod pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas le'u drug pa las gsungs pa'i mchod pa'i sngags kyis
19b2(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs te gzhung 'di dag gis ni dkyil 'khor gsum sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can te/ bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir le'u
19b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po las gsungs pa'i ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i tshul gyis mi bskyed pa phyung la des zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yang dog par sbyangs la de bkug nas rang gi lus lnga bcug na zhe sdang rdo rjer 'gyur ro//
19b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyung nas de rnams kyis gti mug la sogs pa la rdo rjes su dga' ba'i sems can rnams yang dag par sbyangs nas bsdus te/ ye shes kyi 'khor tshe rjes su bcug la
19b5(rgyud 'grel): slar bkug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis bya'o// de nas le'u gsum pa las/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// sungs kar gyi ni 'bru chod tsam//
19b6(rgyud 'grel): sna yi rtse mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu bsgom zhes bya ba la sogs pa phra mo'i sbyor ba'o// le'u bdun pa las/ slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te/ ma spangs pa la chags mi bya// 'dod pa kun las longs spyod cing // sngags
20a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ zhes gsungs pa la sogs pas rdo rje bzlas pa dran par bya ste/ le'u bcu gsum pa las rjod nas rdo rje'i spro ba ni/ rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya zhes bya ba ngag gi bzlas brjod
20a2(rgyud 'grel): byas la nye bar bsdu bar bya ste le'u bcu bdun pa las/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
20a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pas zhes bya ba 'di thams cad bya ste/ bdag po rang nyid don dam pa'i 'den pa la zhugs pa la de nas spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rab tu bskul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
20a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis/ mi bskyod pa ni ye shes che zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rnams kyi mngon par bstod pas yang dag par gsang bar bya ste/ cho ga bzhin legs par mi chod nas rang gi sku la legs par gzhug par bya'o// de nas le'u bcu pa las
20a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje 'od zer rab tu 'bar// rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku
20a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs// snying la de yis rnams bsgom la// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// zhes gsungs pa 'dis yi ge hUM gis nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsam la haM
20b1(rgyud 'grel): byar bsdu bar bya'o// de ltar las dang po pa rnams rab tu 'jug pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal dang bral bas/ thun bzhir lha'i rnal 'byor goms pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum
20b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams kyang bya'o// rim pa 'di nyid kyis le'u bcu bdun pa las/ lus kyi rdo rje kha zas dang / phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje chos la rtag par ni/ sngags ston cho ga sprad pa
20b3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhes gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i rim pas kha zas sbyangs pa dang / lkog ma sbyang ba dang / snying ga sbyang po dag byas nas bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i zas kyi bya ba dag kyang bya'o// de nas le'u
20b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa las sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya zhes gsungs pa 'dis rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyar bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
20b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags dang phreng ba'i sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis kyang las thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/ 'di ni las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum
20b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de ltar mdo dang bsres pa rgyas par bstan nas/ da ni mdor bsdus nas bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar gnas nges pa dang / snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang / bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / stong pa nyid dmigs pa dang /
21a1(rgyud 'grel): sa'i ma skyed pa dang / gzhal yas khang dang / dkyil 'khor dgod pa dang / don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang / ldang ba dang / nya ma'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang / mthar zla ba'i dkyil 'tsha
21a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed pa dang / sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ phung po la sogs pa dgang ba dang / sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / ldan pa'i 'dus byas pa dang / rdo rje dang pad+ma 'dus byas pa dang
21a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa dang / dkyil 'khor phyung ba dang / phra mo'i sbyor ba dang / rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / ngag bzlas pa dang / don dam pa la zhugs pa dang / rab tu bskul byas bslang ba dang / bostod pa byed pa
21a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / nye bar bsdu bya dang / las kyi rab tu dbye ba rnamasu shes par bya'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i skyed rim gyis sgrub pa'i thabs mdo dang bsres pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal nas
21a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
21a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI b+hU drA dang lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
21b1(rgyud 'grel): oM ye d+hamA he hu pra b+ha bA he hur+b+he ShAn ta thA ga ho h+ya ba nga ha he ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM lA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/
22a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog slob dpo klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o//
22b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+yas mA dza maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma dbus mtha' las grol
22b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// khyab bdag stong pa bzhi'i rang bzhin// mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' la// btud nas dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// ji srid phreng ba chu la sogs// de srid bla ma'i man ngag mtha'// dbang bskur ba
22b3(rgyud 'grel): ni cho ga bzhin// bla ma'i rgyud rim las 'ongs pa// rnal 'byor rnam gnyis mthar thug pa'i// bla ma'i lung ni nges thob pa// bshad rgyud de bzhi'i dgongs pa shes// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa yi// rim pa gnyis kyi don shes dang // mchog dang
22b4(rgyud 'grel): thun mong sgrub la gnas// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste// rtswa ba'i ltung ba spangs dang ldan// bzod ldan drang la gla yo rgyu med// brtan bzhin dul ba blo gros ldan// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing // dkyil 'khor
22b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dri dang rab gnas mkhas// nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro min// pha rol phyin bcu'i tshul la gnas// zab cing rgya che'i chos la mos// bden gnyis la ni rnam par mkhas// bla mod theg pa gtsor byed pa// 'gro ba'i don spyod snying rje can//
22b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen skyes bur gang gyur pas// sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas su// de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gang zhig yid 'ong gnasu ni// dri bzang tsan+dan sogs kyis byug/ dri zhim me tog mchog dkram nas// shar phyogasu ni kha bltas lo// sems dpa'
23a1(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung gnas te// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi// 'gro la phan dang bskyab pa'i phyir// snying rje chen pos dmigs par bya// bka' yi 'khor lo sngon 'gro ba'i// bsnyen dang nyer sgrub sgrub pa dang // sgrub chen la ni mkhas
23a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// sbyor ba gsum gyi mthar thug pas// rdo rje 'das dang rjes mthun par// ngag gi bzlas pa'i tshul nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i 'bum du bzlas// de las gzhan pa'i khri ru bzlas// mtshan mo nges par thob pa'am// yang na bstan
23a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor goms pas// dkyil 'khor yongasu bri bar bya// de la dkyil 'khor cho ga ni// yan lag rnam phye nyi shu ste// sa bzhi sbyang dang byin brlab dang // yongasu bzung dang bsrung ba dang // sa yaM lha dang dkyil 'khor dang // bum pa rnams dang slob
23a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dgo/ sta gon du ni gnas pa dang // thig gdob pa yi cho ga dang // de bzhin rdul tshon dgye ba dang // dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab po dang // de la mchod pa'i bye brag dang // slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug pa dang // de bzhin slob ma gzhug pa dang /
23a5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba dang // shes rab ye shes dbang dang ni// de bzhin du ni bzhi pa dang // rab gnas dang ni skyon sreg ste// dkyil 'khor gyi ni yan la go mchog/ 'di dag cho ga nyi shu'o// de la re zhig dang por dkyil 'khor bri bar mngon par
23a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i sa'i cha'i dbusu maN+Dal gru bzhi khru gang pa bya ste/ me tog sil ma bkram la lha'i gnas dang gangad na ji lta ba bzhin bsam ste/ bla ma dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
23b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / mnyes par byas te/ byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i mthar thug par bya zhing / de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod de/ bstod pa tshul bzhin byas la/ dgongs shig dus gsum mgon po
23b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang // slob ma rnams la sman slad du// bdag mang 'di zhes bya ba yis// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar 'tshal// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis// bdag la byin
23b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab du gsol lan gsum brjod de gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas phyogs skyong rnams rang rang gi gnasu ji lta ba bzhin bskyed la dzaHhUM baM hoHphyag bzhis dgugs pa la sogs pa tshul bzhin du byas te/ mchod yon dang /
23b4(rgyud 'grel): shal bsil dang / zhabs bsil dang / spos drung / me tog lho sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod de/ kha zas sbyang bad+hi ting nge 'dzin gyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs hU~M/ oM in+d+ra ye swAhA/ oM ya mA ya~M swA hUM/ oM byA ru Na s+ye swAhA
23b5(rgyud 'grel): oM ku be ra ye swA hA/ oM Ag+na ye swAhA/ oM ne re tI rAk+Sha ta b+hI ye swAhA/ oM ba ye be sne hA/ oM I shUn ye swA hU~M/ oM sUr+yA l+ye swAhA/ oM tshan+ta da~M byA swAhA/ oM br-i th+wI b+hA ya stuhA/ zhes pas gtor ma dbu lA~M mAM// oM a kA ro
23b6(rgyud 'grel): ng+ge rna mo ste snang / zhe yin thas pas rgya / mas ni sa // 'i rgyun ma // sarnamapa/ sbyin dang blanam ze gro
24a1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang // sems can rnams la phan don du// sa phyogs dge gnas 'di nyid du// dam pa'i dkyil 'khor char
24a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba// ji ltar bsams pa'i las byed na// khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par// dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod// de ltar khyed la bdag gis ni// bzod pa gsol gyis ma bslu bar// rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma rnams// nyes legs
24a3(rgyud 'grel): ltas rnams bstan du gsol/ zhes lan gsum brjod la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas lcogs na las thams cad pa'i thab khung der dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas mi rus kyi phye ma las gnod
24a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes kyi sngags kyis bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o// mi lcogs na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi chus bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o// de nas ji ltar brtags pa'i dbusu las thams cad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i las kyi rdo rje
24a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bskor du khru zab su brko/ zhogs ma dang sol dum dang / rus pa dang / so phag la sogs pa'i skyon bsal la/ sman lnga dang ni rin po che lnga dang / 'bru lnga blugs la dI zhim+ba zhim bskum pa'i sras bka la gru bzhi lham par sa gzhi mthas
24a6(rgyud 'grel): par byas la ba ko tsam du bo'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas byug go/ dri zhim po'i chus kyang byug ste/ me tog sil ma dgram pa ni phyi'i sbyang ba'o// de'i steng du sbyor ba gsum gyis ting 'dzin rdzogs par bsgoms pa'i mthar gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis
24b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad pa ni nang gi sa sbyang pa'o// 'di dag ni sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas hUM khaM hUM zhes pas rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' bsam nas/ de nas hUM suM hUM zhes bA sa na mkha' la gnas pa'i rin po che sna bzhi'o ro'i rgyal po ri rab bskyed la/
24b2(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du hUM laM hUM zhes pas gsor gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi po la rdo rje phreng bas brgyan par bas mo// de'i steng du rdo rje thal mo bcings pas kha sbub la/ oM badz+ra maM di ni badz+ri b+ha ba ban+d+ha hUM zhes pas de dag byin gyis brla'o// de nas sbyor ba gsum gyi ting
24b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin bsgom pa 'di ni sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas yang bdag nyid dang po'i sbyor bas zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgoms la// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs po bzhi phyogs bzhin
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i las kyi rdo rje bzhi dngos su 'am sems kyis bsams kyang rung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar gsol bar gdab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil
24b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bsha du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog la byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong
24b6(rgyud 'grel): pa// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bsha du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sbyar// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad gsol// de ltar lan gsum du gsol ba
25a1(rgyud 'grel): btab nas// bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje khro bo chen po bsgoms te/ mig g.yas g.yon du ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te/ de'i dbus sum ga 'bras hA las gyur pa'i rdo rje nag po de las 'od
25a2(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi snang ba phyogs bcur 'phros pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad tu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis khyab par sprul par bya'o// rkang pa gnyis la a las sna tshogs rdo rje 'od 'brab bsgoms la lag pa galas g.yon du rdo rje dang dril bu
25a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gying bag can du 'dzin pas dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te/ stang stabs kyi g.yas skor bar bya'o// tshigasu bcas pa 'di dag brjod cing bskoro// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag
25a4(rgyud 'grel): ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor gyis// lha dang lha dbang gsang ba pa// brjed byed la sogs 'gegs kyi tshogs// sa 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje khro bo bzhin
25a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// mgo na tshil pa brgyar gshog cing // zhig par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// zhes brjod nas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brla'o// de nas seng ldeng gi phur ba la dri dmar pos byugs shing
25a6(rgyud 'grel): srad bu dmar po dang me tog gi phreng ba brtags pa bstod zhal gsum phyag drug pa smad zur gsum rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab pa'am// yang na bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas phur bu gdab par bya'o// 'di dag ni sa yongasu bzung ba'i tshe
25b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'o// / de nas gnod mdzes dang 'dod pa'i rgyal pos/ ra ba dang dra bas phyogs bsrung zhing bcing bar bya'o// 'di dag ni sa bsrung ba'i cho ga'o// / de nas mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgyas gnon du byas
25b2(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa la bzhag ste/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHzhes brjod pas sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis mtshan pa/ lag pa na gser gyis bum pa 'dzin pa/ dkyil 'khor
25b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi sa'i dbus nas 'thon par bsams te/ de la 'di skad du/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud
25b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gi bdud kyi sde// pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab bo// de nas mchod yono dang zhabs bsil dang / mchod pa dul te bzod par gsol te/ de nyid du thim
25b5(rgyud 'grel): par bsam mo// de dag ni sa'i lha mo sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim po'i chus lha'i grangs dang mthun pa'i rigs so so'i thib le byas la/ gdan dang gzhal yas khang ji lta ba bzhin
25b6(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ phyag rgya dang gnyisu med pa'i khyad par las dam tshig gi 'khor lo rdzogs par bkod la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis
26a1(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa byas la// phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod cing bstod pa byas te/ gsol ba lan gsum du gdab par bya'o// lag pas bdug spos blangs nas pus mo sa la btsugs te 'di skad du/
26a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa mcho gro/ rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje bdag nyid can dag gi/ dkyil 'khor bdag nyid bri bar 'tshal// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcoM
26a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan bdag ni gus pa lnga// de ni snang bar mdzad pa'i rigs// sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don rtsol// byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang // gzhan yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
26a4(rgyud 'grel): gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang // gang yang rdo rje spyan mnga' ba'i// sems can bstan l-i dga' ba rnams// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor ni// yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na// deng bdag slob
26a5(rgyud 'grel): mar bcas pa la// thugs ni rtsi bar dgongs nas so// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol// de ltar lan gsum du gsol ba btab la mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas ra ba dang dra bas phyogs
26a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bcing ba byas te/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas gser la sogs pa'am/ sa'i khams kyi rgyu las byas pa'i bum pa lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring gi kha khyer dang ldan zhing mchu
26b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang ba dag nog med pa lha'i grangs dang mthun par byas te/ tsan+dan dkar pos byugs shing pad+ma la sogs pa'i gdan la so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa bri/ ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul pa bcings la tsu ta la
26b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i 'bras bu can gyi shing gi kha brgyan po sngags kyis btab pa dri zhim po'i chus gang bI/ gro dang nas dang til dang 'bras so ba dang mon sran dre'u ste 'bru lnga dang / d+hu ru dang sa le sbrum dang / dung dang mu tig dang / nor
26b3(rgyud 'grel): bu ste rin po che lnga dang / saM ha dang / b+ho gr-i dang / ha swa dang / ha sa de ba dang / ka ra ni ka ste sman lnga blugs la/ me tog gi phreng bas bcings po'i rdo rje khar bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin
26b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas la bzlas pa bya/ yi ge baM las gyur pa'i gser gyi bum pa bsgoms la/ hrIHlas gyur pa'i pad+ma dang / oM dang a las gyur pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan la rang rang gi sa bon yongasu gyur pa las sku rdzogs
26b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la la ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug la bstim par bya ste/ mchod yon dang / mchod pa lnga phul l-i/ gtor myi yang kha zas sbyang ba'i tid+hi nge 'dzin du byas la/ thun mtshams bzhi ru phul nas so so'i bzlas pa ste
26b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par bya'o// de yang g.yasu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bzhag ste/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bya'o// g.yon du las thams cad pa'i bum pa bzhog la mchod pa dang / bzlas pas mnyes par byas nas/ dkyil
27a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi bgegs bsal du gsol zhes 'phrin las bcol lo// dkyil 'khor la mchod pa yang bya ste/ sgyu ma bzhin du gsol pa gdab pa yang lan gsum du bya'o// 'di dag ni bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i
27a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o// de nas phyi rol tu byung nas rang gi slob ma brtags la bzung bar bya ste/ blo dang ldan pa theg pa chen po dga' ba bla ma la dad cing snying rje che ba/ bka' drin rjes su dran pa nga rgyal med pa bslab pa yid ches pa dang ldan pa/ gsang
27a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags bsgrub pa dang / slob dpon la lhag par mos pa rigs dang ldan zhing sdom pa dang dam tshig la gnas pa ni rin po che'i skyes bu zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ste/ 'di ni brtan pas mchog tu bzung bar rgyal ba rnams kyis
27a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung so// de las gzhan pa'i slob ma ni dad pa sngon du 'gro bas byang chub la dmigs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bla ma la dad pa rgya chen po byed pa yang ci rigs par bzung ba rab ste/ gang zag gi rim pa bzhin sbyar ro//
27a5(rgyud 'grel): de las gzhan pa ni slob ma dang tshigs pa'i bdag nyid gang dang yang mi ldan pa de ni 'dir mi snang zhing dgag par bya'o// de ltar snod dang snod mo yin pa rnams brtags la slob dpon de dag nyid khang pa'i nang du 'jug/ de nas
27a6(rgyud 'grel): skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob mas kyang sgo drung du gnas te/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de nyid
27b1(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de ltar
27b2(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum gsol ba btab nas/ slob dpon 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin te/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// gsang sngags spyod yul cho ga dag/ khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// khyod ni
27b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen snod yin te// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// rdo rje gsung sngags bsgoms pa yis// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba
27b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med de/ shAkya seng ge sgrib pa yis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzod pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// 'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nos// 'khor li bri skor nas mya ngan 'das// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya phyir// bu yi sau blo
27b5(rgyud 'grel): gros 'di byos shig/ ces smra'o// de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rje su yi rang ba dang / yongasu bsngo ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bdag nyid lus
27b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar/ sangs rgyas thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor por bskul ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes sdom pa bzung ba dang / smon lam gdab par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum
28a1(rgyud 'grel): la skyabasu 'gro ba la sogs pa ni slob mas tshigasu bcad pa brjod cing bya'o// sdom pa bzung ba ni dang po slob dpon gyi bsgo ste/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu
28a2(rgyud 'grel): song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes gragaso// slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar gyis//
28a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi dag
28a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis bzung bar gyis// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag
28a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid du bzung bar bya// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod chags dag kyang mi bya zhing // rdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba ste// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/
28a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par// bya ba ma yin thams cad spangs// dam pa nye bar brten bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum bya// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum
28b1(rgyud 'grel): dag ni// ci nus par yang rje su bsrung // sems can don la mi phyogs dang // theg pa dman la dgod mi bya// 'khor bdag kyang yongs mi spangs// rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang bya pa// de la brnyas par mi bya zhing //
28b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya gzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o// de ltar dam tshig gsungs pa dag/ blo ldan khyod kyis rtag tu bsrungs// de nas bla ma dos gsungs pa'i// sdom pa legs par bzung bya'o// chags 'gyur las// phyogs
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// /
28b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pas// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi zer// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdod pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan
28b5(rgyud 'grel): por bzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa deng nas bzu bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi// rdo rje dral bu'i phyag rgya dag/ lnga dag
28b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid du bzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshing ying du 'ong pa la// nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i
29a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog chen po la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bsdu// mtshad/
29a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla mod pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sems can ma lus don gyi phyir// bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung // ma brgal ba dag bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba dag bdag gi sbyol/
29a3(rgyud 'grel): dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // mya ngan 'das la dgod par bgyi// lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis// mi dge ba ni bcu po dag/ bag med pa ni gnas gyur pa// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// de bzhin lha dang lha min dang //
29a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba pa dag brnyes pa dang // mtshan ma la sogs 'gom pa rnams// dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi// de ltar sdom pa bzung ba'i slob ma la snying ga dang mgrin pa dang
29a5(rgyud 'grel): dpral bar rdo rje khu tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum byas te/ nyi ma dang pad+ma dang / zla ba la yi ge gsum so sor bkod la sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab cing // las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o// de nas mchod
29a6(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ spyi bor me tog dang spos dang / mar me dang dri ni snying gar ro// lha bshos ni mdun du'o// de re re la yang tshig 'di sngon du 'gro bas sbyin te/ dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos par// mcho
29b1(rgyud 'grel): pa kun dang ldan pa ni// dus kun tu ni bde bar mnos zhes pas so// de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis/ mngon par sngags pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa shing drang po 'o ma can las byung ba srin bus ma zos pa/ pu ga dang
29b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzer pa med pa drang por byas pa la dri zhim pos byugs shing rtse mo me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i slob ma shar phyogasu kha bltas te mi smra bar so shing bca'o// bza' ba zin nas mdun drang por dor ro// de nas so shing gi rtse mo'i bltas
29b3(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ phyogs mtshams kyi dbye bas zhi ba la sogs pa'i lhas brgyad 'grub pa'am/ yang na bdag la blta ba 'am rtse mo gyen du 'greng na dngos grub mchog 'gru'o// de bzhin du shar du bltas na dngos grub 'bring 'grub bo// mtshams
29b4(rgyud 'grel): dang byang du bltas na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'grub bo// thur du bltas nas 'og gis dngos grub 'grub bo// de nas ngag gi nyes pa sbyangs pa'i phyir 'thor 'thung byas te/ kha bkrus nas hu ba gsum 'thung du gzhug pa'i sngags ni/
29b5(rgyud 'grel): oM tra bau shud+d+hA ya sarba d+harmA ya sarba pA paM nI tsa s+yaM sho d+ha sA/ sar+b+ba bi ki la paM a pa na ya hUM/ zhes bzlas la chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du bzhugau/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dum pa ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam ni res
29b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' zhig yin// 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo // gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gis mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa byas
30a1(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba// mthong bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas
30a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// go 'phangs bla na med par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba// de dag gi ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam
30a3(rgyud 'grel): med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongasu bzung ste skye bzhin pa/ ma de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la// sang ni rab tu skyo bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po
30a4(rgyud 'grel): cher 'byung ba'i// las mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams de ron dong bas na// rang 'byung skal pa chen po la// 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yon/ sa bya ba'i tshig 'di dag
30a5(rgyud 'grel): ni// theg pa chen po'i chos bshad pas spro ba yang dag par skyed par bya'o// de nas las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum bor ba dpung pa g.yon pa la gdag so// de nas sngags kyis btab pa'i ku sha la sngas
30a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / stan byas te/ rmi lam gyi bltas lha'o// rmi lam gyi bltas mthong ba dge ba 'am mi dge ba nang par dus su pa laM bzlos shig ces bsgo'o// rmi lam mi dge ba na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis gzhomo// de nas mchod pa
30b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bstod pa byas te/ na mkha'i phyogasu dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod la/ dra ba dang ra bas kha sbyar gyi sbyor bas bsrungs te bzhag go// de dag ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i ti nge 'dzin
30b2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pas rang bzhin gyis dkyil 'khor bskul ba'i phyir na mkha' la gdab pa'i skud pa dang mtshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir sa la gdab pa dang gnyis bya ste/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya ma bslab par 'byongs pa dang
30b3(rgyud 'grel): thig skud bkal te/ de nas tshon lnga so sor btsos nas bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs shing gser la sogs pa'i snod gtsang mor bzhag la/ rigs re re la yang rang rang gtso bor byas pa'i lnga lnga yod pas skud po re re la yang
30b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga lnga ste nyi shu rtsa lnga bya'o// sngags pas bdag nyid kyi mig g.yas g.yon la dza dkar dmar las bskyed pa'i nyi zla bskyed lnga// de nyid la yang dzas so sor mtshon pa mig gis gzi ma 'dren par byed pa'i 'bar ba'i lte bas na mkha'i
30b5(rgyud 'grel): ridabyings thams cad du ltas te/ dzaHlngas 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi skud pa drangs te/ yi ge lngas drangs pa'i dam tshig gi skud pa lo thim par byas nas/ las thams
30b6(rgyud 'grel): cod pa'i dri'i chus bsang gtor byas pa'i dri dang me tog la sogs pa phul nas/ oM AHoM hUMHoM AHswA hUM \u0f7foM AHA hUM/ oM aHhA hUM / oM a \u0f7fhUM hUM zhes bzlaso// 'khol zhing sgril ba'i dus su
31a1(rgyud 'grel): yang / oM a n+yon+ta nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma pa ra s+phar a nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+maHa t+yan ta a nu ga tA sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma a nu pra be sha ya sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma hUM zhes rjes su dran pas bzlas shing bsgril lo// de nas tshon sna gcig pa'i las
31a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad pa'i skud da byas te/ dri zhim pa dang bdud rtsi lnga dang / las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i yungs kar bsres pa spangs te/ tsan+dan dkar po'i chus byug par bya'o// skud pa yi ge gsum gyi nang du chud par bya'o//
31a3(rgyud 'grel): skud pa bsdogs shing bzung nas dz+dza gsum gyis bton la rang rang gi phyag rgya la la gtad par bya'o// shes rab med par bdag nyid gcig pu spyod na slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la gnas la slong ma rnam par snang mdzad dam
