60b1(rgyud 'grel): skyong bas brten de dag/ sems can phan pa tsam zhig gis// ma drangs pa ni 'gro gsum 'dir// 'ga' yang med la mtshar ci yod// sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dgas su// sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma'i dngos// sems can rnams kyis myong ba gang //
60b2(rgyud 'grel): dode ni sems can gnod las byung // bkres skom phan tshun bdeg pa dang // gzir ba yi ni sdug bsngal nyid// bzlog par dka' zhing zad med do// sems can gnod pa'i 'bras bu yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang // de 'phro dang ni ngan
60b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro gang // sems can gang gi rnam smin kyang // ngo bo gnyisu shes par bya// dngos po kun gyis rten bya zhing // rang gi lus bzhin bsrung bar bya// sems can rnams la chags bral ba// dug bzhin 'bod pas spang bar bya// nyan thos rnams ni
60b4(rgyud 'grel): chags bral bas// byang chub dman pa thob min nam// sems can yongasu ma dor bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byang chub thob// de ltar phan dang mi phan pa'i// 'bras bu 'byung bar dpyad pa na// de dag skad cig gcig kyang ni// rang don
60b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing ji ltar gnas// snying rjes brtan pa'i rtsa ba can// byang sems myu gu las byung ba// gzhan don gcig 'bras byang chub ni// rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed// gang zhig bsgom pas brtan pa ni// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis
60b6(rgyud 'grel): bre nas// bsam gtan bde ba dor nas kyang // mnar med pa yang 'jug par byed// 'di ni ngo mtshar 'di bsngags 'os// 'di ni dam pa'i tshul lugs mchog/ de dag rnams kyi rang lus dang // nor rnams byin pa ngom par yin// chos rnams
61a1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa 'di shes nas// las dang 'bras bu bsten pa gang // de ni ngo mtshar bas ngo mtsharar// rmad du 'byung bas rmad du 'byung // sems can bskyab pa'i bsams pa can// de dag srid pa'i 'dam skyes kyang // de byung nyes
61a2(rgyud 'grel): pas ma gos pa// chu yi pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin// kun bzang la sogs rgyal ba'i sras// nyon mongs bud shing bsregs mod kyi// de lta'ang snying rjes brlan 'gyur cing // snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa rnams// gshegs dang bltam dang rol pa dang //
61a3(rgyud 'grel): khab nas 'byung dang dka' ba spyod// byang chub che dang bdud sde 'joms// chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang // lha rnams kun gyis zhus pa dang // de bzhin du ni mya ngan las// 'das pa ston par mdzad pa yin// tshangs dang dbang po khyab 'jug
61a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / drag sogs gzugasu sprul mdzad nas// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sbyor ba yis// thugs rje'i rang bzhin can gar mdzad// srid pa'i lam la skyo rnams la// ngal so'i don du theg pa che// 'byung ba'i ye shes gnyis po yang // gsungs pa yin te
61a5(rgyud 'grel): don dam min// ji srid sangs rgyas kyis ma bskul// de srid ye shes lus dngos can// ting 'dzin myos pas rgyal 'gyur ba// nyan thos de dag gnas par 'gyur// bskul na sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni// sems can don la chags gyur cing // bsod
61a6(rgyud 'grel): nams ye shes tshogs bsags nas// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// gnyis kyi bag chags yod pa'i phyir// bag chags sa bon brjod pa yin// sa bon de dngos tshogs pa ni// srid pa'i myu gu skyed par byed// 'jig rten mgon
61b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bstan pa// sems can bsam dbang rjes 'gro ba// 'jig rten du ni thabs mang po// rnam pa mang po tha dad 'gyur// zab cing rgya che'i dbye ba dang // la lar gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid can// tha dad bstan pa yin yang ni// stong
61b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gnyis med tha dad min// gzungs rnams dang ni sa rnams dang // sangs rgyas pha rol phyin gang dag/ de dag byang chub sems kyi char// kun mkhyen rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// lus ngag yid kyis brtags par ni// de ltar sems can
61b3(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa// stong nyid rtsod par smra rnams la// chad pa'i rtsod pa nyid yod min// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa la// bdag nyid che ste mi gnas pa// de phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// mi gnas mya ngan 'das 'dir bshad// snyibarje ro gcig bsod
61b4(rgyud 'grel): nams gyur// stong nyid ro na mchog gyur pa// bdag dang gzhan don sgrub don du// gang 'thung de dag rgyas sras yin// dngos po kun gyis de la 'dud// srid pa gsum na rtag mchod 'os// sangs rgyas gdung ni 'tsho ba don du// 'jig rten 'dren pa
61b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag bzhugs// byang chub sems 'di theg chen po// mchog ni yin par bshad pa ste// mnyam par gzhag pa'i 'bad pa yis// byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis// rang dang gzhan don bsgrub don du// srid na thabs gzhan yod ma
61b6(rgyud 'grel): yin// byang chub sems ni ma gtogs pas// sangs rgyas kyis sngar thabs ma gzigs// byang chub sems paskyed tsam gyis ni// bson nams phung po gang thob pa// gal te gzugs can yin na ni// na mkha' gang ba las ni lhag/ skyes
62a1(rgyud 'grel): bu gang zhig skad cig tsam// byang chub sems ni bsgom byed pa// de yi bsod nams phung po ni// rgyal ba yis kyang daglang mi spyod// nyon mongs med pa'i rin chen sems// 'di ni nor mchog gcig pu ste// nyon mongs
62a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud sogs chom rkun gyis// gnod min phrogs par bya ba min// ji ltar 'khor bar sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam ni// mi g.yo de ltar blo nyid ni// byang chub sems gzhol rnams kyis bya// ngo mtshar gyis kyang khyed cag
62a3(rgyud 'grel): gis/ ji ltar bshad pa la 'bad kyis// de rjes kun bzang spyod pa ni// rang nyid kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur// rgyal mchog rnams kyis bstod pa yi// byang chub sems ni bstod byas pa'i// bsod nams mtshungs med deng du bdag gis thob pa gang
62a4(rgyud 'grel): yin pa// de yis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dpa' klong nang du nub pa yi// sems can rkang gnyis dbang pos bsten ma'i lam du 'gro bar shog/ byang chub sems kyis 'grel pa slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa
62a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu Na a ka ra dang / lo tsA ba ra ba zhi ba shes gnyen gyis bsgyur cing zhus/ slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka warma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba pa tsha bo nyim grags kyis
62a6(rgyud 'grel): bcos pa// / rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsi tA bi ba ra Na/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i 'grel pa bshad par bya'o//
62b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad sems kyis rnam par brtags pa'o zhes gsungs pas re shig sems ni de nyid kyi rang bzhin ci zhig zhes nges par rtog pa na// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang skye
62b2(rgyud 'grel): mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// chos bdag med par mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so// smras pa 'di yi don ci yin zhe na/ brjod pa/ dngos po dang
62b3(rgyud 'grel): bral zhes te/ dngos po'i sgras bdag la sogs pa mngon par brjod do// 'di skad du sems de ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang /
62b4(rgyud 'grel): byed po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no// ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la bya ba'i mtshan nyid can yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de nyid kyi phyir bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na/ sems de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa lta ga la
62b5(rgyud 'grel): yod ces smras par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing bdag dang 'dzin pa tsam gyis yang dag par bskyed pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad bdag tu 'dzin pas yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sems ni de'i rang bzhin
62b6(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur ro zhe na/ sems de ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir// phung po khams dong skye mched dang / gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs zhes gsungs so// 'di ltar re zhig phung po la sogs
63a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi dngos po don dam par ma dmigs na/ sems de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ji ltar zhe na/ re zhig gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dngos po rnams dngos po med pa nyid de/
63a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi phung po ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tshogs so// 'byung ba ni bzhi ste/ saM dang chu dang / me dang rlung ngo // 'byung ba las gyur pa lnga ste/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'o// sa la sogs pa
63a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba rnams dang / gzugs la sogs pa 'byung ba las gyur pa de dag re re zhing tha dad pa'i dngos po nyid du ma dmigs te/ gang du gcig tu yod pa der gzhan yang yod pa'i phyir ro// de'i phyir gzugs ni ming tsam du kun tu brtags pa'o// /
63a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi phung po ni gzugs kyi phung pos stong zhes gsungs pa las ni gzugs kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po yongs su ma grub ste/ ji lta zhe na/ tshor ba rnam gsum mo// bde ba dang / sdug
63a5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ma yin zhing bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir te/ sdug bsngal ba la bltos nas bde ba dang / bde ba la bltos nas sdug bsngal du 'dogs par byed do// chos gang zhig gcig pur
63a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa dmigs pa med pa de ni rdzas nyid du yod pa yin te/ ring po dang thung ngu bzhin no// gzhan du tshor ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'o zhes par yang re zhig lus ni gzugs kyi phung po
63b1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i phyir ma dmigs so// de'i phyir lus med pa'i phyir lus las 'byung ba'i tshor ba ma grub bo// sems kyang yul na mi gnas pa/ phyogs na mi gnas pa/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rab tu mi gnas pa/ snang
63b2(rgyud 'grel): da pa/ rnam par mi rig par gzungs na/ tshor ba de ni ci 'dra zhig de'i phyir sems las byung ba yang ma grub po// de'i phyir tshor ba'i phung po'o zhes gsungs pa las na/ tshor ba'i phung po yang yongs su ma grub bo// 'du shes kyi phung
63b3(rgyud 'grel): yang ming tsam gyis dngos po nyid de/ 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can yin la/ de ltar re zhig gang dag la mtshan mar bzung bar bya ba'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir na tshan ma med pas mtshan ma can yang yod
63b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin no// 'du shes kyi phung po ni 'du shes kyi phub phos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na 'du shes kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub po// 'du byed kyi phung po yang yongs su ma grub ste/ tshogs pa tsam gyis phyir ro// 'du
63b5(rgyud 'grel): byed kyi phung po ni tshor ba dang / sems dpa' dang 'du shes dang 'dun pa dang rig pa dang blo dang / dran pa dang yid la byed pa dang mos pa la sogs pa mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la sogs pa'i skye ba
63b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa mtshungs par mi ldan pa dag la brjod na/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang skye ba la sogs pa dag kyang re re zhing la skye ba yod pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi phung po ni las kyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir yang med pa
64a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid do// byed pa po med pa'i phyir bya ba yang dngos po med do// 'du byed kyi phung po ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i dngos pos stong ngo zhes gsungs pa las na 'du byed kyi phung po yongasu grub pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i
64a2(rgyud 'grel): phung po yang yongs su ma grub ste/ 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po nyid ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna da // lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams yon la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de dag kyang
64a3(rgyud 'grel): re re zhing rang gi ngo bo ma dmigs so// ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung zhing med na mi 'byung ste/ mig dang gzugs med na mig gi rnam par shes pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ de
64a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar na re zhig mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma grub po// tshig de nyid kyis rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang shes par bya'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yid 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
64a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos thams cad kyi rten can yin// ci ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i rkyen du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi so re zhig 'das pa ni de nyid dang / lhan cig 'gags shing ma
64a6(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa yin la/ da ltar byung ba rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig pa yang gnas pa yod pa ma yin zhes gsungs so// rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang rnam par shes pa'i phung pos stong ngo // zhes pa las na rnam
64b1(rgyud 'grel): bar shes pa'i phung po yang yongs su ma grub bo// de ltar phung po de nyid khams dang skye mched du bstan pa'i phyir logs su dag par mi bya ste/ sa bon med pas myu gu med pa bzhin du phung po rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis de
64b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang rang bzhin med par grub bo// de'i phyir sems ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mchod dang bral ba zhes bya'o// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
64b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las/ sems ni sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / btsod kha dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog dang / ring po dang / thung ngu dang / zlum po dang /
64b4(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum dang / gru bzhi lnga sogs pa'i rnam pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / ma ning gi rnam pa ma mthong ngo zhes pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po sems ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/
64b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ gzugs med po'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
64b6(rgyud 'grel): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba'i rang bzhin ma yin no// zhes pa nas rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na ma dmigs so zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so// de ltar na re zhig
65a1(rgyud 'grel): sde mas dri ni gzung ba ma yin no// ji ltar 'dzin pa yang ma yin pa de ltar brjod par bya ste/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po sems de ni nang na yang
65a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yin phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyis ka'i bar na yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// de'i phyir gang rnam pa thams
65a3(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis yongs su btsal na ma dmigs pa de ji ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yin par 'gyur/ de ltar na sems dri na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba zhes bya'o// chos bdag med par mnyam pa nyid pas zhes
65a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa thams cad bdag med pa de bzhin du/ sems de yang ngo // de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad stong pa de bzhin du/ sems kyang stong pa'i mtshan nyid do// chos thams
65a5(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag med pa de bzhin du sems de yang bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par dben pa ste/ de bzhin du sems de yang rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid do// de'i phyir chos bdag med
65a6(rgyud 'grel): par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems de mnyam pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi sems gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o// de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni nam mkha'i
65b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin no// de skad du'ang nam mkha' stong pa'o// chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// byang chub kyang de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so// de bzhin du nam mkha' rang bzhin med pa'i ming tsam mo//
65b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du sems kyang rang bzhin med pa'i ming tsam yin/ gang yang sems ma skyes ma 'gag par khong du chud pa de ni byang chub bo// de skad du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub gang zhe na/ gang sems kyi yang
65b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su sheb ste/ de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// gsong ba'i bdag po phra ba yang yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs pa med po des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par
65b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub zhes brjod do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ rtogs pa po dang rtogs par bya ba 'ga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid
65b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs so// de phyir gang zhig rang gi sems yang chu dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma rig pa de la brtse ba'i thabs kyis/ kye mu kyi hud sems can 'di dge sdug bsngal ba/ 'di dag ni rang gi sems kyi chos nyid
65b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa phyin ci log gi gdon gyis bzung ba/ 'khor ba na sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams su myong ba yin zhing / ji ltar de dag rang gi sems kyi chos nyid kyi rang
66a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag gis 'bad par bya'o zhes sems can la dmigs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// gang snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub
66a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems dang / sems can+da thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la dade ba'i sems da / bla na med pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad
66a3(rgyud 'grel): brten nas skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sem we bya'o// byang chub sems kyi 'grel pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
66a4(rgyud 'grel): tshor pati ti lo thod rgyal rlo'o khu mdo rje 'bar gyis bar /
67a1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa lnga pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa bzhugs so//
67b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bany+tsa krA ma/ bod skad du/ rim pa lnga pA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// dpal ldan pade chen la btud de// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi che
67b2(rgyud 'grel): 'brangs nas// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim bshad bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa la legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'drod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa//
67b3(rgyud 'grel): rlung zhes bya ba las kuni byed// 'di ni rnam shes gzhon pa ste// lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// rlung gi de nyid rim gyis no// sngags kyi de nyid yang dag 'jug/ sngags kyi dmigs pa rtogs nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa rnams la slobs// rdo rje bzlas gnas
67b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa// sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// sgyu ma lte bu'i ting 'dzin gnos// yang dag mtha' ni rnam par sbyangs// yang dag mtha' las langs nas ni// gnyis med ye shes 'thob par 'gyur// bzung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas nas//
67b5(rgyud 'grel): slar zhing gang la'ang mi slob po// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'ang de// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// thams cad mkhyen par de nas 'gyur// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i srid gsum ni// 'od gsal
67b6(rgyud 'grel): bas ni rnam dag pas// skad cig de la ma lus mthong // dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud du ni// de nyid 'di dag rgyas btab gnas// bshad pa'i rgyud kyis rjes 'brangs nas// bla ma'i kha las rtogs par bya// de la dang po kho nar rlung gi de kho na nyid
68a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i tshig rtsu ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste/ sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs krar la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis brtags pa yis// ye shes mchog gi gnas bsgom mo// rin chen kha
68a2(rgyud 'grel): dog sna lnga pa// yungs kar gyis ni 'bru chod tsam// sna yi rtse mor non tan du// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o// rdo rje 'tshig 'di'i bshad pa// lha mo bzhis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i bshad
68a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyud lngas// snying po las ni snying po mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// gang de thams cad bdag nyid gnas// de ni lha mo bshad par bya// ye shes lnga yis dngos de nyid// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru chod tsam// de yi dbus na
68a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i lha// mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can zhes gsungs pa dang / gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las kyang don 'odadi nyid gsal bar gsungs te/ ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs// 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gong bu'i
68a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyang phyung nas ni/ sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya bar bshad// rang sngags snying gar bsams nas ni// srog ni thig ler gnas par bzhag ces gsungs pa dang // 'di nyid
68a6(rgyud 'grel): yang slar bshad pa// rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya bshad pa'i spyad las// sna rtser yungs kar zhes bya ba// srog dang rtsol ba'i rtags pa ste// srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa// 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnamasu bsgom// steng gi sna las nges byung ba//
68b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyis ka dang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur// nang gi dus ni yin par bshad// lkog ma snying ga lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro 'ong ston// thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu// go rim ji bzhin gnas par
68b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// 9yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar zhi pa gsal ba 'di// pa dra mgon po'i rgya ba'o// g.yon pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// ljang ser dag
68b3(rgyud 'grel): tu snang ba ste// las kyi mngon po'i sgrub 'o// gnyis na las ni byung ba'i khams// mdangs chen kha dog ser po ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag cing
68b4(rgyud 'grel): shel ltar snang ba ni// chu yi dkyil 'o/ wang nyid yin te// rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung // bya ba kun la 'jug pa po// 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste// 'chi ba'i lus las 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid gsal
68b5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor byis pa'i yul min zhing // rtog ge pa yi mi shes so// de ltar rlung gi de kho na nyid bstan nas// da ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid ston pa'i tshogs rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid la 'jug par bya ste// de
68b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun tu skul bar byed pa/ zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las tshig gis lam nges par brjod
69a1(rgyud 'grel): bas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsungs so// oM AHhUM// don rtogs pa yis bzlas pa ni// ngo bo nyid med bzang po las// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis brtags pa// rdo rje bzlas par de bshad//
69a2(rgyud 'grel): slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te// ma bslabs pa la'ang cha shas mo bya// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// bshad pa 'di nyid slor bshad pa// dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa
69a3(rgyud 'grel): de la 'jug par bya ste/ de nas dpal ldan snang mdzad che// khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa// sems can thams cad skyed pa po// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// de bas dngos po med gyur kyang // srid pa dag tu rab tu//
69a4(rgyud 'grel): grags// byang chubo sems ni na mkha' mnyam pa// legs pa rje su myong mdzud pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// skye bo mchog la de bstan gsol// sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig/ shes nas rgyud rnams 'chad par byed//
69a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar bo dag ni slob dpon zhes// ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur// bdog gi tshig na 'di nyid dag/ yin zhes smra zhing byis pa 'jig/ de ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems// ji bzhin don du mi sheso// de nas bdag po bcom ldan
69a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das// rnam par mdzad thub chen gyis// legs zhes lan gsum gsungs mdzad nas// lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs// me tog don gyis de nyid ni// rab tu phye nas bshad par bya// brjod dang dmigs par bcas pa dang /
69b1(rgyud 'grel): brdang gyur dang ni don dram mo// tshig gi brjod pa thun mong ste// dmigs par bcas pa sangs rgyas nyid// sngags kyi de nyid brda ru bshad// don dam de bzhin nyid yin no// dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na// gang zhig bcu yis ma gcings
69b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'di nyid bcings med ces bya ste// de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas// dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge ste// grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa// as bcings phan tshun yang dag sbyor// gang gis shes de 'gro ba'i bla// 'byung ba'i mtha' dra
69b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan// cha la sogs po bcu drug gnas// lnga pa lnga dang yang dgu ldan// bzhi ni gsum na nges par sbyar// yi ge AM bcas ring por bcas// ston sbyor sogs phyis dang mtshungs// thung ngu ma lus dag du 'gyur// gcig min
69b4(rgyud 'grel): du ma ma yin no// yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad pa// gang yang mngon par phyogs pa rnams// bud med skyes pa mya ning ste// khams la sogs par rab tu brtag/ 'og dang steng du bcas pa ni// shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar// brjod
69b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi ni sngags 'di dag/ dngos med ngo bo las byung ba'o// de ni yongasu gyur pa'i gzugs// lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang // de ni nye bar dmigs pa'o// brda ni de nyid gsum gnas pa// rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do// a yig
69b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i ye shes ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por gyur// oM gyis sems can yang dag sdud// sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag/ hUM gis sems can yang dag spro// sangs rgyas thugasu rab tu brtag/ AHni gnas par gyur
70a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// sas rgyas gsung du rab tu bar+t+tag/ 'jug pa nyid dang gnas pa dang // ldab pa yi ni rim gyis kyang // shes rab thabs kyi bzhir gnas te// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// gos dkar la sogs
70a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas bshad pa// brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga// bzhi po leg par bsdus pini// sbyor bzhi bsdus pa brgya grag das/ dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis ni// de ni so sor 'byung ba las// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// nang gi dus 'di nyid
70a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rig pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// thun mtshams bzhi ni rab sbyor bas// grangs 'bum gyi ni mtshan nyid can// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas/ zhes gsungs pa dang / bsgom
70a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi ni/ ra chad can// rnal 'byor phyi rol bzlas pa spangs// sngags don bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje bdag nyid ji ltar bzlas// blangs po sngon du rnyed gyur nas// glang po'i rjes ni tshol byed ltar// sngags lus rang nyid mngon gyur nas//
70a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag jig tshol byed dam// gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig/ sbyor ba gsum dang ldan pa yi// spyan drangs gshegasu gsol gyur dang / de bzhin bzhugasu gsol pa yang // bzhugs pa yis ni spyan drangs te// myur ba yis ni gshe
70a6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// gnyis ka yin pas bzhugasu gsol// sna tshogs gnas grub bla med pa'o// skyur po dang ni rnam bsdus dang // dal ba can dang sngags sbyor ba// bla mas slob ma'i rna drung du// rab tu 'bad de bshad par bya// de nas rnal 'byor
70b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug gis// thabs kyi dam pa bstan pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba'i// gsang ba'i yi ge bshad par bya// gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor can la mchog ster gyur// dang po'i yi ge sbyor ba yi// rtag
70b2(rgyud 'grel): tu dbugs ni rngub par bya// brgyad pa'i mtha' dang ldan pa yi// yi ge u ni thig ler bcas// rnal 'byor pa ni dbugs stong byed// 'di ni ci dga'i bzlas par bshad// khri phrag gnyis dang tshig stong dang // de bzhin du ni brgya phrag drug/
70b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dbang po nyin mtshan gyi// bzlas brjod kyi ni grangs byed do// de 'dir gsang zhing dgongs pa yis// phra mo'i sbyor bar bshad pa yin// klog dang kha ton med mod kyi// 'on kyang bzlas par bshad pa ni// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni
70b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga ji bzhin brten bya zhing / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bas na gnyisu med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang // mnyam med sngags ni
70b5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas su// sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgrub// de yis zla ba gcig gis ni// khams gsum 'grub par gdon mi za// rnam shes las ni 'byung ba'i sngags// mtshan nyid drug ldan 'das nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag
70b6(rgyud 'grel): byas na// zla ba nya la de 'grub 'gyur// de la brtul zhugs bshad pa med// phreng ba mi dgos sngags mi dgos// gzung dang sbyin sreg las rnams dag/ gcig nas gcig tu log par 'gyur// yaM'i don gyis gang ci'ang rung // dngos grub
71a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas bya ba ni// ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis// 'gro ba'i don la 'jug par byaM// me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu stegs so skye'i dkyil 'khor du// thun ni phyed phyed dus su ni// las ni gnyis
71a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gnas par 'gyur// mchod la brtson pas mchod par 'gyur// bzlas la brtson pas rnam par dag/ mo la sbyin sgeg de rtson pas 'byod// bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa 'thog/ sdigs pas de ltar shes nas ni// 'gro na byis
71a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du spyod// des ni mi rtog chos can gyis// gsang sngags rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje bsgrub po ste// 'di ni sngags kyi de nyid gsapa// ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba yis// sems can la ni nges par sbyar// tham
71a4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas sto tsan dad pa med// sngags kyi rlom zhing blugs bem mthong bas khengs// dad pa med cing dbang skur dman pa laM// gtam gyi rim pa'ang de la brjod mi bya// gang zhig bla ma la gus dang dang ldan// mos bsdu bsnyen bkur la ni
71a5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu// pa 'dzin gang slob ma'i dam pa yis// de la bla ma'i sprin sbyin brtag mi dgos// ri dang rtse nas 'ga' zhig ltung gyur na// ltung bar mi bya snyam yang ltung bar 'gyur// bla ma'i drin gyis phan pa'i lung thob ni// grol
71a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur snyam yang grol bar 'gyur// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa ste slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa dang po'o// / phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal
71b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal 'dud// ji ltar bstod cing phyag 'tshal pa// gang la bstod cing gang gis bstod// ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du// rang gis rang gis ye shes ni// legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin//
71b2(rgyud 'grel): 'on kyang kun mkhyen ma thob par// de ni nye bar dmigs mi 'gyur// mun nag rab rib kyis khebs pa// drin gyis snang ba thob par 'gyur// steng nyid shin tu stong pa dang // gsum pa chen po stong pa dang // bzhi pa thams cad stong pa ni//
71b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag go/ shes rab thabs su sbyor ba las// rdzogs par nye bar thob par 'gyur// rdzogs par nye bar thob gyur nas// thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba// rgyu yi rim pa rnam dag pa// rnam shes gsum po sbyor bas/
71b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / stong pa gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas// bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur// snang ba stong pa shes rab dang // sems dang gzhan gyi dbang dag ste// de yi rang bzhin 'phro gsal ba// de ni rab tu bshad par bya// chags bral dang ni bar mo nyid//
71b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du ni chen po dag/ yid la 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang // mya ngan la sogs gsum de bzhin// zhi dang rnam rtog 'jigs pa dang // 'jigs pa bar dang shin tu 'jigs// sred dang sred pa bar ma dang // shin tu sred dang nyer len pa// mi dge
71b6(rgyud 'grel): bkres dang skom nyid dang // tshor dang tshor ba bar ma dang // shin tu tshor ba'i skad cig dang // rig pa po dang rig 'dzin gzhi// so sor rtogs dang ngo tsha shes// snying rje dang ni brtse ba gsum// dogs dang bsam pa nyid dang ni// phrag dog ces ni bya/
72a1(rgyud 'grel): bar grags// rang bzhin sum cu rtswa gsum gang // lus can rnams kyi rang rig ste// kun rdzog gsal ba'i gzugs kyis ni// mtshan mo'i ming du nges par bshad// de bzhin bud med ming du brjod// 'jam po lta bung
72a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin// g.yon pa'i ming yang de nyid de// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma nan// brtan par bya ba'i rgyur gyur pa// dang po yi ge thig ler bcas// zla ba'i 'od zer ltar snang zhi'o// snang ba'i ye shes yang dag 'byung // shin tu sbyong ba thabs ldan pa//
72a3(rgyud 'grel): snang ba mchad pa zhes brjod de// de bzhin du ni kun rtags dang // de bzhin sems las byung bar bshad// chags dang zhen dang de bzhin dga'// dga' ba bar ma shin tu dga'// rangs dang rab tu mgu ba dang // ngo mtshar de bzhin dgos pa dang /
72a4(rgyud 'grel): tshim dang de bzhin 'khyud pa dang // 'o byed de bzhin 'jib pa dang // brtan dang brtson dang nga rgyal dang // bya dang 'phrog dang stobs dang ni// spro dang lhan cig skyes nyid dang // de bzhin lhan skyes par ma dang // shin tu lhan cig skyes dang grags
72a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sgeg dang zhes 'grus nyid// dge dang tshig gsal bden pa dang // mi bden pa dang de bzhin nges// nye bar mi len sbyin pa'o// skul dang de bzhin dpa' bo dang // ngo tsha med dang sgyu dang gdug/ mi srun pa dang gya gyu nyid//
72a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid bzhi bcu gang yin pa// shin tu stong pa'i skad cig ste// nyin mo skyes pa'i ming dang ni// rtsub mo g.yas par bstan po yin// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ming dang ni// de bzhin du ni rdo rje'i ming // thig le gnyis kyi brgyan pa
72b1(rgyud 'grel): cha ru de nyid shes par bya// nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra ba yang // sgrub ba mched pa'i sbyor las byung // snang ba thob pa dag dang ni// skye bar thob pa de bzhin te// yongasu grub pa nyid dang ni// ma rig pa ni nyid ces bya// stong pa chen po'i tshig gis ni/
72b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs 'di dag rgyal bas gsungs// chags bri bar ma'i skad cig dang // brjes ngan pa dang 'khrul pa dang // mi smra gyur dang skyo ba dang // le lo de bzhin the tsom ste// ma rig skad cig bdun po ni// phra mo'i rnal 'byor pas shes bya// sa bon
72b3(rgyud 'grel): le ldan min la// rlung gi sgo nas 'byung ba min/ gang zhig snang ba thob pa ni// yongs rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid do// rang bzhin phra ba brgya dang ni// drug cu tham pa 'di dag nyid// rlung gi bzhon pa'i rgyu yis ni// nyin dang mtshan du byung ba yin//
72b4(rgyud 'grel): skad cig theng cig yud tsa ma dang // mig btsums de bzhin thal mo ste// skad cig se gol gtogs par bshad// thang cig yungs kar bskor ba dang // yud tsam dbugs rngub 'byung ba tsam// mig btsum mig ni btsums pa'i bar// thal ma
72b5(rgyud 'grel): lag gnyis brdabs pa ste// skad cig la sogs mtshan nyid do// rang rig tsam gyis ye shes ni// nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid med// 'on kyang de yi dbye yod de// mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams bdag nyid// snang dang snang ba mched pa dang // de bzhin
72b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba nyer thob dang // sems ni rnam pa gsum bshad nas// de yi sgrub pa brjod par bya// rlung rnams phra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// shes dang yang dag 'dres gyur nas// dbang po'i lam nas 'byung nas ni// lu rnams la ni dmigs par byed//
73a1(rgyud 'grel): gang che snang ba ldan gyur cing // rlung ni bzhon pa nyid gyur pa// de tshe rang bzhin de dag kun// ma sus lus pa med par 'byung // rlung ni gang dang gar gnas pa// rang bzhin de dang de 'byung 'gyur// ji srid rlung ni mi rgyu dang //
73a2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba mi g.yo bar gyur pa// snang ba gnyis kyi rgyur gyur pas// bdag gis dngos po rnam par brtag/ ji ltar snang ba thob pa ltar// gnyi ga'i yan lag nyid du 'gyur// sgyu ma drag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags// /
73a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni// gsal bar 'di las mtshon par 'gyur// 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral dang // de yi bar de gsum po ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje pad+ma 'dus las so// ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor
73a4(rgyud 'grel): las// snyoms par 'jug par bshad pa yin// ye shes gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor dang // ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis// 'bad pas ye shes gang thob pa// de ni snang ba thob pa'o// gang zhig chu skyes rdo rje sbyor// kun rdzob tu yang med gyur na//
73a5(rgyud 'grel): lan cig tsam zhig myong nas kyang // rnal 'byor stobs kyis 'grub par 'gyur// ye shes 'jug pa'i ngo bo yis// dbye ba ji bzhin shes byas la// rang bzhin de nyid slar yang ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas mtshon bya// ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs/
73a6(rgyud 'grel): shing // mdog dang dbyibs ni tha dad pa// na mkha'i dbyingasu byung nas ni// de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur// de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad ni// snang ba gsum gyi rgyu can te// ma lus yul la zhugs nas ni// 'od gsal bar ni zhugs par
73b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de 'dra'i rang bzhin ma shes pas// mi shes mun pas khebs pa ni// dge dang mi dge'i las byas nas// 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur// mtshams med la sogs byas nas ni// dmyal la sogs par 'tshed par byed// sbyin sogs
73b2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba byas nas ni// mtho ris la sogs dag tu mchod// skye ba dpag med stong phrag ni// 'dir ni yang dang yang 'thob pa// 'dir ni sngon las rnam smin zhes// rmongs pa rnams ni mya ngan byed// rong bzhin snang ba'i tshul gyis ni// gang gis skye bo
73b3(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa// de nyid shes nas ye shes can// srid pa'i gzeb las rnam grol 'gyur// shes rab ngo bo nyid 'di ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag// sems nyid rang gis mthong 'gyur te// rang nyid zla ba'i gzugs bzhin no// de nas zlo ba la
73b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa// rdo rje'i mtshan mar rab tu brtapa// 'di ni rdo rje las byung ba'i// rnal 'byor pa yi thab su bshad// zla ba rdo rje sogs mnyal sbyor// sems dang sems byung 'dus pa ste// shes rab thabasu 'dus pa las// !yi gzugs ni 'byung bar
73b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab cing // lha yi nga rgyal 'chang byed de// bskyed pa'i rim dang ldan par ni// sngags pa rtag tu spyod par 'gyur// ji skad dpal ldan 'dus sogs par// de dang der ni rgyas gsungs pa'i// ji srid sgom la sbyor
73b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// de srid dang po'i las can yin// da ni yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor gyi// gsal ba ru ni bshad bya ste// stong pa gsum gyi rnam dag gang // 'od gsal bar ni 'dir bshad// thams cad stong par de brjod de// ye shes gsum ni rnam dag
74a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ye shes dag nas de nyid rtogs// thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med// 'gyur ba med cing snang ba med// gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid// yod dang de bzhin med pa dang // de ni tshig gi spyod yul min// de nas 'od gsal
74a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa la// ye shes gsum ni 'byung 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gyur// rnam pa kun tu mchog ldan pa'i// thams cad mkhyen par de nas 'gyur// de skad du rgya che rol pa'i mdo las// shAkya
74a3(rgyud 'grel): thub pa de bzhin gshegs// mngon par byang chub 'di bzhed nas// stong pa chen po sangs rgyas nyid// thob par bya zhes mngon par dgongs// nai rany+dza na'i chu 'gram du// mi g.yo'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs la// de'i tshe rgyal ba mkha' rdo rje// til gyi gang
74a4(rgyud 'grel): bu klung bzhin bzhugs// rgyal ba'i sras lo se gol btogs// de la dbyangs gcig gis gsungs pa// bsdam gtan 'di ni rnam dag min// 'di ni mthar thug mi 'thob ste// na mkha'i ngos lhur mchog gyur pa/ 'od gsalnga ba ni de dmigs shing //
74a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal ba yau granas thob nas// rab dga'i gzugasu skye bar 'gyur// de tshe rab dga'i rdo rje'i sku// kun gyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur// 'di ltar sgra de gsan pa dang // de nas ting 'dzin mi g.yo btang // 'di ltar nam phyed dus su ni// rgyal
74a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sras kyi de nyid dmigs// sku ni drang po ma yin zhing // mi drang ba yang ma yin la// dbugs gtong ba dang rngub pa ni// gsung ba ma yin mi gsung min// spyan bzang btsums pa ma yin zhing // spyan phye ba yang ma yin pas// thams cad stong pa
74b1(rgyud 'grel): rmad chen po// dang zhing gsal ba'i ye shes che// bla mA nyid kyi drin gyis ni// de nas de ni gsal mthong gyur// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i srid pa gsum// skad cig de la ma lus mthong // 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag 'chang // rdo rje
74b2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// skya red 'char ba'i dus su ni// chu zla dang ni smig rgyu sogs// sgyu ma'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// byang chub snying por bzhugs nas ni// de ni bdud rnams bcom par mdzad// shAkya mgon pos yang dag pa'i// yi
74b3(rgyud 'grel): shes bla med legs thob nas// 'gro ba gsum la phan pa'i phyir// de nyid 'dir ni ston par mdzad// mngon par byang chub ston pa ni// de nyid ye shes shes byar bshad// mtshams med lnga yi las can dang // mi gang bsod nams dman pas kyang
74b4(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin nor dang 'dra ba gzhan// bla ma'i drin gyis thob par 'gyur// spyod pa ci dga' spyod byed de// 'di ni ma 'ongs rdzogs sangs rgyas// chags min chags dang bral ba min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmig so// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar
74b5(rgyud 'grel): yang ni mi dmigaso// sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyam sbyor ba// 'di nyid lhar ni rab ston te// ye shes gsum bral de nyid gang // dgongs pa yis ni gsungs pa yin// de bzhin dpal ldan gsang 'dus kyi// byang chub sems kyi le'u las// dngos med
74b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs tshig bshad kyis// mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid gsungs// 'dod chags la sogs rnam dag gang // dpal mchog las kyang gsungs pa yin// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pas kyang // thams cad stong par gsungs pa yin//
75a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mdo dang rgyud las ni// de nyid gang zhig nyer bstan pa// thams cad stong gnas 'di nyid las// der ni gzhan dgra ma gsungs// chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong ni// thub pa chen pos gsungs pa las// /
75a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid ni// snying po lus ni snying por gsungs// ral pa gcer bu mgo reg gam// cod pan 'dus pa spong 'jug ste// sna tshogs rtags can de dag ni// mngon par byang chub 'dod pa rnams// de nyid dman
75a3(rgyud 'grel): pa de rnams kyis// brtul zhugs spyod pa la sogs rim// de nyid ye shes dman pas ni// des ni grol ba rnyed mi 'gyur// dang po las kyi sbyor ba yis// sa brgyad pa ni thob par 'gyur// snang ba gsum pas mthong ba dang // /
75a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas// mngon par byang chub legs thob nas// gtsang ma'i gnasu nye bar 'gro/ sangs rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pas// tshe 'di nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen// chos 'byung mngon par byang chub pa'i//
75a5(rgyud 'grel): chags so kas rol mo rgya chen po// chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa// ji ltar rnyed pa'i spyod pas so// mngon par rtogs pa gang 'byung ba// bla med mngon par byang chub pa// spros bcas la sogs spyod pa yis// rnal
75a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa ni 'dir slob po// gzod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin can// ngo bo nyid kyis de grub na// bslab pa'i sbyor ba ci zhig bya// rtogs las de bzhin nyid mi skye// gong zhig de ltar 'dir rtogs na// ye shes rim pa spangs pa nyid//
75b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi dbya ba mi shes pas// slar yang slob par 'gyur ba yin// rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye shes shing // de nyid bzhi bya lta brten kyang // gang zhig rnams gsum mi slob na// des ni 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// ji ltar shing la mi gnas pa//
75b2(rgyud 'grel): ma bdu mos par ni 'byung mi 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub bslab bral bas// tshe 'di nyid la 'o byung mi 'gyur// gang zhig yo sgyu'i blo can ye lo can dag dang // bla ma lnga spyod dbang bskur thob ces rlom sems 'gyur// blo dman sems ldan kun
75b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen yang dag thob mi 'gyur// nyon mongs bla mo'i skyon rnams mthong gi yon tan min// bsnyen bkur med par myur du de nyid thob par 'dod// yang dag tshig ma yin zhes khro bcas g.yo bar 'gyur// tshogs nang bla ma mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs
75b4(rgyud 'grel): par bye// de nas de ni dben par song nas phyag byed 'gyur// de ltar rang bzhin ngan gyur dman pa'i slob ma ni// rang gi slob bu yin yang gzhan bzhin yongasu spangs// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mchog las skyes gyur pa'ang // brtan pas na mo
75b5(rgyud 'grel): yang de nas drung du bzhag myi bya// yon tan mchog ldan ye shes brtson par bcas pa dang // yang na bla ma la gus sangs rgyas dang mnyam lta// rgyal ba'i chos rnams rtogs shing bstan la shin tu dang // de 'dir snod gyur yin phyir de la drin
75b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bya/ smad mdo rab tu thos shing lung la legs sbyangs kyang // bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dman phyir lung thob ma gyur pa// de ni bdag phan tsam la 'ang dbang med bstan pa'i mchu// de yi bsten bcos skyo ba'i rgyu tsam 'ba' zhig yin// skal ldan
76a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cing de nyid man ngag thob gyur kyang // gang zhig blo gros blun min don ni sbyor nus pa// gzhan don bya ba'i blo yis ston pa rab tu 'jug/ tshig gi yon tan med na da yang brnyas bcas 'gyur// rgyud mang thos shing
76a2(rgyud 'grel): shes ldan gnas drug shes pa dang // dran dang blo gros brtan blo brtson pa phun tshogs ldan// bla mo'i zhabs bkur bcas shing de nyid lung thob pa// rgyud rgyal man ngag de la bstan par 'os pa yin// 'phags pa rdo rje'i drin gyis rgyud rnams
76a3(rgyud 'grel): mang po thos// gsal ba rnam spras tshig gis byang chub lam ni rnam phye bas// shAkya bshes gnyen gyis ni dge ba gang bsags des// mkhas shing gsal ba'i rnam smin byang chub snod gyur shog/ ming gi khyad par gzhan yang bla na med pa'i
76a4(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa zhes bya ba thams cad dag cing rnam par dag pa'i rim po slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa ste rim pa gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje can rnams kun gyi gtso// rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal te// bdag
76a5(rgyud 'grel): la byin gyis brlab pa nyid// brtse bas bdag gis bshad par bya// de la dang por bskyed pa'i rje su 'brang bas dbang bskur ba thob cing // rgyud rnam pa bzhi'i dgongs pa shes pa/ shes rab dang ldan zhing lus dang / ngag dang / yi rnam par
76a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon pa'i thos pa 'dzin pa/ bden pa rnam pa gnyis la lhag por mos pas// rdo rje slob dpon yang dag par mnyes par byas te/ de'i 'og tu bla ma mnyes par gyur nas tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po byas la lo bcu drug ma rdo rje slob dpon
76b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po la phul te// de'i 'og tu bla ma'i zhal snga nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag thob nas/ de'i 'og tu phyeng ba dang chu dang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang rdo rje dang dril bu sbyin pa dang me long dang ming dang slob dpon dang rjes
76b2(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba ste/ de drag dang bcas par gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob nas// bstod pa 'dis bla ma la bstod par bya'o// khong stong khyod kyi sku la med// sha dang rus pa khrag med kyang // na mkha' l-i ni 'ja' tshon ltar// khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad// /
76b3(rgyud 'grel): sku la bsnyun med mi gtsang med// bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang // khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir// 'jig rten bya ba ston par mdzad// chu zla bzhin du gzung du med// chos rnams kun la gnas pa med// nga rgyal mod cing rmongs mi mnga'//
76b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// gshegs dang bzhugs dang de bzhin gzims// spyod lam dag ni thams cad du// khyed ni rtag tu mnyam 'jog pa// mi dmigs khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdzu 'phrul che la rnam
76b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul zhing // sna tshogs min la snyoms 'jug pa// dmi gos med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de ltar rdo rje slob dpon la yang dag pa'i bstod pas bstod nas tshigasu bcad pa 'dis mnyan par bya ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya'o// kun mkhyen ye shes
76b6(rgyud 'grel): phung po can// srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam sbyong ba// de ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis// gtso bos bdag la bka' drid stsol// khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni// gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis// 'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis// de bas blo mchog
77a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par mdzod// de ltar 'dzags med gsol 'debs pa'i// tshig dag thos par gyur nas ni// snying rje slob ma la bskyed de// de nas bdag la byin brlabs brtsam// bdag byin brlabs pa'i rim zhes pa// kun
77a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzob bden pa bstan pa ste// de ni bla ma'i drin dag gis// 'thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim// gang gis rnyed par ma gyur pas// mdo sde rgyud dang rtog pa la// dri yi dal ba don med 'gyur// bdag la
77a3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlab rim thob pa'i// gtso bo sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas ni// the tshom med par thob par 'gyur// bdag byin brlab pa'i ting 'dzin dang // de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi gnas// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i khyad par
77a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis// bden pa gnyisu bstan pa yin// bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis no// 'od gsal ba ni thob par 'gyur// de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dang por bdag la byin brlab bstan// 'gro kun rang dbang med pa ste// rang dbang du ni 'byung
77a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yin// de yi rgyu ni 'od gsal ba// 'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o// sems gang gis ni byis pa rnams// 'khor bar 'ching bas bcing gyur pa// sems de nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa// bde gshegs gnasu 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir
77a6(rgyud 'grel): ni gang yang skye ba med// gang yang 'chi ba yod ma yin// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam gnas par// 'khor ba nyid ni shes par bya// rlung gi sbyor ba med par ni// sems kyi rang bzhin rgyur gyur pa// las dang skye ba kun tu 'byung // de nyid rlung dang
77b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan// rnam shes gsum po slar yang ni// rnal 'byor pa yi lus su 'byung // sgyu ma'i lus zhes de la bshad// de bas 'di ltar 'gro ba kun// sgyu ma lta bur 'dir bshad de// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas// thams cad de dang
77b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dra bar mthong // gzugs dang tshor ba nyid dang ni// 'du shes dang ni 'du byed rnams// lnga pa rnam par shes pa dang // de bzhin khams ni bzhi po dang // mi ga la sogs dang yul rnams nyid// shes pa lnga po nyid dag ste// phyi dang nang du
77b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam phye ba// thams cad sgyu ma las gzhan min// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan brnyan gyis// sgyu ma'i lus ni shes par bya// kha drog rnams ni 'ja' lta bu// khyab pa chu yi zla bas so// dngos dang dngos min las grol ba// rdo rje sems
77b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' legs bris pa// me long dri ma med pa la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang dang mtshungs// rnam pa kun gyis mchog ldan pa'i// sku ni blta bas mi ngoms pa// slob ma bzang po de la bstan// bdag byin brlab ces de
77b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad do// sgyu mar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// 'di nyid nye bar mtshon pa ste// kun rdzob bden pa'i sgyu ma nyid// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang de// de nyid dri za'i sems can gyur// rdo rje'i sku yang de nyid yin// rdo rje sems dpa'
77b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid de// de bas bdag nyid mchod la 'jug/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyid// de bas kun nas 'bad pa yis// bdag nyid rtag tu mchod par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba
78a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs rnam rtogs dang // sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs kun// rtag tu sgyu ma bzhin du bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang // dgug sogs gang yang rung bkun
78a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i gzhu dang mtshungs par bya// sgeg dang nye bar longs spyod dang // glu dang rol mo sogs bsten dang // sgyu rtsol rnams la rab 'jug pa// chu zla dag dang mtshungs par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya nyid dag la// mig laM
78a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa 'jug 'gyur ba// sgyu mi lta bur nye bar brtag/ rdo rje theg pa de nyid du// 'dir ni mang du bshad ci dgos// rnal 'byor pas ni gang gang dmigs// de de sgyu ma bzhin du brtag/ me long gi ni gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam sgyu ma chu bur
78a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / mig 'phrul mtshungs par gang gis mthong // de ni gtso bo yin par bshad// mthong ba dang ni rigs pa nyid// 'gro po sgyu ma ji bzhin te// dmigs med kun rdzob dag tu ni// sgyu ma lta bur rab tu bshad// dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur
78a5(rgyud 'grel): de dang de yi ngo bor bya// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// kun tu kun nas thams cad dang // bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub ni// rang nyid kyis ni de mthong 'gyur//
78a6(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo bde ba kun rang bzhin// sems dpa' chen po 'gro dang bzhugs// gnas dang zas dang gos la sogs// mkha' la skad cig dag gis rnyed// srid pa gcod par 'gyur ba dang // 'gro la rab mchog ston par 'gyur// lha dang
78b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa kun gyis mchod// yang dang yang du phyag byed 'gyur// ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas gshegs// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po ni// sna tshogs ye shes rje su sdud// rdo rje sems dpa'
78b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pas ni// bsgrub par mi bya ci yang med// bde chen phyag rgya chen po ni// rang nyid rjesu bsgrub par 'gyur// las dang nyon mongs las can lus// byed pa po dang 'bras bu nyid// smig rgyu rmi lam lta bu dang // dri za'i grong khyer dag dang
78b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs// 'di 'dri'i ting 'dzin mi shes pas// dngos po la ni nyer dmigs te// 'dod chags sna tshogs skyes pa rnams// de dag sgyu ma'i sman gyi gso// bdag byin brlab pa'i man ngag dag/ gang gis bla ma las ma bsgrub// rtag dang
78b4(rgyud 'grel): chad pa la dmigs pas// mi de phyir ldog 'gyur ba yin// mchod pa thams cad spangs nas ni// bla mo la mchod nga yang dag rtsom// de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i// ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur// bla med byed pa slob
78b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyi// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod byas nas// de yi bsod nams ma byas ci// dka' thub ma bstan gang zhig yod// de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis// shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang // shin tu khyad par can nyid de// de dang de ni bla ma sbyin// slob
78b6(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis ni sdig pa 'phrog/ slob dpon gyis ni 'jig pa sel// slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi// rgya mtsho'i 'jig las pha rol sgrol// gang zhig nga rgyal gyis sngags shing // yang dag rim pa sun 'byin dang // de nyid chos la brnyes bcad
79a1(rgyud 'grel): pa// de las de nyid bstan mi b+h+ya// zlu ma la gus bden par smra// rnam par mkhas shing rgyud cig pa// dam tshig spyod pa bsrung ba dag/ rim pa dA la bstan par bya// bdag la dz+nyAn gyis brlab pa'i rim pa srung
79a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal sna nas mdzad pa ste rim paM gsum pa'o// / thams cad stong pa nyid ston pas// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas te// bzhi pa mngon par byang chub pa'i// rim 'dri bdag gis bshad par
79a3(rgyud 'grel): bya// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu bdag nyid che ba'i lha// man ngag rnams ni rab ster bas// rdo rje slob dpon de bas lhag/ de ni yang dag mnyes byas te// lo 'am yang na zla ba la// bla ma den mnyes byas la// ci nus
79a4(rgyud 'grel): bos ni mchod par bya// ci 'byor pa yi phyag rgya ni// legs par bslabs la dbul bya zhing // tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// cho ga ji bzhin mchod par bya// de nas 'dod yon lnga spyod pas// rnal 'byor chen po mnyes gyur te//
79a5(rgyud 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa'i cho ga yis// snang ba dog ni bskyed par bya// byang chub sems ni rab 'bad pas// ka la sha sogs dag tu bzhag/ skyob ma bzang la bla mo yis// brtse bas nam phyod dus dbang bskur// dbang bskur yang dag thob
79a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// tho rangs kyi ni dus su yang // slob mas thal sbyar bla mo la// mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya// khams gsum las ni rnam grol zhing // nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur la// 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos po// dmigs med/
79b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la phyag 'tshal// phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams la mi brten cing // phyin ci log las rnam grol ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam rtog med cing kun rtog med// thugs ni rab tu mi gnas pa// bsam
79b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa yi thugs// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar na mkha' gnas med cing // spros med gos pa med par lhur// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// thams cad stong pa'i rang
79b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can// mngon par byang chub lta bar 'tshal// slob mas thal sbyar bla ma la// bstod nas slar yang bskul bar bya// las dang skye las rnam grol zhing // snang ba gsum po spangs pa yi// mngon par byang chub mthong ba ni// mgon po chen po
79b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// slob dpon chen po bdag 'tshalo// thog mtha' med cing zhi ba dang // nyon mongs thams cad rnam spong zhing // lus dang ngag
79b5(rgyud 'grel): dang sems sbyong ba// rdo rje chen po bdag 'tshalo// de ltar yon tAn yang dag pa// brjod pas rnal 'byor pas mnyes bya// snying rje sleb ma la bskyed de// de nas rim pa 'di nyid brtsam// mtshan mo snang ba'i cha ste gsal po'i nyi ma'i zer 'gyed snang
79b6(rgyud 'grel): ba mched pa yin// mtshams ni snang ba thob par rang gi rang bzhin rnams kyis lan cig min par 'gro/ mtshan min nyon par ma yin mtshams min gang zhig rang bzhin rnams dang rnam bral ba// de ni byang chub skad cig yin par bla ma mchog
80a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad rnal 'byor pa nyid yul// mtshams kyi mtha' ni 'jig min mun nag tshogs ni ma lus gang du 'das pa dang // ji srid nyi ma ma shar skad cig 'dir ni dri med yang dag mtha' ru bshad// slob dpon mchog ni rab rib
80a2(rgyud 'grel): bral bas slob ma la ni phyi rol byang chub bstan// nang gi bde ba rnyog bral sangs rgyas byang chub skad cig dag gis thob par 'gyur// tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba 'am// dbus min 'byung ba 'am dbus 'byung ba'am// mtha' med 'byung ba'i
80a3(rgyud 'grel): mthar ni 'byung ba rnams// de dag thams cad stong par dam pas gsungs// gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'od med cing // zad dang 'phel med dngos dang dngos med min// ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min// gnas par 'gyur min myur du
80a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba min// gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin// bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa// de ni thams ca stong par sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// rnal
80a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor par ni de lta'i de nyid thob/ rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bdag nyid 'gro gnyer gcig/ ye shes rang bzhin mi yi seng ge gang // mi zad lus thob ma lus 'gro ba'i rgyu// de ni yo ba'i lus kyang drang po yin// stan la gnas yid gyur kyang gnas pa yin// /
80a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni mig btsums gyur kyang rnam rgyas yin// de ni mnyam ma gzhag kyang mnyam gzhag yin// de ni tshig dang ldan yang brjod pa la yin// de ni longs spyod ldan yang bzung bral yin// de ni 'jig rten mgon yang gzhan dral 'gyur// gang zhig de nyid
80b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs shing nyes kun zad// man ngag thob pa'i slob ma yis// de nas rnal 'byor rnam gnyis bslab// ril por 'dzin pa'i rim pa dang // de bzhin rje su gzhig pa'o// mgo bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar// ji srid snying gar phyin pa'i bar// rnal 'byor
80b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag mtha' la 'jug/ ril por 'dzin pa zhes bshad// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu nyid// dang po 'od gsal bar bya ste// phyi nas de bzhin bdag nyid byed// rje su gzhig pa'i rimA pa yin// dbus kyi rlung ni me long l-i// ji ltar kun tu thim gyur
80b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mtha'// yang dang yang du 'jug par byed// 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal dang za// mig btsums 'byed dang rgod pa na// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// de nyid rig pa rtag tu gnas// gzugs bcas
80b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer de dang de// rnam shes rlung dang ldan pa yi// bdag byin brlab pa'i rlom gyis kyang // sems can don du'ang ldan 'gar 'gyur// ji ltar dang ba'i chu klung las// nyi dag myur du ldang ba ltar// de bzhin thams cad stong gsal las// sku
80b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dra ba 'byung bar 'gyur// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la bltos pa'i// phyag rgya chen por brtag pa ni// 'od zer lnga'i ni 'byung ba dag/ na mkha'i 'dzi' tshon dag dang mtshungs// phyag rgya 'tshang bar byed pa 'am// gal te gsang sngags
80b6(rgyud 'grel): zlos pa 'am// gang gzhan thams cad byed pa na// thams cad stong pa'i gzhi la gnas// thams cad za zhing kun le blta// kun la phyag byed kun tu 'gro// thams cad bying pa'o mtshan ma can// thams cad stong pas 'grub par 'gyur/
81a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni don dam zhes bya ba// skal bzang slob ma bzang pos man ngag thob// thal mo sbyar nas me tog 'dzin pa yi// bla ma las ni slar yang blang bar bya// dngos po kun dang rnam bral zhing // phung po khams dang skye
81a2(rgyud 'grel): mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa// chos bdag med dang mnyam med pa// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes po// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid// de nas rjesu mthun pa'i yon// bla mo la ni dbul bya ste// rin chen khyim dang glang po rta// yul dang
81a3(rgyud 'grel): mal stan dag dang ni// bran pho dran mo chung ma sdug/ bu mo shin tu yid 'ong dang // gang gis bdag kyang dbul bya na// lhag ma rnams lta smos ci dgos// slob dpon la na dron thob dri med brtan pa'i blo ldan dngos kun bdag/ gsal dag shin tu phra ba
81a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog zhi'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i khams// gnyis med rtog bral rtag tu bde ba'i rang bzhin de nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom bya// bsod nams bsod nams min grol rang nyid 'dir ni bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// /
81a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gsang ba'i bde ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa ste slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i rim pa bzhi pa'o// / mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la//
81a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal nas ni zung 'jug pa'i// ri ma pa tha ma bri bar bya// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// rtag pa gnyis po spangs pas na// gang du dngos po gcig gyurapa// zung du 'jug ces de la bshad// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // don dam nyi du shes nas ni
81b1(rgyud 'grel): gang gos gcig tu gyur shes pa// de yis zung du 'jug par shes// dngos po rnams bcas kun rtog dang // dngos po med par rtog pa dag/ rnal 'byor pas ni cig car spyod// de ni zung 'jug shes pa'o// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa zhes// rnam
81b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis blo ni yod min gyi// gang du mi phyed blo yod pa// de ni zung 'jug ces byar bshad// rtag dang chad pa'i blo dag ni// gang gis spangs nas gnas pa yi// zung du 'jug pa'i rim 'di yi// de nyid shes te mkhas pa yin// shes rab snying rje gcig/
81b3(rgyud 'grel): par ni// shes nas gang du 'jug gyur po// zung 'jug ces byar bshad pa ste// rim 'di sangs rgyas spyod yul lo// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug par// thams cad bsdus las shes gyur pa// rnal 'byor chen po gang du gnas// de ni zung du
81b4(rgyud 'grel): jug par 'gyur// gang du lhag mar bcas pa dang // de bzhin lhag ma med pa zhes// 'di lta'i rtog po med gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug pa'o// gang du gang zag bdag med dang // chos la bdag med pa dag gi/ rtog pa gnyis las rnam grol ba//
81b5(rgyud 'grel): zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do// de nyid shes pa'i rim shes nas// bdag byin brlab pa'i 'od gsal la// de nyid la ni 'dus pa gang // zung du 'jug pa'i rim 'di yin// ril por 'dzin dang rjes gzhig dang // 'jug dang de bzhin gnas pa dang // /
81b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas gang du ldang gyur pa// mnyam gyur zung du 'jug pa'o// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ so so'i char ni shes gyur pa// gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa// zung du 'jug par de bsha do// de bzhin nyid la dmigs nyid dang / gang du ldang bar gyur pa ni//
82a1(rgyud 'grel): zung du 'jug pa de yin te// mi zad rnal 'byor pa yi gnas// gnyid log dang ni sad pa ste// gnas skabs de nyid spangs pa ni// gnyid log smad dang rnam grol ba// zung 'jug smin par ston pas gsung sa// mnyam
82a2(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag dang ma bzhag pa// gang la 'di dag thams cad med// dngos dang dngos med rnams spangs pa// rnal 'byor pa ni zung 'jug gnas// dran dang mi dran las grol zhing // rtag tu 'byung po'i mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor pa ni 'dod
82a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin spyod// zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa'o// chags dang chags min las grol zhing // mchog tu dga' ba'i lus dang ldan// 'khor ba srid du gnas byed pa// zung 'jug rnam par bsgom pa'o// bya ba dang ni byed pa dang // mi phyed pa yi ngo bo
82a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid// gnas dang rnal 'byor pas shes pa// zung du 'jug par de bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa 'di gcig yin// gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dge/ gnyis po gang du gcig gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// yongasu dog pa'i lha dang
82a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'dir ni ma dag par 'gyur zhes// gang zhig mi phyed par rtogs pa// gang yin de ni zung 'jug pa'o// gzugs can dang ni gzugs med ces// rtog pa gnyis po spangs pa nas// gang zhig zhi rtogs rnal 'byor dbang // de ni zung 'jug
82a6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'o// de ltar gang gnas rnal 'byor pa'o// zung 'jug rim la gnas pa ste// de ni kun mkhyen de nyid mthong // sna tshogs 'dzin ces brjod pa yin// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon sangs rgyas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol son// bya ba byas
82b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor che// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// de nyid gnyid med ye shes te// li gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// de bzhin kun gyi dbang phyug yin// rdo rje lta ba'i ting 'dzin yang // rdzogs pa'i
82b2(rgyud 'grel): rim gnas de nyid de// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // gnyisu led par de bsha do// mi gnas sgra gang skye med la sogs pa// gnyis yid ye shes ston pa rnams// thams cad 'di yi tshig yin te// der ni gzhan dag med par bshad// gang
82b3(rgyud 'grel): gA klung gi byed srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di dag nyid// thugs chung yod med phyogs spangs pa// phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid grub// zung 'jug go 'phangs la gnas pa'i// slob bzhin pa yi rnal 'byor che// zung du 'jug pa
82b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms gyur pas// spyad pa'ang de dang gnyisu med// ji ltar bdag nyid de bzhin dgra/ chung ma de bzhin mna' ma dang // ji ltar slad 'tshong de bzhin ma// ji ltar bram ze de bzhin gdol// ji ltar pags pa de bzhin gos// ji ltar ran
82b5(rgyud 'grel): chen phub ma dang // ji lngar chang dag de bzhin gci// ji ltar bza' ba de bzhin bshang // ji ltar dri bzung ga bur dang // de bzhin pa shang las byung ba'i dri// ji ltar bstod pa byed pa'i ched// de bzhin du ni smod pa'i tshig/ drag po rdo rje can
82b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin// ji ltar nyin mo de bzhin mtshan// de ltar rmi lam de bzhin mthong // ji ltar 'jig pa de bzhin gnas// ji ltar bde ba de bzhin sdug// ji ltar sdang ba de bzhin bu ro// mnar med mtho ris de bzhin te// de bzhin sdig dang bsod
83a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa 'o// de sbya shAs nas shes nan// dus bya med pa rnams pa byed// smras par rgyu zlums n+d+ha sgrubs na// spyan sum rdzogs pa rnams ca 'byug// mchog gyur rim pa lnga pa 'di/ kha shadanan
83a2(rgyud 'grel): bsod nangs dang thob pas// zung du 'jug par ti 'dzin// 'di yis 'jig rten rol par shog/ rgyung du 'dzu/ rim pa slo na sgrub sbyin 'i ldan ma mdzod po ste rim pasgru ba rdzogs s+ho//

83b1(rgyud 'grel): oM ye tamA he hu bra b+ha ba he hun+te ban ta thA ga to bya ba da ha he ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM lA ngi ma ha shra ma Na swA hA/ sarba mang+ga laM/
84a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod sa bsdus pa'i stonas slob dacan chen po a pa'i nas snga nas mdzad pa bzhugs so//
84b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsar+ya me lA pA na pra dI pAM/ bod skad du/ spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos med
84b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag na mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tsho lo// ma lus tshig ming yi ge bral la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das dang ma byon kun tu sngon la phyag 'tshalo// kun tu ma lus thams cad stong la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje theg pa 'di la sngags kyi sgor spyod
84b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rnam pa gnyis te// slob dpon glasang sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba dang / nang la mchog tu gzhol ba ste/ thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i don du/ mdo sde dang rgyud rtog pa
84b4(rgyud 'grel): dag las yang dag par gsungs pa'i lung gi tshig rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshig snyan cing rgya che ba du ma dag bltas nas tshig su bcad pa dang rkyang pa la sogs pa sgra smras pa rnams dang stsol zhing rab tu spel ba rnams kyis rgyud
84b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa rnams lngas btu swA te/ byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du chud por bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i thabs kyi yan lag mar me lta bu byed pa dag sngon byung bar gyur pa ni mi rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzogs ldan dang gsuM
84b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang gnyis ldan gyi dus na ni 'jig rten po rnams tshe dang nad med pa phun sumo tshogs shing / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims la spyod pa la yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni bstan bcos la gnas shing yongasu tshol bas de
85a1(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid shes pa la mngon par zhugs shing tshig rgya che ba la sogs pa rnams dang / sbas pa'i sgra'i sgo nas de kho na nyid ston la/ de rnams kyis kyang khong du chud pa yin no// da ltar ni rtsod pa'i dus te/
85a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pa rnams tshe dang / nad med pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa dman zhing g.yo dang sgra dang dregs pa dang / phrag drog dang ldan la/ shes rab zhan cing log par lta bas las ngan pa lnga sogs pa la dbra' bas ji srid du tshig rgya che ba
85a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa sbas pa'i sgra'i don rnams la nges par mi dga' bas de kho na nyid tshol bar mi byed do// de'i phyir na dang po'i bstan bcos yongasu tshol ba spangs pas de kho na nyid mi rtogs shing dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las la mngon par
85a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhol bas dus byed par 'gyuraro// de bas na thar pa thob par 'dod pa rnams la dgos pa med par 'gyur te/ tshig snyan pa dang rgya che ba lnga sogs pa'i thog ma tshig gi sgo la gnas pa'i sgra rnams ni gzings dang 'dra ba yin pa'i
85a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ji skad du don gyi rjesu 'brang bar bya'i sgra ji bzhin par ma yino zhes gsungaso// de bas na don gyi dbang 'di mthong nus bdag gis slob dben klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi man ngag las bskyed pa'i go rim
85a6(rgyud 'grel): gyos rdzogs pa'i gi rim gyi ting 'dzin thob nas 'dus byas pa dang 'dus ma byas pa'i slob ma rnams kyi thun mong du bshad pa'i sgra yi sgo nas sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang / phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid dang / bdag gis de kho na nyid dang
85b1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi de kho na nyid dang / lha'i de kho na nyid de go rim rnam pa lnga rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdo sde dang / rgyud dang / rtog pa rnams bsres nas bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde la sogs pa bshad pa'i gsungs rab
85b2(rgyud 'grel): kun las/ bskal pa bye ba rnamasu yang / de nyid bral nas 'grub mi 'gyur/ zhes gsungs te/ ji skad du/ bcom ldan 'das la lha mo bzhis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang / thub pa chen po'i chos rnams
85b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong la// gang gis de nyid mi shes pa// de yi thams cad 'bras bu med ces gsungs pas so// rdo rje slob mas gsol pa/ de kho na nyid mi shes par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/
85b4(rgyud 'grel): yang de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid gsung rab kyi sgo nas nyan par 'tshal lo// gang gi phyir theg pa chen po pa dang / rtog ge pa la sogs pa rnams ni don 'di nyid la gnas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pas dri kho na nyid rtogs par bgyid
85b5(rgyud 'grel): na/ de rnams bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/ yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do// gsol pa/ bco mu ldan 'das yang dag pa
85b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bgyi ba de ji lta bu logs/ smras pa/ gang mi slu ba zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ mi bslu ba zhes bya ba de ji lta bu lags// smras pa/ shin tu yang dag pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid can gyi ting 'dzin de ni mi bslu
86a1(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba de gang lags/ smras pa/ gang bden pa gnyis gnyi su med pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni yang dag pa'i
86a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa gnyis zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ smras pa/ dang po ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / gnyis pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o// gsol pa/ bco
86a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gtsug tor gyis rgyud las bka' stsal te/ phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
86a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnas don dam pa'i bden pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po chos thams cad phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang / 'gro ba rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams te/ de yang don
86a5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pas gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa'i bden pa ni bdag med pa zil gyis mi non pa thams cad stong pa ste/ 'phel ba med pa/ 'grib pa med pa/ rnam par dag pa/ namakha' dang mnyam
86a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dri ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid yi ge med pa/ tshig med pa/ lus med pa dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba/ yod pa ma yin/ med pa ma yin/ rgyu ba ma yin/ mi rgyu ba ma yin/ thag ring ba ma yin/ thag nye ba ma yin//
86b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa ma yin/ mi stong pa ma yin/ dbu ma yang ma yin pa 'di ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o// de bas na de ni mchog tu zab pa dang / 'jug par dka' ba dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rkyen
86b2(rgyud 'grel): tsacan no// rgyu rkyen gyis 'byung ba ni kun rdzob gyi bden pa ste/ de ni ji srid du rmi lam dang / mig 'phrul dang / gzugs brnyan ltar snang ba dang ldan pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin te/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mtshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i
86b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyur gyur pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o// de gnyis zung du 'brel par 'jug pa'i rim pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin te/ dmigs pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid ces bya'o// rdo
86b4(rgyud 'grel): rje slob mas gsol pa/ bdag cag lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thog ma med pa nas phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mngon par zhen pas yod pa dang med pa dang / gcig dang / du ma dang / gnyis dang / gnyis ka ma yon pa dang
86b5(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bag chags kyi rgyus rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rim kyi ting 'dzin la slob
86b6(rgyud 'grel): pan go rom ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bgyi 'am/ yang na bla ma'i man ngag tsam gyis de dag skad cig tsam gyis so sor snang bar bgyi/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa/ rim gyis 'jug pas bslab par bya'o cig car ni ma
87a1(rgyud 'grel): yin no// bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang lang+kar gshegs pa'i mdo las gsungs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud
87a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang / gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud cig car ram/ rim gyis 'jug pas sam/ ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo
87a3(rgyud 'grel): gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud ni rim gyis 'jug pas rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ cig car ni ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ blo gros chen po shing a 'bri'i 'bras bu ni rim gyis smin par 'gyur gyi/ cig car ni ma yin no// blo gos
87a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud kyang rim gyis rnam par dag ste/ cig car ni ma yin no// blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ rdza mkhan gyi snod rnams ni ril gyis byed kyi tshig car ni ma yin no// blo gros chen po

87a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / nags tshal rnams rim gyis 'jug pas skye'i/ cig car ni ma yin no// blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis sbyong ste/ cig car ni ma yin no// /
87b1(rgyud 'grel): blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ bzhad gad drang rol mo dang glu dang / pi wang dang sil snyan dang rol mo dag la mkhas pa ni rim gyis 'byung gi/ cig car ni ma yin no// blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams
87b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis sbyong ste/ cig car ni ma yin no// rim pa 'di nyid ni dpa' bar 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las kyang gsal bar gsungs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di
87b3(rgyud 'grel): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis par dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin 'di la slob pa logs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
87b4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems drapa' chen po blo gros bstan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon nam/ 'phong gi slob ma ni thog mar ba lang gi ko ba la phog par byed do// gang gi tshe ba lang gi
87b5(rgyud 'grel): kaM ba la lobs pa de'i tshe shing leb la phog par byed do// gang gi tshe shing leb la lobs pa de'i tshe 'ban la phog par byed do// grang gi tshe 'dren la lobs pa de'i tshe dbyu gu la phog par byed do// gung gi tshe dbyu gu la lobs pa de'i tshe sgra brgya
87b6(rgyud 'grel): la phog par byed do// gang gi tshe skra la lobs pa de'i tshe skra bcu la phog par byed do// gang gi tshe skra bcu la lobs pa de'i tshe sgra gcig la phog par byed do// gang gi tshe skra gcig la lobaso pa de'i tshe sgras mtshon la phog par byed do// gang gi
88a1(rgyud 'grel): tshe sgras mtshon la phog pa de'i tshe mi 'chor bar phog par 'gyu ro// gang gi tshe mi 'chor bar bog pa de'i tshe 'phong slob pa mthar phyin pa yin te/ de 'dod na mun pa mun nag gi nang na yang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dang
88a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gi sgra grag pa de dang der lhun gyis grub cing mi 'chor ba nyid du mda' 'gro'o// sgras mtshon pa la phog par byed par lobs pas phyis gang du yang mi slob ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon legs par bla slabs pa'i phyir phog par
88a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro// blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyis chos gang la yang bslab par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting 'dzin de
88a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid la sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi chos thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur// yang tshul 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i theg pa la gnas pa'i dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod
88a5(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang rim pa 'di nyid kyis bslab par bya'o// dri'i rim pa yang 'di yin te/ thog ma nyid du ni sangs rgyas kyi theg po'i bsam pa la slob bo// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la longs par gyur pa de'i tshe theg pa sar
88a6(rgyud 'grel): la dran pa gcig pa'i ting 'dzin la slo bo// gang gi tshe theg pa sar la dran pa cig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la lobs pa de'i tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la slob bo// gang gi tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la lobs pa de'i tshe las dang po pa'i tingange 'dzin la
88b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa de'i tshe rigs brgya'i dbye ba la 'jugo/ gang gi tshe rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa shes pa de'i tshe/ sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
88b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// lus rnam par dben pa la gnas nas/ A li kA li'i sgo nas dgra rnam par dben po la 'jug go/ gang gi tshe rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim gyis srog dang rtsol ba shes par gyur pa de'i tshe gsung rdo rje'i ting 'dzin
88b3(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro// ngag rnam par dben pa la gnas nas rang bzhin gyi snang ba'i rim gyis sems rnam par dben pa la 'jugo/ gang gis tshe rang bzhin gyis snang ba la rlung gi bzhon pa'i rab tu dbye bas yang
88b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du slob pa de'i tshe sems kyi tinge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yong su shes pa la gnas nas sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi kun rdzob kyis bden
88b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba thob bo// gang gi tshe dbang bskur thob pa de'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas la gnas nas stong pa
88b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po bco brgyad kyis rim gyis don dam bI bden pa la 'jug/ gang gi tshe ril por 'dzin pa dang rjesu gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe ye
89a1(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi rim gyis ldang ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bden pa gnyis la gnyisasu med pa'i rnam pas bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin la slob par gyur pa
89a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no// gang gi tshe rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni phyis chos gang la yang mi slob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir te/ ji ltar 'phong gi slob dpon ni sgras mtshon
89a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la phog par byed par gnas pas phyis gang du yang mi slob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir de'i sngon gyi 'phen shugs kyi stobs kyis mngon du 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa ni
89a4(rgyud 'grel): phyis gang la yang slob par mi 'gyur to/ sngon shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir/ de'i phyir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub dag ni lhun gyis grub pa nyid du mngon sum du 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin
89a5(rgyud 'grel): la slob par byed pas kyang rim gyis 'jug pas bslab par bya'i/ cig car ni ma yin no// de bas na lus rnam par dben pa med par rnam par dben pa shes par mi nus so// ngag rnam par dben pa dang bral bas ni sems rnam par dben
89a6(rgyud 'grel): bapa rtogs par mi nus so// sems kyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba'i ting 'dzin med par kun rdzob kyi bden pa mngon sum bya bar mi nus so// kun rdzob kyi bden pa rtogs pa dang bral bas ni don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so// don
89b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i bden pa rtogs pa med par ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa mngon sum du bya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas rim gyis 'jug par bslabs par bya'o cig car ni ma yin no// rim gyis 'jug
89b2(rgyud 'grel): pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa la bslabs pas cig car rang gi rgyud rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang lang+kar gshegs pa'i mdo las/ blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ mo long gi nang du gzugs kyi gzugasu snang ba
89b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pas cig car snang ngo // de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par mi rtog cing snang ba med pa'i spyod yul rnams cig car rnam par
89b4(rgyud 'grel): spong ngo // blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang nyi ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'od zer rnams kyis gzugasu snang ba thams cad cig car mngon par byed do// de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can rang gi sems snang
89b5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags dang bral ba rnams la rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul dang spyod yul yang dag par ston to// 'dir bshad pa/ sems can dang po'i las can rnams// dam pa'i don la 'jug pa lnga//
