538a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir ni sngon rdzogs// dpal ldan slob dpon zhes brjod de// nang gi gsang ba 'dus pa dga'// phyi rol nyan thos las brjod pa// de lha'i man ngag rim pa yis// slob ma rnams la rjesu bsgog/ de ni ston par yongasasu
538a2(rgyud 'grel): shes// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// rtogs pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor sogs// dam pa'i don gyi bya ba dang // slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni// rnal 'khor mchog gi spyod pa la// slob cing gzhan la slob du bzhug/ de ni slob dpon zhes
538a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs sheso nas// dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes// slob ma rjes sad nus dang // gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang // shes rab snying rjer yang dag ldan// rgyud dang man ngag la mi 'jigs// zab cing rgya cher yang
538a4(rgyud 'grel): dog ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa mchog/ tshar gcod phan 'dogos pa la mkhas// de ni rdo rje 'chang du bshad ce'o// yang gsungs pa/ rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa la ni bdud kyi glags mi brnyed do// dper
538a5(rgyud 'grel): nan dpa' bos bsrungs pa'i bud med la// skyes bu 'phyon ma rnams kyis glagasnga mi rnyed do// de bzhin du dge ba'i shes gnyen dpa' blos bsrung sa pa'i gang zag la bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed do zhe'o// yang gsungs pa// dge ba'i
538a6(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen ni gang de la bdud kyi las rnams nye bar ston te/ bdud kyi las ni 'di dag yin// bdud kyi nyes pa 'di dag yin// bdud kyi las 'di dag khyod kyis rlig nas spang bar bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // 'phags pa rtag tu ngu'i le'u wa
538b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang // rigs kyi bu khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyir mi bsngo bar bya'o// 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ 'dug ni thabs la mkhas pa de mi shes kyis// 'dis ni thabs la mkhas par rab tu shes so zhes gsung so// 'pha Da
538b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dpal 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las pa la sogs pa gsungaso// bdud kyi las rnams spang ba'i phyir// bla ma bsten par 'tshal
538b3(rgyud 'grel): lags na// yang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen la// bdag cag gang gis bsten par bgyi// bka' stsal pa/ ngad rje hA ma la yang gus// rtag tu dge ba'i las la gnas// rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// lung ni mang du thos pa
538b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs// sems can rnams ni gdon pa'i blos// kun tu brtson dang yang dag ldan// de la sogs pa'i yon ldan// dad pa che ba'i slob ma bzang zhe'o// yang bka' stsal pa// ji ltar 'ga' zhig kur
538b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa// skyab 'dzin pa legs thob na// mtsho chen pha rol grol 'gyur gyi// gzhan du ngogasu phyin mi 'gyur// de bzhin bla ma dang mi bral// dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang / byang chub sems la dang ldan zhing // 'jig rten/
538b6(rgyud 'grel): na ni snying rjer ldan// 'di ni gru zhes bya bar bshad// bla ma mkhas pa skyeb 'dzin// gru ni thams cad rab ston pa// 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro rnams la// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs po yin// skye ba 'dzin pa med par ni/ pu yA
539a1(rgyud 'grel): pha rol bgrod mi nus// ston thams cad kun rdzogs kyang // bla ma med par srid mthar min// de bas nges pa nyid du ni/ brtul zhugs brtan pas de bzhin du// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyis// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas mchod
539a2(rgyud 'grel): bya// phyag lnga sogs pa'i bya ba kun// dus rnams kun tu shes par bya// shes rab dad par yang dag ldan// skye bo rnams la snying rjer ldan// khro ba med cing bslu ba med// gtong sogs ston rnams kyis brgyan// sgro che rang gi brtson 'grus ldan//
539a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog tu bla ma'i bka' bzhino byed// mA bskos yang ni rang gi blos// yo byad la sogs dngos po rnams// ci rnyo pa dang ci nus pa// de bzhin bza' bca' la sogs dbul// ji ltar mnyes par gyur kyang ni// yid ni zhum pa med par bzod//
539a4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma ston kun ldan pa// lcong dang rig pas rtogs pa po// ma brtags pa'i rang bzhin can// gang yang 'di 'dra med par ni// slob ma bya bar mi nus shes// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// ji ltar byis pa rang dgar ni// bong ba
539a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phen pa ji lta ba re// gang zhig gzhan gyi dbang gyur pa// dam pa'i chos kyi snod ma yin zhes gsung so// bla ma brnyas can sgyu can dod pa med// sngags kyis rlom zhing glegs bam mthong bas khengs// dad pa med cing dbang bskur
539a6(rgyud 'grel): dman pa la// gtan gyi tsam yang brjod mi bya// 'ga' zhig bla ma la gus dang dang ldan// mos pas bsnyen bskur la ni rtag tu'i brtson// thos pas 'dzin gang bla ma dam pa yis// bla ma'i drin byin bla mas nor mi rtag/ ri rab rtse les
539b1(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na// lhung bar mi bya snyam yang lhung bar 'gyur// bla ma'i drin gyis phan pa'i lung thob na// grol bar mi 'gyur sgyum+b+ha yang grol bar 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal te/ yang gsungs pa// gang zhig g.yo sgyu blo can le
539b2(rgyud 'grel): lo can// nyon mongs bla ma'i skyon mthong ston myin// bla ma la slod dbang skur thob ces rlom// blo dman sems can kun mkhyen thob mi 'gyur// bsnyen bkur med par myur du de nyid 'dod// log par 'dzin pa yin zhes khro bcas
539b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba dang // tshogs nA bla ma mthong na rgyub phyogs shing // de nas dben pas spyod nas phyag byed pa// rang bzhin ngan par gyur pa slob ma ni// rang bu yIn yang gzhan bzhin yongasu spang // rgyal rigs la sogs mchog lus skyes
539b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur kyang // brtan pas de ni drung du bzhag mi byi// yon mchog ldan shes rab brtson bcas drang // yang na bla ma la gusa? sangs rgyas ltar// rgyalnga ba'i chos rtogs bstan la rab tu dang // de ni snod gyur yin phyir drin sbyin bya//
539b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud la thos shing lung la lcags sbyangs kyang // b+h+ra mI'i skyen bkur med cing lung mu thog de ni rang la'ang phan pa med cing bstan bcos chung // de ni bstan bcos skye ba'i rgyu tsam yin// yang na skal ldan de ni mni dgra the'o// blo
539b6(rgyud 'grel): gros blun zhing don la sbyor mi nus// gzhan don blo yis ston la rab tu 'jug/ tshigi ston ming na brnyed par 'gyur// rgyud mang thos shes shes ldan tshig don shes// drang dang blo gros 'dzin zla brtson par ldan// bla ma'i zhabs
540a1(rgyud 'grel): bkur bcas shing lung thob dang // rgyud rgyal man ngag bstan par 'os pa yin// zhes gsungaso// don 'di rdo rje phreng ba las// gsang bar gsungs phyir sdus pa de// gdul dka' tshul 'chos sgyu can dang // rmongs dang
540a2(rgyud 'grel): sems khro g.yon can dang // dang med rtog ge pa lhan cig/ rtags kyis nye bar mtshon pa dang // nyan thos dang ni nor la brkam// de kho na nyid sun 'byin pa yis// dron dmau pa ni mi shes pa// med par lha dang tshul khrims 'tshal// gtan dang
540a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig ni skyel ba dang // 'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing // bla ma dang ni slob ma yis// mtshan nyid bstan pa rtogs gyur kyang // de yis de la ji ltar na// gus par bgyi la the tshom ma mchis// mdo rgyud cho ga zhib mo dang // bla ma'i zhal nas thos pa
540a4(rgyud 'grel): yis// bdag gi the tshom bsal bar bya// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon// gtan tshigs gzhan yang yod pa ste// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje gsungs// slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa ni// zhi ba la sngags bya ba ni nga // sngags dang rnal 'byor rim
540a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// lha ma dang gdugs dang gtsug gtor drang // so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang // snabs kyi gong bu ma sngogs// 'dar zhing rkang pa skyong ba dang // gzhan du lte dang spyi btol smra// rigs kyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang // rgyab sogs la/
540a6(rgyud 'grel): lta bu dang // bag med par ni smra ba dang / bla ma'i gdams ngag mi bsgom pa// de la sogs pa'i skyon gyi tshogs// bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spang // 'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bos phyag bya bka' lung nod// rang bdog
540b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gteng dam bcas pa// ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong smad pa// slob ma bla ma'i mdun gnas bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams// de lta bu sogs spyod shes bya// dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa/
540b2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o zhes bka' stsal te// yang gsungs pa// ston kun gyi gzhir gyur blo ma ni// rab tu 'bad te dngos grab 'dod pa dang // bdud kyi tshogs las rgyal phyir thos bzhin du/ rang gi sri bo'i gtsug tu bkur bar bya//
540b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba rnams dang sku gsung thugs dang ni// ston phrin las rab tu mnyam pa'i phyir// rtag tu mdun bsam lus dang ngag yid kyis// phyag 'tshal tshigasu bcad pa 'di brjod do// sems can nyams thig gnas nas 'don la phyag 'tshalo//
540b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos su ston cing dri me bral la phyag 'tshalo// maM lus tshig med yi ge bral la phyog 'tshalo// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tsha lo// tshig chen pa yas lung ston pa la phyag/ tshale// sku gsung thugs ni nyi ma bdud
540b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dang // nam mkha' lta bur 'gro ba la khyab cing // skyon 'phrin las yid bzhin nor la phyag 'tshalo// bla ma khyod la bdag ni rab gnas te// bdag gis lus sogs 'byur pa kun 'bul la// dang por pri den gus par thal sbyor to//
540b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag lngas btud phyag ni legs por btsal// de rjes sa phyogs skyang nul byi dor byas// 'jam pa'i bstan ni legs par bting nas kyang // rgyab rten mdun du chos bzangs so shing dang // dpas dang zhabs gsogs dri yi chu dag dang /
541a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan la mi mdzes dngos po spang bar bya// gtsang zhing bstod pa'i kha zas legs sbyar nus// rin chen snod du ras kyis rdul me byas// mdun du 'dud pas lag gnyis legs bkru ste// gus pa'i tshul du lag pa gnyi gas/
541a2(rgyud 'grel): dbul// lag pa'i snod dam bla mas ci gnang ba// phyag byas lag pa gnyis kyis legs zhus te// gus pa'i spyod lam bsten pas ci bder bya// rdo rjes phyag zhabs dri chus rab bsil nas// bzang po'i khri bstan legs shing mtho ba la//
541a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ma'i gos kyis gdong ni rab g.yogs te// zhabs rten 'jam po'i khri la bzhugasu gsol/ rgyab rten dam po gzer dang bcas pa la// steng du bla brig gdugs dang yol ba bres// chos dang dge ba'i bshes la dkyil 'khor ni//
541a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang mthun pa'i ri mo bris pa dbul// me tog bdug pa mar me byug pa dang // zhal zas sil snyan dag gis bstod bya ste// gser dang nor bu mu tig bai DUr+ya// spug dang rdo yi snying po dngul dag dang // shaM ka shil byi ru rin chen
541a5(rgyud 'grel): shul// ras dang dar gos blang chen rta dang ni// bu drang bu mo chung ma bran dang 'bru// bdag gi 'byor pa stobs kyis dbul bar bya// de rjes gus par gsol ba gsum gdab bri ste// 'gro la snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// rdzogs po'i byang chub
541a6(rgyud 'grel): yid la bsam nas kyang // nyon mongs med pa'i sems kyis rna blags te// tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod lam bstan par bya// chos smras pa la legs par gsungs tshig gis// dbang po rab dang tha mar gdams par bya// mnyam los byung
541b1(rgyud 'grel): bapaba'i dge rtsa rgya chen kun// rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir ni bsgo bar bya// chos sla ba la rigs gzugs thos pa dang // ngang tshul ngan dang ji ltar bsnyas gyur kyang // chos la ston phyir brnyas pa'i sems mi bya// rnyed dang grags dang thos dang tshul khrims dang //
541b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sogs ston rnams kyis khengs mi bya// shes khe rnyed 'dod phyir ni ma yin te// mdor na nyon mongs can sems tshar bcad bya// de las sogs te mtha' yas mchog gyur phyir// rang gi blo ma ston kun rdzogs la// sgo gsum bsnyen bkur
541b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa mtha' yas phyir// bskal par yang ni smra bar su zhig nus// mdor bsdus byas ni brjod pa 'di yin te// sangs rgyas la sogs rin tshun ji bzhin dang // rang gi pha mya rang lus rang gces nor// rang la gang phangs de bsrung sgrub pa bzhin
541b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang slob ma'i tshul bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// / slob mas gsol ba// bla mra bsnyen bkur bya ba'i tshul ni khong du tshud lags na// dgos pa gang gi don du bgyi ba bdag la bstan du gsol// slob dpon
541b5(rgyud 'grel): ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// mi mthun pa byas gnod byed pa// bdud bzhi las ni rgyal byi'i phyir// 'dri ba rgyas par bshad par bya// grang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni// thib pa ston rnams kyi rten//
541b6(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir sems can tshe thung ba// 'chi med go 'phang bsgrub mi nus// de bas 'bod pa thams cad kyis// 'chi ba med pa bsgrub par bya// 'chi bdag las rgyal 'chi ba med pa de// gtan du thob phyir 'gro ba tshe ring bas// dam chos bsgrub phyi
542a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dpag med la// 'chi ba 'joms shes rgyal bas rab tu gsungs// phyi dang nang gi 'chi ba'i rtags gsungs pa// mtshan nyid la mkhas 'chi ba dag bsgrub yi// thabasu gyur pa 'bad pa cher byas te// 'bad pa'i
542a2(rgyud 'grel): bla la 'bras bu lag na gnas// ma rig pa nas rga shi mthar thug par/ skye dang 'chi ba'i dus ni nges pa med// 'khor lo bskor ba lta bur rab tu gnas// de yi bar chad zhi ba 'chi bdag bslu// dbang po lnga la phyi yi rtags 'byung ste// drug pa la
542a3(rgyud 'grel): ni nang du shes par bya// 'chi bdag nang gi las ni go rim bzhin// thabs mkhas ldan pas 'chi ba 'joms par 'gyur// de dag rnal 'byor gtsug lag gdan bzhi dang // bde mchog mkha' 'gro dus kyi 'khor lo las// gsungs pa mdor
542a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus bdag gis khyod lnga bshad// gzhan du ma yengs yid kyis mnyan par gyis// mrig ni zlum zhing gzugs mthong 'khrul pa ngo// gyen du zlum zhing gzugs mthong 'khrul pa daM// gyen du blta dang sa dang na mkha' yi// bu ga chod dang
542a5(rgyud 'grel): med par snang ba ni// 'chi bdagra 'ong bA mkhas pas shes par bya// shing dang ri dang rang gi spyi bo re med// 'bar dang ran me'i gang mthong dang // dbyug pA gdengs pa nag pe 'bar bar mthong // chu la dbang po'i gzhu ni ma mthong dang // grib ma mgo
542a6(rgyud 'grel): med rang gi kye rnga min// tha mal mig la rin chen 'khor lo mthong // zla bar ri mo mad dang nyo ma bzlog/ khyi khA pye ga gtor ma za mi byed// bkab pa'i rna bar rnga yi sgra med dang // sgra mi thos dang gnod sbyin sgra grag thos// nag po'i gzugs
542b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis lho phyogs 'dod zhes dang // dri mi zhim dang dri ldan sna rtse ston// glo bur sna ni yo dang zhom pa dang // ro mi tshor dang ro ni med pa tshor// rtsa bar nub dang rtsa ba nag por 'gyur// rgyu med ljib pa'i tshigs 'khrul 'chi ba'i rtags// ha phu grang
542b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dro ba'o rig bya dang // bzhog byed skams dang phyed grang phyed nI dro// 'jam rtsib lci yang bzlog pa'i lus 'dzin dang // bshang gcig ser dang dngul gyi kha dog dang // sbrid dang dus gcig 'byung dang sdom par byed// chu dang sa bon 'dres
542b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'byung ba dang // 'khrig pa spyod tshe dril bu'i sgo thos dang // nyin dang mtshan mi'i gzugs ni bzlog mthong zhing // phyogs kyang de bzhin bzlog pa nyid du mthong // thos pa la sogs de bzhin snang gyur na// de ni 'tsho bdag dbang du song zhes
542b4(rgyud 'grel): bya// bshang gci med dang mang gyur 'chi ba'i rtags// glo bur zha dang sgeg dang rgyu med tsho// stobs med ha cang stobs dang ldan pa dang // dri zhim pas ni lus lnga ni// srogs lcags 'du dang 'bros pa 'chi ba'i rtags// gnyen gyis 'dod
542b5(rgyud 'grel): dong dgra ni byams pa dang // dud mo smra bal bsam gtan khang pa 'dor// grib gnon lus la yang yang 'jug pa dang // lag mthil rkang pa de bzhin tsha dang 'bigs// chu sbugs lcags bsregs bzhin du myur du lkog mar 'bum pa
542b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po 'byung ba dang // glo bur mtshan ma nub par gyur dang 'phyang // de la sogs pa lus kyi rtags shes bya// thams cad sems kyi dbang du byed pa ste// sems las mi gtogs don gzhan med par go sungs// de phyir rang sems
543a1(rgyud 'grel): brtag pa ma gtogs pa// phyi rol dron ni thams cad 'khrul kyang snang // rnal 'byor pa ni shin tu khro ba 'dod// lhag par chags dang lhag par gnyid che dang // rab tu mi dga' kyi hud smre sngags 'don// hA cang dga' dang mngon
543a2(rgyud 'grel): shes thob snyam dang // mkha' lA 'bur snyam ting 'dzin thob snyam dang // dmigs pa brjed dang de lo yid mi 'gro// nang gi nyi zla'i rlung ni log pa dang // lhag dang chad dang ha tsadra 'phel dang 'grib// du sum min dang ha cang kA ring dra// phug dang mun
543a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bug pa la sogs sems// 'jig rten pa brgya dang drug cur dran// 'jig rten 'das las sems ni log pa dang // rnyed dang tshong dang gnyen gyi bya ba dang // lus dang lam kyi chang sgom 'dun pa dang // 'khor dang bsod snyoms ster la mngon pa
543a4(rgyud 'grel): dga'// grags pa'i gtam dang rab byung khyim pa dang // mang por 'dre dang bdag gi bde ba 'dod// 'khor 'dod 'khor la ha cang mi dga' drang // bsgom dang bzlas dang sbyin sreg tshogs 'khor ro// ston du byed pa las ni nyams pa dang // ma phyin
543a5(rgyud 'grel): dang yul sa'i gtam la dga'// gnyen dang 'brug drang rgyal po'i 'thub mo dang // dug drang byung stems mu myo'i sdod gtong dang // gzho nu'i sbyor dang bsad dang bsad dri bong med// sa bdag dang ni mi yI bodag po dang // gdon dang 'dre chen po
543a6(rgyud 'grel): pa chags pa dang // srog chags gdugs dang g.yeng sa'i lam gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor pa ni 'chi ba myur du thob// rang gi sems ni yongasu gyur pa'i phyir// 'khrul kyang rmi lam khyad du bsad mi bya// thub pa'i dbang pos chos kun rmi 'drar gsungs// de
543b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir rlung sogs ma yin rtags kyis kyang // rmi lam na ni dus mtshan nag mo mthong // de la chags spyod de'i dbang gyur dang // shing la 'dzegs dang shring dang ri las lhung // bung bu rnga mos lho dang shar phyogs dang // spre'u zhon pas shar du 'gro ba dang //
543b2(rgyud 'grel): shing ring thal phung grogs mkhar srog shing 'dzeg/ ka ra ba ri'i phreng thogs dri tshogs byugs// thog thog ser ba rdo ba'i char pas nor// sngar shi'i mi dang 'grogs drang lam du zhugs// yan lag lcog sgrog ldan dang gzeb du bcug/ gos med glos
543b3(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyan phyeng dmar po thogs// de la sogs pa 'chi ltas rnam par 'gyur/ tha mal rtag su de ltar bshad pa ste// 'byung ba rlung sogs na de ni rnam gnyis gzhan// 'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom phyir sngags dang ni// sman dang bsam gtan rin chen rnaMs kyi
543b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i gdon la sngags kyi bsrung ba ste// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa li ni sman gyis gso// nang gi rlung la ting 'dzin stobs kyis// gdug pa rnams la tshe'i nor bus gos// gnod 'joms smin ni gang dang gang bshad pa// gang du gzi gis tha~Md 'grub par bshad
543b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag bsdus pa'i stobs las byung shes nas// mkhas pa rnams kyis rab tu brtag par bya// 'chi bdag gzhom pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // 'khor bar sogs ni yun ring gnas gyur kyang // 'gegs kyis bsod nas ma lus zad byas pas//
543b6(rgyud 'grel): na rnams ni 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// ba ga Da rnams bzlog phyir bsrang ba chen po ba// gsol pa/ bac+doMs kyis bshadu gsol// bka' stsal ba/ rig pa'i mchog dang dpung bzangs la sogasu// lta ba'i gdon ni gang dang gang bshad pa// sde dpon 'khor
544a1(rgyud 'grel): dung de yi rigasu gtogs// sa steng mi la rtag tu 'tshe bar byed// de dag bzlog phyir gnas dang mtshan nyid dang // bsrung dang dengs par phyir ngas bshadado// dge ba'i bshes la gus pa cher bskyed la// 'gro la phan phyir nyon la yid
544a2(rgyud 'grel): zung // sgrub pa po yi sems la rab zhugs nas// rab tu 'bad te bar chad byed pa ni// lha yi bu ni tshangs po la sogs pa'i// phyogs bcu skyong ba'i lha lngas brangs 'dra ba// tshangs pa'i srin po dang ni 'dod pa'i lha// gzugs med lha ni bar chad byed pa min//
544a3(rgyud 'grel): glang cheni gdong dang bud+ma'i 'phreng la sogs// ded dpon bcus ni gdon pararo rab tu byed// ris su gtogs pa bgegs rig stong gragla ni// brgyad cu mI la 'tshe bar byed pa ste// tshangs pa la sogs lha ni steng gi phyogs// 'og na 'dug pa sa dong klu yi ste//
544a4(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs na ni dri zo'i rigs rnam ste// lho ni grul buM nub ne klu yi rigs// byang du gnod sbyin shar du dbang po dang // lhor nI gshin rje nub tu chu yi bdag/ byang du gnod sbyin shar lhor byin za'o// lho nub bdon bral nub byang sbyin gyi sgra// byang shar ma tshak+Sha/
544a5(rgyud 'grel): su drapung ldan gnas pa ste// bdud rnams phyogas+t+ra ni bcu po rab tu bsrung // de dag thar pa ro 'brad la bgegs byedado// rang gi spyod yul las ni 'da' snyam sems// bsod nams gzin ni lus la 'jug byed// 'khor dang rnyed pa gra T+Te dong snyam pa dang //
544a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten po'i bsam gtan skyed par byed// de yi sems kyis gzengs ni bstod byas pas// skye bo phal chen dbang du sdud byed cing // bsod nams dngos po la ni rab tu 'jog/ ye shes tshogs la mngon par mi dga' zhing // 'khor bar 'dre bI
544b1(rgyud 'grel): gtam la rtag tu brtson// kha cig mngon shes thob phyir gzugs rnams mthong // ting 'dzin dpal med mngon du gyur snyam dang // sangs rgyas zhing du 'ga' zhig lung bstan thob// 'gro ba'i don du kun tu 'gro bar rig/ sgra dang 'od 'byung na mkhar
544b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyang ston// me tog mtho zhing sngon gyi spyod tshul dang // da lta ma 'ongs lung ni ston par byed// sangs rgyas zhing ni mang por rab ston cing // mya ngan 'das la mchog gzhol lung yang ston// de yis gzhan gyi sems ni rab bskul
544b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ sbyin sogs rgya chen gus pa rgya chen yang // khaM cag la ni 'dun pa zlog byed cing // zas dang gos med ting 'dzin las nyams byed// 'dod chags can la 'dod pa skyed byed cing // khro 'dong khro byedang+ga la rmongs lhag par rmongs// rlung can lus
544b4(rgyud 'grel): larU nga du 'jug byed cing // mkhrim sogs nAd can rnams la de bskyed// khi cog sems g.yeng ting 'dzin thob mi byed// kha cig thos las nyams byed dman par sbyar// kha cig la nI rgyal ba'i skur ston tsing // gzhan las rgyal sras
544b5(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos gzhan dog las// mkhan po slob dra pon+de lhan cig gnas pa dang // nye gnas tshul gyis dgu la zlog por byed// kha cig la ni pha ma spun zla dang // sring so mo chung mu byi mo snying nye dran// bi cig la ni lha yi chu byad dang / lha mo'i
544b6(rgyud 'grel): cha lugs skra ni rab tu gnag/ num pho long mig ni ri dgas 'dra// glang chen brla 'dra rked pa rdo rje bzhin// chags pa'i mtshan ma mang du ston bye pas// rnal 'byor pa yi sems ni shing bel bzhin// de ga sems kyis kha cig mnar
545a1(rgyud 'grel): sems rgyu'i// tshi gi zhe sdang me ni shing skam bzhin// kha cig la ni bya dang mi bya ba// mi shes phyir na mun par gzugs bzhin te/ kha cig 'byung po drag po'i cha byad can+da// mtshon cha 'bar dang sdigs mdzub sdigs par byed// cig
545a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni 'dod pa lnga stobs shing // kha cig la ni grags sogs 'jig rten chos// gzhal la thos sogs la lar 'byor pa'i stobs// lA la la ni thogs dang ser ba 'bebs// kha cig ting 'dzin las bzlog tshul khrims la// de las bzlog nas la
545a3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin la 'god// la la bsam gtan las bzlog 'chang ba dang // 'chad pa po ni zhul ta'i lus la sbyor// la lnga rab tu byung ba khyim gnas la// theg chen las bzlog nyan thos theg pa 'dzud// slab gsum gnas las gzhan ni bzlog gnas su
545a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten la sogs bsod nams che la dgod// la la bsam gtan khang par sgra 'byin cing // sgo nas 'jigs pa'i sgra 'byung cho ngos 'debs// mnyam gzhag ming nas 'bod cing rab tu dgod // spyugs pa glu len pheg rdob dung gi sgra// se gol
545a5(rgyud 'grel): togs 'dra 'khun dang se mo'i dI// 'dad dang dbang pa glo bur skyed byed cing // mi sdug gozugs ston rdeg dang 'phul ba dang // be sem gtan mi dga' lus kyi yang dang ljid// rgyud med gcig pA smra rang dgod dang khro// glo bur du ni gzhan gyi sems shes/
545a6(rgyud 'grel): shing / 'jig pa'i skar mnga' 'od zer me 'bar dang // dman pa'i man ngag ston pa'i 'dod lha bzhin// la lar bdag ni myur du 'chi snyam dang // bsam gtan 'grub par mi nus thos sogs yin// da ni ci bya 'bras bu mo thog cing // dman pas/
545b1(rgyud 'grel): yi chad sgyid ni lug par byed// kha cig ma brta Da brtson la 'jog byed// bar ngor nyams pas 'bras bu med par byed// gzhan ngag gang byed de las bzlog byed// deng drang de med 'bras bu dang po bzhin// kha cig cho ga nyams la sbyor byed// 'bad pa
545b2(rgyud 'grel): byas kyang de don 'grub mi 'gyur// lA la 'gro ba mi 'dod wa gnas pas// thar dang 'chi ba'i gnas ni nges mi shes// mdor na dang gau lA ni theg chen lo// zhugs pa'i ting 'dzin la sogs par chad byed// srog dang dngos grub gnyis ka 'phyog pa'i
545b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ bla ma'i lung gis bzlog pa tshegs dang bral// bla ma'i ngag med sgrub pa la 'jug pa// srog dang dngos grub bgegs kyis 'phrog byed// bgegs kyi spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu sogs// brjod par mI nus 'on kyang mdor bshad// bsod nams
545b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngags pa'i lus la gdon dang ni// de yi rigs kyis gnod par mi rigs kyang / sngon chad byas pa'i las kyi nus pa dang / 'phral gyis rkyen gyis gnod po 'byung ba srid// las kyang nyon mongs stobs kyis nus skyed// de phyir nyon mongs bzlog pas/
545b5(rgyud 'grel): de med 'gyur// 'byung ba 'khrugs sogs rkyen las gang byung ba// gso ba rigs pa las ni shes par byed// rkyen dang gzhan gnod 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa// sgrub pa'i sa gzhi legs par ma sbyangs shing // bsrung ba'i cho ga tshul bzhin ma byis bsti//
545b6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi bar chad dag ni byed par 'gyur// gnyug mar gnas pa'i 'byung po la 'tshe dang // yid dgas rnams la gtor ma sbyin mi byed// 'dri la sogs pa lha bzhin mchod byed cing // dkon mchog gsum dang bral na bgegs 'byung 'gyur//
546a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi rigs sngags gcod par byed pa dang // bgegs la phur bus 'debs dang sbod gtong byed// dbang ma thob drang lung med log zhugs la// bgegs ni rtag tu 'tshe bar byed pa yin// byams sogs dang bral gsang
546a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags drug zlos dang // rang gi dam tshig las nyams gdug sems can// sdug na sa sbyin sgeg byed pa dang / ba blo dang gce dang 'khrig sbyong srog chags gsod// nub tu khabas+thA swA nu mig so sbyong rdzun// drag po chags pa'i rdo bzlog
546a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig gcod// thab gtong byed pa klu yis brlag 'gyur te/ byang du khaM bltas pa yang de bzhin no// sngags bsgrub sgo ni lhor bstan dang // nub tu smos bstan dang mi grub dang // bla ma dge slong lha khang phyog mi byed// de dag rnams dang pha dang ma yi ni//
546a4(rgyud 'grel): gang du 'gro la gdon gyiso gnas skabs rnyed// mi ro gnas blu sa dur thal phung dang // lha khang sgo dang dri sna chu yi mdor// nyal bar byed la bgegs ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gcig pu 'gro dang mtshan 'gros byed pa dang / gzhan la 'tshe ba'i
546a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa rtag ldan zhing // rang gi srung bsgrub las la mi brtson zhing // de lnga gdon ni rab tu 'byung bar bshid // gsang sngagasna zlos pos mdze po rme can dang // rta rgyu ga lcag gzhu rnams dang la phug dang // tshong dang chang 'dra rnams ni spang par
546a6(rgyud 'grel): bya// de dag byas pas gsang sngags mi 'grub la// de ma grub phyir gdon ni 'jug par 'gyur// dpung bzangs zhus pa'i dam tshig la gnas grol// rgyud gzhan la sa 'byung ba zlog pa'i cho ga ni// bstan par bya yis rab tu gus pas nyon//
546b1(rgyud 'grel): rang sems snang phyir sngags dang cho ga sbyang // byams la sogs pas rnal 'byor bsrung byas la// bsod nams la sogs tshogs kyis bdagu bsrung byas// hUM las byung bas gnas ni kun tu bsrung // rdo rjes khro bo la sogs skur bsgoms te//
546b2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga rdzogs pas yongasu sbyang bar bya// rdo rje rigs gtso pho nya mo yi tshegaso// rig pa mang po brten pa'i lha mo de// bzlas pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams phung ba dang // rngam pa 'don phyir phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur// ye shes gzugs can
546b3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bcu yis ni// phyog so sbyong bcu po dbang du byas pas kyang // bgegs kyi sbyor ba ma lus zhi bar 'gyur te// byams sems thob pas bdag la srung bar byed// ye shes me yau 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// seng+ge'i gzugs can sngags kyi phreng/
546b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// rab tu 'khyor ba'i bzlas pa byas pas kyang // bgegs rnams lus ni rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur// gru gsum ri ba'i sa bon las skyes pa'i// 'bar ba'i nang du ting 'dzin 'od kyis bkug/ til bsregs bzhin du thal bar byas pas
546b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // sbyor ba ma lus rlag par byed par bshad// hUM skyes rdo rje rab 'od dang bcas// sa gzhi rdo rje'i rgyal por rab sprul te// me 'brang rlung gos lha yi 'khor gyis bsrung // bgegs kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur 'ong mi 'gyur// b+h+rUM skyes rnam par
546b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ma dzad gzhal yas su// ye shes 'od zer yig ge'i sgras bskul nas// 'chi med lus la drangs pa pa gegs kyis ni// sbyor ba ma lus snang mdzad sgo nas 'byer// hUM gsum pa las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i zas brten pas// rdo rje mi
547a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chi lus thob bgegs medade// me yis lce ya phye ma deb bzhin// thal bar gyur nas nA mkha' dengs par bya// rdo rje'i go cha ya lang mtshon thogs na// bdud kyi dpa' bo rnams kyi 'byer bar 'gyur// byams pa'i go bgos snying
547a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i mtshon thogs te// dpa' ba'i dpa' sems byang chub sems kyis ni// rta zhon btang snyoms kyis ni yul 'gyed pos// zhe sdang lngas byung bgegs kyi g.yul chen 'joms/ stong pa nyid la rang gi blo gnas te// snang ba rnam rtog las
547a3(rgyud 'grel): skyes shes byas nas// dngos med chos kyi rang bzhon bsgom pa yIswa// rnam rtog las byung bdud ni med par 'gyur// lha la sogs pa'i bdud gzhom pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // nyon mongs bdud ni gzhom par ma byas par// lha
547a4(rgyud 'grel): lo sogs pa'i bdud bzlog mi 'gyur bas// me mi 'dod pas shing ni spyod ba ltar// nyon mongs bdud ni bzlog phyir 'bad par bya// gnas pa rnam pa gsum ni rab gnas pas// nyes pa rnams ni rab 'dzoms lung nyid las// thub pa'i dbang
547a5(rgyud 'grel): pos rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin// rab tu bstan gyis rab tu gus pas nyon// 'dod chags shas cher mi kA tsang sha tshil dang / pogs pa keng rus lta bas rnam par bzlog/ lus 'di mi gtsang phyugs pra sha khrag rlung // glad rgyus rgyu ma mtsher
547a6(rgyud 'grel): mchin mkhal ma khrag// mkhris pa bad kan khu chu phyis sa dang // gcin rnams baspu sgo dang rus pa dang // mig dang rna ba sna dang kha dang ni// bshang sgo mtshan dang bu ga dgu pa yi// rma nas dri ma sna tshogs mi gtsang ba'i// 'dzag ma'i rgyuni ni rtag pa
547b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba yin// de ltar yan lag tha~Md 'dus pa dang // sa chu me rlung na mkha' rnams dang ldan// ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'brang mi yi lus// 'ad ldan pa'i lus la gnas pa yin/ 'dod chags kyis ni gdungs par gyur na yang // lus kyi yan lag 'di
547b2(rgyud 'grel): dag thaMd la// dran pa rtse gcig mngon du byas nas ni// ye shes mig gis sor rnam par brtag/ de ltar gang zhig nges par rtags pa nus// lus drang srog la rjesu chags pa yis// 'dod chags rtsa nas yong ye zhi gyur te// nyi mas mun nag
547b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan nas gsal bya bzhin// 'tsho la dang mdza' bAshes dang ni rnam par bral// mI sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas gdungs// ngan pa skye rga 'tshe ba'i sdug bsngal tsan+da// yul rnams kun tu song na'ang de med min// she sbyang tsha grang bkris dang bsko
547b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs// gang du song na'ang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas// yul mngon dga' ba'i sems ni byung bas na// rnam rtog de dag rnam par bzlog par bya// sems ni glog dang spre'u deng sprin dang mtshungs// de bzhin rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs dang 'dra/
547b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu mtshan 'dod rgyur yul la mngon bur dga'// g.yo zhing 'phyan pas nges par gdul bar bya// de phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// chos 'di kun gyis rtsa ba sems shes gsungs// sems drang byas ni lha mi'i bde ba dang // mtho ris
547b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur// sems kyi skyon gyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang // sems dmyal gnas shing mi sdug thob par 'gyur// sems de rab dang bar 'gyur ba yis// sa chu me rlung skye rga 'chi sogs dang // bar dang tha mar gnod pa
548a1(rgyud 'grel): kun dang bral// rnam grol bde zhing zhi ba thob par 'gyur// gsang sngags dngos grub kun dang thun mong ba// bde ba chung zhing bde ba brgyad dang 'brel// nyon mongs dug bcas rnam par 'jig 'gyur ba// dang ba'i sems/
548a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis thob par bya ba yin// 'dod rgyal las kyang ma byung dus las min// rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang ma yin to// rgyu med can mun skyes bus ma byas kyang // las kyang nyon mongs pa lnga seMn byung // rtsa ni 'byung ban+de bo'i bzhi d+ha ldan// de ni dag ni na bdag
548a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang gzugs mo yin// gtsunas swA sde bdag la gzugs me de// gzugs ni stong pa'i phung bzhir rig par gyis// gzugs ni dbu brdos pa dag dang 'dra// tshor ba chu bur bzhin du rtag tu med// de ltar mthong ba lta ba bzang po yin// gang zhi gzhan
548a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur de ni lha dran gsungs// tshig rtsub khyal pa smra ba smra ba dang // gzhan gyi bud med bgrod dang brdzun sgra dang // rku dang gzhan gyi srog cod gnod byed dang // tshang dang byed po rtag tu sbyang bar byA// rmongs pa gi zhig lus dang gung drang zhig
548a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin yid kyis bsod nams bas gso byas kyang // tha~Md ldog par blta ba bcom pas na// de'i rnam smin mi 'dod 'bras bur 'gyur// dper nos drang chu dang dus ldan yang // sa bon tshig las myung gu mi skye ltar// de bzhin mi shes
548a6(rgyud 'grel): log bltas bcom pa yi// sems la dag ba'i chos rnams mi skye'o// rtag tu sems ni dge ba bcu dag gis// chos kyi lam la gnas par byas na legs// ser sna dregs dang rgyags pa rnam par spangs// gang zhig dgra bcom pham
548b1(rgyud 'grel): gsod pa dang // thun pa'i dge 'dun dbyen ni byed pa dang // de bzhin gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis// gang zhig mi dag sku 'tshal 'byin byed pa// shin tu mi bzad pa yi las 'di rnams// rgyal bas mtshams med lnga po bsten par
548b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad// gti mug gis ni sdig pa ci byos nas// phung po 'dri la grub pa thob mi 'gyur// mchod rten 'jig rjing byang chub sems dpa' gsod// nyon mongs zad pa ma ni sun 'byin dang // slob pa gsod cing dge 'dun mnga' ba la// 'dod pas/
548b3(rgyud 'grel): mang nyung rku 'phrog byed pa dang / mtshams med nye lnga de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// tshul nyams mi ni gang zhig 'di byed pa// skal pa'i bar du mnar med sdug bsngal myong // gsang sngags dngos grub sgrub kyang yong mi 'thob// gang
548b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig bde gshegs gsung gi glegs bam ngag/ chud gzon pa 'am mes ni bsreg pa 'am// bsam pa ngan pas chur ni 'dor ba dang // yang na chos kyi sku ni spong ba dang // slob tshigs ma lus pas ni brgyan pa yis// dge slong dag dang
548b5(rgyud 'grel): dge slong ma gsod dang // dge bsnyen dag dang dge bsnyen ma gsod dang // ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang bsreg kyang rung // mi'i yul na sdig pa 'di byas pas// dka' ba spyod pa ldan pa grub mi mthong // gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la
548b6(rgyud 'grel): gnod byed pa'i// bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas kyang rung // bdag nyid mnar mer yun ring dmyal bar gnas// de nas thar nas las kyis dbang gyis ni// rigs ngan mi dang dud 'gro'i skye ba thob// ngas ni 'di dag khyed la mdor bshado//
549a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhi pa bzung las byed thub pa gsod// rig sngags gcod dang gnod par byed pa dang // bsam pa ngan pas rigs sngags tshogs mi 'chang // / don med bzhin du sen mos rtsa gcod dang // rkang pas skye ba nyed pa la sogs
549a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// sna 'bigs dge 'dun la ni mi gus dang // 'byung po byin pa 'am lha bshos gtor ma 'am// sa la lhung ba sngags pas bza' mi bya// 'dod chags zil gyis gnon pas dud 'gro dang // bud med bgrod bya mi bgrod mi bya// glang chen mi
549a3(rgyud 'grel): gdul sbrul yang mi gzung zhing // rta rgyug pa dang lcags gI gzhu mi bya// gang zhig seMn na dwa dang sngags bsngal ba la// byams pa'i bsam pa brtan po med pa dang // las de rnams dang ldan par gyur ba de// dngos grub nam yang 'grub
549a4(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyuro// dper na na mkha' thug pa med pa las// 'dom gyis gzhal bar mtha' rtogs mi nus ltar// de bzhin dkon mchog gsum lha brten nas ni// phan gnod byas pa'i dge smyig mtha' mi rtogs// rgyu dang snying stor rtsa ba'i dug dag gis
549a5(rgyud 'grel): khI la sogs pa'i seMn gsod pa dang // bya rgod la sogs gzeb gyi bcing byas na// 'di dang pha re la ngag tu grub mi thog dud dgra'i me tog rnying pa bor ba rnams// rkang bos ma rdzi mgo la gdags mi bya// bkres par gyur kyang de dag rnams la ni//
549a6(rgyud 'grel): phul ba'i lha bshos nam yang bza' mo bya// dge dang mi dge'i bshes pa po zung na ni// bram ze dmang rigs dag la khyad par med// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i blos ni bram ze dang // 'di ni dmangs rigs yin zhes btags par zad// bden pa'i lam dmi
549b1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i rjes 'brang na// dmang rigs dag kyang skye shi med par 'gro// log pa'i lam zhugs pa yi spyod ldan mang // bram ze yin yang ma bzad dmyal bar 'gro// lus can shin tu dri ma ldan pa dag/ 'di na gzhan gyi dag par mi 'gyur te// de ni
549b2(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa rnam par bsal ba dang // bsod nams ma lus yongasu bzung bas 'dag/ de ltar sdig pa'i chos las rnam bris na// bde bar gshegs pa'i legs par gsungs pa'i chos// dag cing grol pa dang ni ldan gyur pa// zlos pas skyon mdo
549b3(rgyud 'grel): spyi klag par bya// gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs ngag tu ni// 'jig pa 'am bye ma'i lI wa byas pa yis// bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can// sdig pa sbyangs pa'i phyir ni rtag tu gdab// ring bsel can gyis gzugasu 'i mchod
549b4(rgyud 'grel): rterten la// bstod cing dri dang phreng ba mar me dbul// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan po ngan rol mA dong // mchog tu dad pa yis ni dbul bar bya// ji ltar chu rlung nyin mtshan rtag par ni// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba lta// de bzhin phyag
549b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas bzlas dang brtul zhugs kyis// bsod nams ma lus par ni 'phel bar 'gyur// ji ltar sbyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyi// gas nga sngags bsgorigs dang dngos grub ma thob ni// 'jim pa la ni mchod rten 'bum btab bam// yang na
549b6(rgyud 'grel): chu 'gram byed ma dag la gdab// de nas de'i sdig pa srid gzhan la// byas pa gang yin de ni zad gyur nas// des ni gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid la// mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras bu 'thob// de yis bde bar gshegs la dad
550a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas// de bzhin du ni byang chub sems kyang bskyed// rdo rje'i rigs shes brjod brgya chen dang // nga la yang ni dad cing dga' bar byas// grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma rnyed dang // bde dang bsdug bsngal de bzhin bstod dang
550a2(rgyud 'grel): smad// sems kyis 'jig rten chos rnams rab bcom ste// sdig pa'i gnas su gyur pa spang bar bya// dper na rgya mtsho skad cig tsam yang ni// mi yi ro dang lhan cig mi gnas ltar// de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyis sdig byas pa// sngags pas skad cig tsam
550a3(rgyud 'grel): yadang gnas mi bya// byams dang snying rje'i chus gdab zhe sdang la// re zhig cig na dgra yang mdza' bor 'gyur// mdza' bo bdag kyang dag ni 'gyur ba nyid// de bzhin kha cig kyang ni bar mar gyur// bar ma de nyid kyang ni dgra bor 'gyur// de ltar 'dza' bshes 'gyur/
550a4(rgyud 'grel): par rig bya ste// blo gros ldan pas nAm yang chags mi bya// gnyen la dga' ba'i sems dag rnam rtog dang // bzlog nas dag la cig bder gnas par bya// le lo 'dod chags mi dge ldan pa'i sems// gang na gang du g.yeng zhing rgyu ba dag/ de dang de me myur
550a5(rgyud 'grel): du bzlog nas ni// gsang stegs yi mchod la legs par sbyar// dkon mchog gsum la dang ba brten par bya// so ka'i nags kyi me yi me lce yiso// ma sgribs bzhin du tshang tshing kun bsreg ltar// bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar//
550a6(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa sreg/ me tog dri bstod mar me phul ba dang // tshul khrims brtson 'grus dka' thub byas pa yis// dge ba de ba kun bla na med pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub bla med mchog tu bsngos// dper na chu klung rgya mtsho phyin pa na//
550b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan tsha'i ror ni gcig tu 'gyur ba bzhin// de ltar bla med byang chub mchog bsngos pa'i// bsod nams rgyal ba'i ror ni gcig tu 'gyur// dperA na skyes bu la las 'bras bu'i phyir// sA lu bskyed kyi sog ma'i phyir min yang // sa lu bskyed nas
550b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa med par ni// sog mi'i phung po zhor lnga 'byung ba bzhi ni// de bzhin byang chub 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir// bsod nams sgrub kyi long spyod phyir min yang // sog ma'i phung po dag dang mtshungs par ni// ma bsgrubs bzhin du ma yi long spyod 'grub//
550b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe ring ba de legs par thob pa dang // tshul bzhin bsgrub pa'i yul dag rnyed pa 'am// skye ba med par gyur cing 'gro ba yi// bsam po rnams ni rtag tu rdzogs par bya// 'greng dang 'dug 'dug gnyis lo gA nyal ba dang // mgo 'phros zas klog/
550b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod byed pa na// rjesu dran drug so so'i ston dang / rig pa bcas te rjesu dran par bya// bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun bcas dran te// shA ri'i bu dang dra la thol-I sbyar 'dud nas nyal// de ltar bsam pa'i dge ba mtha' dag zas// lha la sauDa
550b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bgegs dong log 'dren rnams// brtul zhugs gnas pa de la glags mi lta// dper na lo thog thaMd sa ngag la/ brten nas skyon med par ni skye bo ltar// de bzhin tshul khrims rten nas chos dkar mchog/ snying rje'i chus brlan pa ni rnam par skye// rgyal
550b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ngas gsungs so sor thar pa yi// tshul khrims rnam dag 'dul ba ma lus las// sngags pa khyim pas rtags dang cho ga yang // lhag ma rnams ni nyam su blangs par bya// lha'i bde ba dang ni 'byor pa dang / tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang
551a1(rgyud 'grel): thos mang mdangs bzang gcig tu yid gzhungs dang // dbang thang che kun dga' thub stobs kyis thob// gang gis tshe na sems ni dang ba yi// mi yi yul na byang chub sems blangs pa// de ni phyin chad lha dbu lha min dang // 'jig
551a2(rgyud 'grel): rten mA lus rnams kyis phyag bya'o// mIs ni mngon par mtho ba lus pa yi// bslab pa mtha' dag spangs par gyur pa dang // sems ni kun lnga mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang bslabs pa yin// ji ltar gang la
551a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// gaudung so na gzi brjid mi bzod 'jug pa ltar// tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlas pa brjod kyis// gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang zod par 'gyur// mun nag smag la mar me byung ba yis// mun nag ma lus sel
551a4(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa ltar// tshe rabs stong na gnas pa'i sdig pa kun// bzlas brjod mar med myur tu sel bar byed // tshe rabs gzhan du gang dag byas pa yi// sdig pa ma lus bezlas brjod byas pas 'phyang // bezlas pas sdig pa ma lus byang bar
551a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyuraro// las kyi dbang gyur bdag po med pa dang // mgo ni med rten med tshe rabs gcig nas gcig/ las kyi kha brgyad rjesu gang 'gro ba// de yi rjesu dge dang mi dge 'brang // sngags kyi rtsa ba dang po rgol khrims te// de nas brtson 'grus dang ni bzlo
551a6(rgyud 'grel): bi dang / rgyal ba la ni dad dang byang chub sems// gsang sngags le lo med pa'o// chags dang rnam bral dge ba dang // rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gzhol zhing // sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjid ldan pa yi// mi lha rdzas dngos grub ring pa
551b1(rgyud 'grel): med// khyod kyis ji ltar gsungs pa de bzhin du// mi yIs legs par spyad pa bgyis na ni// de dag myur du dbul ba'i mun bsngal nas// nyi ma bzhin du shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur// yan lag mi nyams sems kyang mi nyams shing // nad dang
551b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal lus nyams mi 'gyur bu// khyod la ngad pa'i mis ni thob pA rau 'gyur// lus dang ngag yid lag pa mig dang ni// smin mtshan yan lag rnam par g.yo ba dag/ rab tu bsdams nas de la yid gzhol zhing // byams la gnas shing
551b3(rgyud 'grel): ku sha'i khri la 'dug/ ji srid du ni rtse gcig gnas gyur pa// de srid du ni 'bum mam nyi shu bzlas// ji ltar ri rigs dbang po bkres pa dag/ mthun stobs chen po gsod pa dang // de bzhin spyang gi phag dang ri dgos dang // wa rnams kyi ni
551b4(rgyud 'grel): myur du gsod pa ltar// de bzhin sngags pas seng+ge'i tshul gyi su// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la lus rnams la// brtson 'grus chen po dag dang ldan pa dang // 'bad pa mchog rnams kyis kyang bsten par bya// rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i
551b5(rgyud 'grel): mI le ni/ yid las byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skyes// dga' bos lus ni shin tu sbyangs pa thob// lus sbyangs pas ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur// lus bde rtse gcig sems dang ting 'dzin gyis// de tshe bzlas brjod dogs pa med par 'gyur/
551b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub nye dang bzlog pa la dga' dang // sems ni nam yang sdig la dga' mi 'gyuraro// bkres bsgom tshe rlung grang dang ngal ba yi// sdug bsngal drag po nyin kyang g.yo mi 'gyur// sbrang bu sha sbrang srin bu grog sbur dang // sdig sbrul rka pa brgya dang sbrul
552a1(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dre// sha za srul po rnams kyang de yis ni// lus dang grib ma la yang mi 'gro mo// tshig ni bzung bar 'os shing yid gzhungs la// snyan drag sA dang ni 'bri ba rnams la mkhas// chos lA mngon dga' gter rnams
552a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba dang // lus kyi nad dang dri mA med par 'gyur// skye ba so mthong ngam thos par gyur kyang rung // myur du mngon dga' yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// bud med 'dod lha'i mnga' yis phog pa rnams// 'dod lha'i long spyod phyir ni 'dod par 'gyur//
552a3(rgyud 'grel): gang tshwa mkhas bswa lha dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha yi bu mo'i lus dang sgra// mis ni dga' ba'i yid kyis mthong thos dang // de tshe shin tu nye bar gyur pa yin// dper na rlung med khang pa yi nang du// mar me btsu gos pa mi g.yo 'bar ba ltar//
552a4(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig sems kyis zlos la ma ngom dga' ba// lus la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar byar 'gyur// sna rtser blta zhing rnam par rtog pa sbyong // nam zhig bskyed kyang rnam par mi g.yo ba// de tshe dmigs lnga gnas la thob pa ste// sems ni lasu
552a5(rgyud 'grel): rung bar 'gyur bar nges// sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag brgyad pa 'di// yang dag 'tsho dang las mtha' ting 'dzin gang // rtsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta po rnams// sau so sor yan lag bsten par bya// 'jigs kyang tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug
552a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / drag po rlung sogs rnams la phyag mi bya// de yi chos 'chang pa la mi brten cing // de dag dka' thub mi bya rtag mi bya// de rnams chos la ngan sems mi bya zhing // de yi spyod la nam yang dga' mi byo// de dag stong pa mi gdon sngagaso mi bzlas//
552b1(rgyud 'grel): byin pa sbyin chen snying rjes bskyed nas kyang // bde bar gshegs pa kun gyis bsten pa yi// gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o// rang sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang // de dag rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas yi no// ji ltar zla ba chos
552b2(rgyud 'grel): lo mi rnams kyi// phyag 'tshal nye ba lus can phyag mi 'tshal// de bzhin dang pas rgyal ba'i thug sras la// phyag bya'i de ltar bde bor bshegs la min// 'jig rten kun gyis mngon mtho bslab pa can// snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i
552b3(rgyud 'grel): don du ni// skye ba lon pa 'di l+la ci yi phar// pu gcig bdag nyid kun gyis phyag mi bya// skyes bu bsam ya sau rma do 'byung rdzu 'phrul can// de la mi ngan gang zhig mi 'dud pa// de la rgyal ba thaMd thugs byung nas// de yi gsang sngags dngos
552b4(rgyud 'grel): grub ma stsol to// dper na shing gi me tog dang por ni// yid 'od phyi nas 'bral bur gyur pa ltar// seMn mchog rnams me tig 'dra bar bltos// 'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba rig par gyis// gang gi rang bzhin chags rnams rnam bral yang //
552b5(rgyud 'grel): gdul ba'i don phyir khro la khro ba dang // 'dod chags can la chags chen ltar ston dang // byang chub mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshalo// grang gis las deng rnam smin mkhyen pa yi// 'gro ba kun dang ji ltar mthun pa yi// gsang sngags gzugs
552b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis rje su chags mdzad pa// sngags kyi rnams 'dren de la phyag 'tshalo// de phyir log par lta ba rnam spangs la// yang dag lta ba la ni brten par gyis// bu mod mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dpas sman dang glang chen brtag pa 'am skar ma'i
553a1(rgyud 'grel): dpyadaka mtsho cha brtag pa 'am rta dpyad rang bzo 'am// bstan chos ngan pa slob cing klog pu spang // yul ba'i gtam dang mi dbang bsten pa dang // dmag dang gyang dang na chung gtam dag dang // sgrub ldebs dang ni sngon gyis
553a2(rgyud 'grel): lo bskyas gtam// 'dod chags dang ni smad 'tshong gtam mi bya// bdag la bstod par nam yang mi bya zhing // sen gzhan la smad pAr mi bya'o// rtag dang skyil dang me 'drar 'jig rten dag/ bsam nas spangs te dpe na li dga' bar bya//
553a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags rol gsang sngags bzlas pa mAn snga nas ni// grong dang grong khyer khyim dang gtsugs lagaso khang // mchod rten bsti gnas ri dang dka' thugs gnas/ kun dga' lu ma'i rdzing bur 'gro mi bya'o// sngar bshad pa yi gnas rnams
553a4(rgyud 'grel): mi rnyes na// lha khung stong pa nyams dga'i shing drung ngam// rI dang chu rlung rku 'bab 'bab chu dang // nags tshal stong ba dag dang yul stong dang // gnas gang rung bar sngags pas gnas shing bzlas// yang ni gnas ni nges par ma gnas// zla ba
553a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad po 'di yi dus dag tu// gnas 'di gang yang rung ba gcig tu brten// mtsho dang shing dreng ri bo 'am dgon pa'i gnas// mtshe'u dang khang pa nags dang chu ngog suM// dgun dpyid zla ba rnamasu gnas byas la// sngags pas dbyer ni gcig pur
553a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas bya ste// ji ltar rgyal bas dge slong dbyar zla gsum// tshul zhugs gzhan du mi 'gro gsungs pa bzhin de bzhin bac+doMs kyis sngags pa la// zla ba gsum du gcig pur gnas par gsungs// sngags pos dbyar ni bsgrub la mi 'jug par/
553b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod kyis ni dus kyang 'da' bar bya// dbyar bzlas nas ni sngags pa gzi skyed nas// bdag nyid bsrung byas sgrub la 'jug par bya// yongasu 'dzin pa rnam par spangs nasu// chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms dran ngon dang // stan dang
553b2(rgyud 'grel): malA stan ngan don tsam+ba gyis kyang // chog po'i sems dang ldan pas bsod nams thog/ gtsug phung bzhag nasau skra ni bregs nasu// 'byung khungs tshon gyis gos kyi kha dog bsgyur// gos dkar dag gam shing lo 'am so ma 'am// zur
553b3(rgyud 'grel): ma shing shun rnams kyi gos bgo'o// ku 'am lcags sam 'jim pa las byas pa// dbyibs na legs shing mi rtsub 'jam pa dang // mi chags zlum zhing ma nyam rma med pas// yid du 'ong ba'i lhung gzed bcad par bya// bza' btang mod kyi
553b4(rgyud 'grel): dmangs rigs mang ba dang // mgror la mchod byed legs par gnas pa'i grong // ha tsang mi nye ha cang mi ring ba// bram ze'i phyi rol skye med pa po sde// nga rgyal gyis ni len pa'i bram ze rnams// rigs kyi rlom zhing snying rje mi ldan pa// de dag bde ba/
553b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// mchong ba mthong na gogs kyang byed par 'gyur// bram ze sangs rgyas pa las ji lta dman// dmyang las bram ze dag las dam rigs rnams// bsnyen bkur dang ni mchod par 'gyur bas na// dmang rigs kyi kyang gas/
553b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags ji ltar bzlas// lha dang mkha' 'gro mchod dang las drug dang // rgyal po dang ni me la brten pa dang // bu yi don du 'gro bar bya ba dag/ bram ze rnams kyis nges par 'grub pa yi na// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs kyang rang gi las// 'grub pa 'di la
554a1(rgyud 'grel): the tshom ma byed ces// brdzun du smra ba sna tshogs pa dag gis// bdag dang gzhan gyi sems ni sreg par byed// yang lag brgyad la gnas par rtag tu ni// nyi ma phyed mtshams tshun chad blang bar bya// bram ze'i dus ni phyi dro yin
554a2(rgyud 'grel): pas na// de'i phyir bram ze'i khyim du 'gro mi bya// dper na rma ni gso dang bsal ba'i phyir// nad pa dag lnga sman pas sbyin pa lhor// de bzhin 'dir yang bkres pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ bsol phyir brgya la bas kha zas bza' bar gsungs// la la laM
554a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis dub cing 'gro ba'i tshe// bkres bsgom gdungs pas rang gi bu yi sha/ za ba bzhin du rnal 'byor sems dman zhing // khe dang rgyags phyir bza' bar mi bya'o// mang du blugs na stsol med ma thob dang // de bzhin nyung ngu yang ni dmas 'gyur la
554a4(rgyud 'grel): ran+da pAr skad cig mnyam par 'gro bar ltar// lus can kha zas de ltar bza' bar bya// dper na khang rnying mi shigs bya ba'i phyir// mi yis kra ba brtan po btsugs pa ltar// de bzhin lus kyis 'khrul 'khor gnas pa dang / me shing
554a5(rgyud 'grel): rta'i mig bsku bzhin du kha zas bzas// 'dod pa'i khams ni kha zas kyis gnas shos// rgyal bas chos gcig tu ni dka' stsalo bras// lus ni chu shing bzhin du rigs bya ste// sems ni bza' btud srogs la chags mi bya// dbang po drug
554a6(rgyud 'grel): bo yul la 'phyo ba na// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i shes pas bsrung bar bya// lhung bzed de dag la ni gcig thogs nas// gnya' shing gang tu blta zhing bsod snyoms dpyod// 'dzum zhing 'gro la smra zhing mig zur can// yan lag thaMd yid
554b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog byed pa'i gzugs// bud med gzugs ni mtshon cha 'obs 'dra bas// skyes pa'i sems ni mngon du 'phrog par byed// lcags kyi mthong lcags rab tu 'bar ba yis// mig ni rnam par bkag pa ches sla'o// nyis nA dra ba nyams byed
554b2(rgyud 'grel): bud med kyi// dkyus ring mig can bzhin ni ma mthong sla// gang du dga' bar 'dzin cing mthong byed la// sems kyis sems ni rnam par 'dul bzhin du// rub dang 'bring la sogs pa spangs nas su// mi smra ba ni gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro/ gong na
554b3(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhon be'u phrug gu chung pa dang // gang na bu mo gzhon brten rtse bi dang // de bzhin gang na gzhon rtse ba dang // gang na khyi za dgra' ston byed pa dang // gang ni skye bo mang po 'dus pa dang // de bzhin yang ni rol mo byed pa rnams de ro ni skyes bu rnam yang
554b4(rgyud 'grel): mi ba// bsodade snyoms ci rnyed khyod de 'ongs nas kyang // dang po ji ltar bde bar bgo bar bya// rkang bkrus glo bur ba la byin nasu// lus bsrel phyir ni kha zas bza' bor bya// dus su zos nas ngas khrus byas te// gang rdo zlos dga'i sems ni
554b5(rgyud 'grel): zhi bA li// brten pa nyid kyis dran pa rmongs gyur na// langs nas 'chag cing phyogasu blta ba dang // chu yis gdong yang yongasu bkru bar bya// gling bu'i sgra rnga yi smanas dang shin tu 'jigs byed skye ba'i sgra dag dang // gang rgyangs ku co dag dang //
554b6(rgyud 'grel): dang pi wang dag dang rdza lnga'i sgra// bya bran sna tsho/ sgra dang mus+tha dang // med rgyan gyi sa'i khrol sgra rnams dang // sha sbrang tsha grang rlung gis gnod pa yis// mi yi sems ni g.yang zhing g.yo bar bye // bstangs dang mchod pa dang ni gar byed dang // glu len
555a1(rgyud 'grel): rnga rdung skye bos bcas 'gyur dang // lhag pa'i nga rgyal sred dang 'dod chen dang // rgyal po dang ni 'dus pa ltar 'dod dang // dus min nyid dang mi 'grub smra ba dang / bstan chos ngan dang snyan dgas klog 'don dang // 'dod
555a2(rgyud 'grel): chags 'jigs dang dregs dang rgyags pa dang // zhes la 'dzin drang le lo g.yo sgyu spang // glang chen rta dang ba glang bya gag khyau// gong mo sreg pa 'ug pa skyes pa dang // bud med bu mo de bzhin ra lug stsogs// 'thab mo 'gyed pa mi lha mi bya'o//
555a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod mags la sogs nyon mongs tshogs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'khor ba yin par kun tu brjod// nyon mongs rnam grol shes dang zlo 'dra la// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i thar ni rab tu bsgrags// dper na dri med chu ni rdul sogs kyis// skad gcig
555a4(rgyud 'grel): t+yA yang rnyod par byed par ltar// de bzhin rnams ngag dri ma med pa'i sems// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis rnyog par 'gyur// lam 'od rnams kyis gsang sngags dngos grub cing // de bzhin 'dir ni many+dzu ris thar pa thob// rgyal sras
555a5(rgyud 'grel): no gyis rgyal sros 'das pa dag/ 'di nas gshegs shing de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// grogs med sems kyis lus dang drag yid kyis// gus pas bsod nams gang dgu bsags pa yang // bde gshegs gsungs pa'i bde bI/
555a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dmig// dge ba'i las rnams de dag bskyed pa yin// slob dpon man ngag ces par bstan pa yi// don spras pa dang las kyis skabs rnams kyis// so so'i ting 'dzin sgo sogs tha dad pas// dpung bzang zhus las gnas pa rim
555b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin min// gnas pa'i le'u las gnas pa dang po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // rnal 'byor sgrub pos 'khor ba ying zhing // mya ngan 'das la mchog tu gzhol ba des// snyoms 'jug sgrib pa dang ni bral don du rje 'dzin sbyar
555b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir lha'i gnas pa bsgom// rtog dang spyod dang dga' dang bde ba ni// sems rtse gcig pa'i dang po yan ldogs lnga// 'das pa'i tshig gis ma 'ongs gnas pa rnams// gsang sngags mdo sde'i tshul las bsha pa yin// gling bu'i sna dang rdo li
555b3(rgyud 'grel): sgo rnams dang // shrIn tu 'jig byed skye bo'i dgra rnams dang // shA sbrang tsha grang rlung gis gnod pa yis// mi'i sems ni g.yeng zhing g.yo bar byed// 'dzum zhing 'gro la smra zhidA mig zur can// yan lag thaMd yid 'phrog byed pa'i gzugs/
555b4(rgyud 'grel): byed med gzugs ni mtshon cha 'jo bsro pa 'dra// skyes pa'i sems ni mngon tu 'phrig par byed// lcags kyi mthong sregs rab tu 'byur ba yis// mig ni rnam par bkab pa ches bla yi// nyi snga na dran pa nyams byed bud med kyi// dkyog ring migra N+DiR+Ya bzhin
555b5(rgyud 'grel): nI ma mthong sla// rtag dang sbrul dang me 'drar 'jig rten na// bsams nas spangs te dbyen la dga' bar bya// dga' bas lus ni shin tu sbyangs par mthong // lus sbyangs pas ni bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur// rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i la ni//
555b6(rgyud 'grel): yid la byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skyes// rtog dpyod med pas nang ni rab tu skye// dga' sogs gnyis pa'i yan lag rnam bzhir bstan// sems ni dang pas lha yi bde ba dang // mtho ris dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur// btang snyoms
556a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni dran dang shed bzhin dang // bAdade dang rtse gcig pa yi yan lag+hu lta// btang snyoms ldan zhes tshangs pa'i tshe gaN+DIg dang // dper nA rlung med khang pa'i nang du ni// mar me btsugs pa mi g.yo 'bar ba ltar// rtse gcig sems
556a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis zlos la mngon dga' ba'i// lus la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar byar 'gyur// gtang snyos yings dag dran pa sa sudag/ sdug bsngal lam yin bde min sems rtse gci // grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma snyed dang // bde yang sdug bsngal de bzhin bstod
556a3(rgyud 'grel): smad dag/ sems kyis 'jig rten chos brgyad rab bcom ste// sdig pa'i gnas su gyur pa spang bar bya// bsam gtan gyi lha'i gnas pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// // rgyal sras rnams kyis lhag pa'i bsams pa ni// gnas skabs kun tu gzhan
556a4(rgyud 'grel): don lhur len pa su// gnas pas tshangs pa'i rgyu ni bshad bya ste// byams dang snying rje dga' dang gtang snyoms ldan// tshad med pa'i gnas pa ste le'u drug pa'o// // chos dbyings rtogs pa la 'jug gzhol ba'i yul// rnam thar sgo gsum
556a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgo par bya ba'i phyir// // gnas pa gsum pa bdag gis khyod lnga bshad// thub pa'i lung bzhin gus pa'i sems kyis nyon// gzugs kyis 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan+do// de ni bdag min bdag kyang gzugs ma yin// bud med mtshan
556a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang // sman dang glang tshon brtags pa 'i skor ma'i dpyad// mtshon cha brtag pa 'i rta dpyad rang bzo 'am// bstan bcos ngan pa spang zhing klog pa spang // yul ba'i gtam dang mi dbang bsten pa dang // dmasha dang gyad dang na chung brten
556b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // sgrung ldebs dang ni sngon gyi lo rgyus gtam// 'dod pa'i gtam dang smad 'tshong gtam mi bya// rnam par thar pa bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // ji ltar rtsa bA mA dpyad shing // yal ga de las skye 'gyur ltar// nyon mongs rtsa ba ma bcud la// dngos hUM/
556b2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba nyon mongs 'byung // dri phyir nyon mongs bdud gzhom phyir// chos rnams stong pa nyid bsgom po// bdag gis rgyud las gsungs bzhin du// bshad kyis dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan rdo can gsungs pa// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni// rnal 'byor/
556b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni gang gis shes// stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur// mi mothun pa dang gnyen po phyir// stong nyid bsdom par yongasu gsungs// nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams kyis// kun tu rtog pa'i gnyen po dang // phyin ci log gi rnam pa dag/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du bshad// phyi
556b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa dang bral ba// phyi rol stong pa nyid du bshad// nang gi cho ga chos rnams dang // phyi rol tu 'ang mi rtog pa/ 'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni// stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad// snod gyi 'jig rten rten bral ba// chen po stong pa nyid du brjod// le lo yis
556b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa la// rjesu dmigs pa byed phyir ro// de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa// dngos med stong pa nyid stong pa nyid// don datso bar ni brdzun pa'i dngos// shes pa don dam stong pa nyid// 'dus pas sbyin pa la sogs kyis// dge ba dmigasu med pa'i pirA//
556b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rnam rtogs mtshan nyid spyod// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad// yang dag byang chub dus ma byas// dngos mtshan yang ni dmigasu med// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid gsungs// sems can don du smon lamo so/
557a1(rgyud 'grel): rab dga' la sogs dmigasu med// kun rtog thang rnams sbyangs pa// mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid gsungs// thog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyis// 'gro ba'i phyir ni smon lam nyid// rlom sems med de brjod do// thog mtha' med//
557a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stong pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par dmigs pa med// dge ba'i bdag nyid mi gtong ba// rlom sems med pa zhes bshad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs dri moM ni// bdag gi rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o// de ltar rlom sems med
557a3(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa'i// gzugs sku de ni ston no// gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa// rang gi ma nA nyid to nyi / byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams ni// spyod pa la yang rlom sems med//
557a4(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams thaMd stong nyid bshad// bdag dang skyes bus chos rnams ni// sgro btags dngos po med pa'i mchog/ 'ching ba tha~Md rnam par bcad// dngos po stong pa nyid du gsungs// ji ltar mngon sum stong pa nyid// de ltar dngos po med shes pa// slar yang
557a5(rgyud 'grel): mi dmigs pa nyid ni// dngos po med pa'i stong nyid 'dod// de ltar stong nyid phye ba yang // bag chags rnams kyis gnyen po'i phyir// smra ba mchog gis gsungs pa de// nyon mongs bdud ni gzhom pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor pa rnams rtag tu bsgom// stong pa
557a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// nga ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul ji ltar gsung ba bshad du gsol// rdo rje slob dpon ston pas gang gsungs pa// da ni chos kun yang dag par// dngos po'i tshul gyis mi len to// sgyu ma rmi 'o ma smig rgyu ltar// rkyen kyi dbang gi
557b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug phyir ro// dgag par bya ba med pa snga na// yang dag bklag pa med par mngon// de ltar de nyid rtog pa de// thaMd dngos por len mi byed// de yis de ni rtogs pa ste// mi stong ma yin yod med min// mi skye mi yin skye min zhes// bya ba la so Da bcwo
557b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung so// bsam gtan gyi no lhasna 'di yin// gsang ba'i tshig rnams bsams na ni// 'bras bu rdzogs par thog 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa tsam gyis de ltar min// tshigs rnams re re'i rnal 'byor la// mngon du phyogs par byed bzhin du// gsang
557b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags ngan pa brjod pa 'di// tshigi sgras ni tshig r+ye la// mi byar mi rung bstan pa yin// rnal 'byor med pa'i gsang sngags 'di// de ltar 'bras bu ster mi 'gyur// gsang sngags tshig ni gsang sngags te// de phyir rnal 'byor med mi bya// mdo yI don
557b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'odra gsal ba la 'jug par byas te// oM shU n+ya tAM zhes bya ba'o// 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo las// rdo 'dzin pas snyoms zhugs nas// zung tu 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor la thabs dang ldan par bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang // de bzhin
557b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang // gang la de ga nyis gcig gyu ro po// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// rtag pa gnyis po sbyangs pa ni// grang zhig dngos po gcig 'gyur ro// zung du 'jug ces de lo bshad// kun rdzob dang ni
557b6(rgyud 'grel): don dam dag/ rtog pa gnyis dang yang dag bral// gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// rdo rje bzlas par rab spyod pas// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams yang dag btsod// sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur/
558a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang // dngos grub chen po brgyad thob 'gyur// sra ba la sngogs rim pas shes// mngon byang chub thob par 'gyur// zur 'jug rim pa la gnas pas// dngos grub thaMd bsdud pa ni// tshe 'di
558a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid la 'grub par 'gyuraro// rnal 'byor pa yis the tshom med// phyag rgya chen po dngos grub che// zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog med par bzhugs nas ni// thob par 'di la the tshom med// 'od gsal ba dang zung du 'jug pa'i le'u
558a3(rgyud 'grel): gu pa'o// // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom nas// yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos phung po'i bdud bcom ste// rnam par rtog pa'i rabu rib bsal nas ni// mi rtog ye shes zla ba ji lta bar/
558a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dri med phung po rab spangs na// mya ngan 'das pa chen po zhes bshadado// mi rtag chos kun na mkha'i dkyil nas ni// gzugs sku dri mod nyi ma zlo ba shar// gdul bya gnyis kyi ma rig mun sel ba// thub pa chos kyi sku la phyag 'tsha'o// thub
558a5(rgyud 'grel): pA lo spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tsho'o// thub pa sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tsha lo// thub pa dpag med 'phrog la phyag 'tsha'o// thub pa 'od kyi rgyan bsal phyag 'tsha lo// e ma 'gro kun 'gro dbang phyug na mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa rnyed// se ma
558a6(rgyud 'grel): de tshig de nyid gsum// mchog tu rmod byung ston par mdzad// khams gsum la ni rnam par grol// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dod pa rnams kyis lagos pa// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang // skye mched rnam la/
558b1(rgyud 'grel): bsten cing // srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol// ji ltar na mkha' gnas med cing // spros pa med cing gros med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig dge ba'i mi bcom shing // nyes b+ha nam/
558b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'i chub pa mod// gzhon la gcig tu phan mdzad pa// bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshalo// mig gis mig ni bsrung ba ltar// gang la brten de bdag bsrung zhig/ spyod pa thun mongs lha gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa' kun phyag 'tshal// gang zhig
558b3(rgyud 'grel): la brten thub pa rnams// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub mdzad// gdu lo bya rnams phyir sna tshogs gzugs// seMn rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// gang rmongs na ni 'khor 'gyur zhing // gang shis thu pa'i ngo bo nyid// rtag zhugs lha yi 'khor lo mchog
558b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid la ni phyag 'tsha lo// bdud phyir bzlog rim pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa la 'jug po las bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu'o// // sgrub pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba// slob dpon chen po dpal dz+nyA nA badz+rA byaM ba// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rim pa
558b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum dog dang ldan pa// bcom ldani 'das mi baM spyod pa'o zhabs kyi ze'u 'bru spyi bos len pas mdzad pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar g+hi mkhan po dge bsgron chen po btsun pa kum ra dang bod kyi l-i ts+tsha ba lU btsun pas bsgyur cing zhus
558b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dge'o// // rgya ger skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sa mA dza de ba mauN+Da la kA ya stotra nA ma/ khod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhi tshig khams
559a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum las grol dngos nyid sku// dag cing rabu zhi rnal 'byor yul gyur pa// mnyam med bde bas brgyan pa 'gro ba'i mgon// 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bstod par bgyi// zhal gsum phyag drug bai DUr+ya ltar dngas//
559a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar g.yas pa rdo rje 'khor lo dade/ pad+ma dril bu rin chen ral gri 'dzin// mi ba~M spyod rdo rje go n+do la phyag 'tsha'o// rab dmar g.yas ni mthing ga g.yon dmar zhal// phyag g.yos 'khor lho d+ho NAM pad+ma 'dzin// g.yon pa'i dril bu rin chen ral gyi
559a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad la phyag 'tsha lo// mthing dang dkar ba'i zhal dbus gser gyi mdog/ nor bu rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas na 'dzin// dril bu pad+ma ral gri phyog g.yon brgyan// rdo rje rin che ni tog lce phyag 'tshalo// rab tshogs drag po
559a4(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i zhal mnga' ba// pad+ma kha 'byed rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas// g.yon pa dril bu pad sdong rin chen gri// mtha' yas rdo rje de la phyag 'tshalo// dbus ljang g.yas mauthing g.yon pA dkar ba'i zhal// ral gri sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang //
559a5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu bad ljang nor bu phyag ni bsnams// don grub rdo rje de la phyag 'tshalo// dbus zhi ga yas dgra g.yon pa dbang gi zhal// 'khor lo rdo rje ut+pa la gA yas na 'dzin// g.yon pa'i phyag na dril bu rin chen+da gri/ nad zhi lha mo spyan la phyag 'tshal
559a6(rgyud 'grel): char sprin lta bu'i g.yas g.yon dkar dmar zhal// rdo rje 'khor lo de bzhin ut+pal g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon na 'dzin// bge gos 'joms mA ma kI/ phyag 'tshalo// ngo mar mthing dmar ba'i zhal gsum go rim bzhin/ bad sdong
559b1(rgyud 'grel): dril bu rin chen ral gyi g.yon// g.yas pas kha 'byed rdo rje 'khor lo 'chang // gdon 'joms gos dkar can la phyag 'tshalo// lding mthing dkar ba dbus dang g+ha yasku g.yon zhal// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo ut+palA dang // dril bu rin
559b2(rgyud 'grel): chen ral gri rtag tu 'dzin// 'gro kun dbang mdzad sgrol ma phyag 'tshalo// spyan dang sku mdog phyag mtshan mtshungs pa lo// khyad par gzugs phung gasngal ba'i me long 'dzin// mchog gzugs mchod pas mgon kun minyes mdzad ma// rdo rje
559b3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ma de la phyag 'tsha lo// rtse ba'i phyag gnyis rgyud mnga' sgra sgrogs shing // sku dang phyog rgya gzhan ni bdag dang mtshungs// mtshungs med sgra yis skyong rnams rab mchod ma// rdo rje sgra mra de la phyag 'tshalo// gos dkar lha mo ji bzhin gsel
559b4(rgyud 'grel): ba la// mchog tu rtse ba'i phyag gnyis dung chos 'dzin// sangs rgyas rnams ni dri yis tshim mdzad ma// rdo rje dri ma de la phyag 'tshalo// zhal gsum phyag drug sgrol ma lta bu la// mtshungs med ro mchog dag pa'i snod mtshang zhing // mkha' khyab
559b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba ro yis mnyes mdzod ma// rdo ro ma de la phyag 'tshalo// sngo skye dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mnga'// dkyi lto 'khor bdag po ji bzhin phyog rgya gsil// bde chen reg mchog rnams kyis mgon mchod mdzud// rdo rje reg ma de la phyag
559b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tsha lo// rgyal ba'i zhal dang sku mdog phyag mtshan rnams// gti mug rnam par sbyong dang mtshungs pa la// phyag g.yas klu shing me tog mdzes pa 'dzin// rdo rje byams pa mgon la phyag 'tsha lo// gzugs med rnam dag me long ye shes can de dag sku
560a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog phyag mtshan khyud med cing // mig dbang thogs med rdo rje stsol mdzad ma// rdo rje sa snying de lu phyag 'tshalo// nga rgyal sbyong mdzad mgron po lta ba'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug phyag rgya drug dang ldan// sgra gsum
560a2(rgyud 'grel): thog med mi phyed rang bzhin nyid// phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// tshor bdag mnyam nyid yis can brnyes pa'i// rgyal ba ji bzhin sku'i phyag rgya 'chang // sna dbang rab zhi mi phyed rang bzhin sku// rdo rje mkha' snying de la phyag 'tshalo// zhal mdog phyag
560a3(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin mtshan ma rnams// 'dod chags sbyong bar mdzad pa'i mgron po bzhin// ma thogs mi phyed lha dbang rab stsol ba// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang li phyag 'tshalo// 'du shes rnam dag ku nA rtog ye shes la// mnga' brnyes skyob pa lta bu'i cha lugs//
560a4(rgyud 'grel): can/ chags thogs mi mnga' mi phyed shes rob nyid// rdo rje mjam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tsha lo// log pa'i ngang can sbyangs mdzad bac+doMs// ji bzhin sgro yis rnam par 'phrul bkod nas// mi phyed rdo rje'i sku mchog rang bzhin can// rdo'i sgrib kun
560a5(rgyud 'grel): sel la phyag 'tshalho// gang zhig sku ni 'du byed rnam dag nA// bya grub yis mnga' bsgos dang mtshungs te// shes dang shes bya rab zhi 'od gsal dag/ rdo rje kun tu bzang la phyag 'tshalo// 'bar ba'i dbus bzhugs gnag dkar dmar zhal khro/
560a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa 'khor lo rdo g.yas na 'dzi ni// sdigs 'dzub zhags pa dril bu dag sta g.yon// rdo gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tsholo// mdog dkar gnag dang dmar po g.yas g.yon zhal// phyag drug rdo dbyug gi sngags mdzub zhabs// dril bu dgra sta
560b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mdzad khro chen sku// rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub phyag 'tshalo// khro rgyal gang zhig dmar gnag dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma ral gri gtun shing g.yas pas 'dzin// gA yon pa bsnyems bcas dril bu dgra sta zhags// rdo rje rta mgrin de la phyag 'tshalo//
560b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnag g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar po'i zhal// sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo gtun shrIng dang / sdigs mdzub dril bu dgra sta 'chung byed khro// rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshalo// gAnag dmar dkar zhal rab tu bzhag mdzadr-i cing // ral
560b3(rgyud 'grel): gri rdo rje 'khor lho g.yas na 'dzin// sdigs mdzub dgra sta zhags pa g.yon nA bsnams// rdo rje mi ga yo mgon la phyag 'tsha lo// khyo chen mthing gnag dkar dang dmar bri'o zhal// rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis hUM mdzad phyag rgya mdzad// rdo rje ral gri zhag
560b4(rgyud 'grel): pa lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// sngon dmar dkar ba'i zhil mnga' khyo rgyal ni// dbyug pa rolnga gri 'khor lo g.yas na 'dzin// sdigs mdzub ral gri dag sta g.yon na mnga'// rdo rje dbyig sngon tsun wa phyag 'tshalo// gtum
560b5(rgyud 'grel): chen gnag dmar dkar ba'i zhal gsum mnga'// dbyug pa ril gri 'khor lo phyag g.yas 'dzin// sdig mdzub ral gri dang lta g.yon nA bsnams// rdo rje stobs po che li phyag 'tshalo// sngon dmar dkar ba'i zhalo mnga' khro bo'i gtso// rtsa ba'i phyags
560b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzin// gzhon rnams rdo rje pad+ma sdigs mdzub gri/ rdo rje gtsug tor rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// gnag dmar dkar ba'i zhil ldan khro rgyal ni// rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu phyag g.yas 'chang // g.yon pa sdig mdzub zhags pad+mo gri/ rdo
561a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal la phyag 'tsha'o// dkyil 'khor mtshon gnas lha sgra'i me tog sum cu rtsa gnyis la// rab dang bud pas bstod pa'i lces blang dge chen sbrang rtsi 'di// 'gro ba dngos 'dzin rlung nad gzir ba
561a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis lcags bstan pas// nyon mongs gdungs bsal gzhan don mdangs rgyas yis sku thob sh+lo// dpal gsang ba 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku lha bstong po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyis phyug mo gnas rdo rjes
561a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mA khan+d+ha pe A~M tsaR+tha shrad+d+ha kar wA rme dang / zhus tshor gyi lo n+d+he bA ban+de rin chen bzang pos bsgyur po'o// // rgya gar skad du// bo d+hi tsit+ta bi bA ra Na T+wA~M kA/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems kyi 'grel ba'i
561a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bshad pa// gcig dang du ma mir sbyor ba// mkhyen nas ts+tsha/ pa kAn spongs pa'i// s+thAn+da pA'i bdag nyid thugs rje can to// btud nas rnams pa shung 'di bya'o// de tshul gyis sa mi glegs da rnyed// 'dod nas brtsams pa ma sbyin
561a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ dad pas phyogs tsam byas 'di la// mkhas pas dpo yang bzod par gsal// de las 'di yi gleng gzhi ni ldan pa sangs rgyas bac+doMs byang chub kyi sems po sngags pa'i sgo nas// spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor
561a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ma'i don du bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i thabs rgyud kyi rgyal po gsapa 'dus pa las// dngos po tha~Md dang bral ba zhes bya ba gsol ba'i mno ngag gi lung rtsa ba bstan to// de'i bsdus pa'i
561b1(rgyud 'grel): don ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang de bsgoms par dam bca' ba dang // kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems dang // de gnyis rtogs par bya ba'i thab so// de la don dam pa byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rim pa la bzhi ste// dngos
561b2(rgyud 'grel): po thabs dang bral pos shes pa mu stegs kyi ltab sun dbyung ba bstan pa dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs zhe lnga pas bye brag tu spro ba dang mdo sde po'i lta ba sun dbyung ba dang // chos bdag
561b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa mnyam pa nyid ces sems tsi mAM pa'i lta ba sun dbyung ba dang // rang sems gdong nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes pas dbu maM pa'i lta bo grub nas rnam par bzhag bya dang // ji ltar sangs rgyas bac+doMs zhes
561b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pas don dam pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dam bca' bstan pa'o// kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la yang ma bsgral ba'i seMn rnams bsgral ba'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bzhis ngan song gsum
561b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lha dang mi dang rang sangs rgyas de nga byang chub sems dpa' rnams rim bzhin du// bsgrol ba lo sogs par bstan to// rtogs par bya ba'i thabs kyang gnyis te/ smon pa ni 'di lhur zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems
561b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa ni don dam pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ de ltar na rtsa ba'i don bcu gcig/ da ni de'i don rgyas par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// de nas zhes bya ba 'grel pa'i mgo brtsams pa ste/ de dag
562a1(rgyud 'grel): gang du/ gang gis/ gang las/ gang / gang gi phyir byasa? shwe na/ dpal gyi ro bo lnga// 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis/ gsang ba 'dus pa las// dbu ma'i lta bar bsdus pa don dam pa kun rdzob byang chub sems gnyis yin la// dgos
562a2(rgyud 'grel): pa phyi rol gyi lta ba bsal nas rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes dong snying rje gtsor bzhag ste/ yi ge nyung ngu sna don pos lwa bar go rimasu phyogasu byas nas 'grel to// de ltar na rtog pa sngon du byed pa'i gang zag la rtsis mgo lngas bstan to// de'i sa bcwo/
562a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bco lnga ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / dbu zhabs kyi don dang / bshad par dam bca' ba dang / don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems cher bzhog pa'i don dang / dngos po tha~Md dang bral ba 'grel pa'i don dang / phung po la sogs pa spangs pa 'grel pa dang
562a4(rgyud 'grel): chos bdag med mnyam pa nyid 'grel pa dang / rang gi sems ma smras pa la sogs pa'i 'grel ba dang / kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems cher bzhag pa'i don dang / ma bsgral ba'i sems bsgral ba la sogs pa bzhi 'grel ba'i don bzhi dang /
562a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems gnyis ston dang / dge ba bsngo ba'o// de la phyag 'tshal ba'i don ni byang chub sems zhes pa nas bstan to// dbu zhabs kyi don ni byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa srid pa 'joms shes pas// bshad pAd dma' ba ni bdag
562a6(rgyud 'grel): gos bshad ces paso// don rim pa byang chub kyi sems cher bzhog pa ni bdag dang zhes pa nas so// dngos po thang dang bral ba'i 'brel ba ni mu ste Da zhes pa nas// phung po rang bzhi zhes pa la sogs pa'i 'grel pa ni 'jig rten bdag sogs zhes
562b1(rgyud 'grel): ba na so// chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'grel pa ni sums tsam 'di zhes pa naso// rang gi sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'grel pa ni mtshan nyid med pa mi skye ba zhes bya ba naso// kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems cher bzhug pa'i
562b2(rgyud 'grel): don ni de ltar sgom par byed pa na zhes bya ba naso// mi bsgral sgrol ba'i 'grel pa ni gang gis dgongs pa zhes pa naso// ma bsgral sgrol ba'i 'brel pa ni seMn bsgral ba'i zhes pa naso// dbugs dbyung ba'i 'grel pa ni theg pa chen po zhes pa
562b3(rgyud 'grel): naso/ mya nga ni zlo ba'i 'grel ba ni gzungs rnams zhes pa naso// byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyi sngon ni phyag rgya zhes pa naso// bsngo ba ni rgyal ba zhes pa nas bstan to// de ni rtsa 'grel de'i 'bru gzhom te// de la re zhig mug stegs pa sun dbyung ba'i
562b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po thang dang bral ba zhes bA te/ de la dngos po thaMd ni phyi dang nang ngo // de la nang gi dngos po bcu drug bshad pa// bdag dang sron srog dang ni// skye bu gso ba skyes bu dang / gang zag shed skyes shed bu dang // byed po byed du 'jug tshor ba/ shes
562b5(rgyud 'grel): mthong slong ba kun slong rnams// phyi rol dngos po bum rnam so dang // raM lce/ sogs rdzas mtha' yas// de yod pas don byed phyiraro// thod ces bya ba ni skye mched bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid grangs med la shes par bya ste// grangs dang bcas pa ni/
562b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yi no// dngos po yang de tha~Md kyang // de nyid pas dngos po thod ces bya'o// de ltar yang bram ze tha~Md ces bya ba ni// skye mche do btso gnyis kho na'o// zhes gsung so// de nyid kyis sbyang ba la med pas na bral ba ste/ dngos po rnams ma rtags na gcig
563a1(rgyud 'grel): tu nyams dga' ba'i phyir// bye brag tu smra ba dang mdo sde pa sun 'byin pa ni// phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/ de la phung po ni gzugs la sogs pa ste/ spangs pa'i phyiraro// de yang dus gsum gyi gzugs bzang ngan
563a2(rgyud 'grel): dang che phra yod cog gcig tu spungs pa dang // de bzhin du bde ba la sogs pa myong ba rnams dang / 'di ni dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa kha dog dang // ring ba la sogs pa dbyibs dang / bzang po la sogs pa bye brag mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams dang /
563a3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum pa'i sems las byung ba rnams dang / mi rten pa'i 'dus byed rnams dang / dus gsum gyi yul tha dad pa la shes pa'i rnam par shes pa/ shes pa'i tshogs bdun po rnams gcig tu spangs pa'i shos pa ste phung po lnga'o// khams ni mig la/
563a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa khams bco brgyad do// spyi dang rang gis mtshan nyid 'dzin phyir dang // rigs kyi don 'dzin pa'i phyir dang srid pa'i sa bon yin pa'i phyir kham so// skye mched ni mig la sdigs pa'i skye mched ngacu gnyis te/ rnam par shes par bskyed cing / 'phel
563a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pas na skye mche // gzung 'dzin ni phyi'i gzugs la sogs pa skye mched drug dang // nang gi mig la sogs skye mched drug la sems tsam pas kun tu brtags pa'i ming ste/ dbango pos spyod yul du bzung ba'i phyir dang / dbang po 'dzin mkhan
563a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyiraro// de rnams don dam par rdzasuM med par spangs pa ste/ 'og nas kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs// dbu ba 'dra zhes rjod ces bya ba la sogs pas 'grel to// // sems tsam pa'i lta ba sun byung ba ni/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya
563b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de la chos ni mdor na phung po lnga ste/ spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i na lung las kyang / mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na chos zhes bya zhe'o// bdag ces bya ba ni sbrul gyi sprugs pa brje ba ltar lus kyi phung po'i nang na/ phung po sngon ma 'dor
563b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing / phyi ma len pa// rtag pa'i dzo nga dang blo yis 'dzin pa'i gzhi// bdag ces bya bar mug stegs pas rtags pa'o// de dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas pa'i chos dong / mu stegs pa'i bdag bsal nas rnam par rig pa tsam du bzhag pa'o// de ltar phung
563b3(rgyud 'grel): po dang bdag med pa de bzhin du rnam par rig pa yang med par 'dra bas na// chos bdag med par mnyam pa nyid ces bya ste/ 'og nas sems tsam 'di yis sna tshogasu zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'grel to// de ltar dngos po la sogs pa
563b4(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bsal nas// dbu ma'i don tshar bzhag pa ni rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes pa ste/ don dam par rang gis sems tsam yang mi skye ste/ yod med dbus las 'das pa'i phyi ro// 'di ltar mu stegs pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa
